1b1(nyi khri): d+hA g+har snad du/pany+dzing+tha ti swA ha sr-ik+ShA prad+hU pA mit+ma/dang /
1b2(nyi khri): skad bya/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/dum bu dang po
1b3(nyi khri): bam po gcig pa/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
1b4(nyi khri): 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
2a1(nyi khri): /khab kyi ri bya rgod 'phungs pa la/dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig ste/thams
2a2(nyi khri): cad kyang dgra bcom pa/thog pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang du gyur pa/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes
2a3(nyi khri): rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/cang shes pa/glang po chen po/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor ba/rang gi don rab
2a4(nyi khri): tu thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/bka' yang dag pos sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/sems kyi dbang
2a5(nyi khri): thams cad la pha rol tu phyin po'i mchog thob pa sha stag ste/gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/'di ltar slob pa rgyun tu
2b1(nyi khri): zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o//dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang /skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgyu tsam dang /dge bsnyen dang /
2b2(nyi khri): dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stagA dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ched med grangs med pa thams cang
2b3(nyi khri): kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/rtog pa med pa'i smon
2b4(nyi khri): lam dang ldan pa/chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob po/chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/thogs pa med
2b5(nyi khri): pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/bstan pa zad mi shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/mngon par shes pa chen pos
2b6(nyi khri): rnam par rtse ba/mngon par shes pa shin tu mnyams pa/mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/le lo med cing brtson 'grus
3a1(nyi khri): sems med pa/zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/ying
3a2(nyi khri): yongs su zhum pa med pa/bdud kyi lus thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/lus kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/las dang nyon mongs pa dang /phyir no/
3a3(nyi khri): byarab tu bcom pa/pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa//nyan thos dang mang srungs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka'o/
3a4(nyi khri): chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa bsgral pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/bzhin 'dzum pa
3a5(nyi khri): dang ldan po/sngod du smrab/khro ga nyir meng pa/spyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pal
3b1(nyi khri): mkhas pa/spobs pa mi chod pa/'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung ba la
3b2(nyi khri): mkhas pa/chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /chu zla dang /rmi lam dang /sgra brnyan dang /mig yor dang /nam mkha' dang /dri za'i grong khyer dang /sprul pa dang /gzugs
3b3(nyi khri): brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/sems yongs su zhum pa med pa/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang /shes pa phra ba dang /spyod pa dang /mos pa khong du chud par
3b4(nyi khri): bya ba la mkhas pa/sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye
3b5(nyi khri): shes la mkhas pa/chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba/rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa/los dang
3b6(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la
3b7(nyi khri): zhugs pa/lta ba dang /bag la nyal ba dang /kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
4a1(nyi khri): pa/las dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/chos thams cad sgra brnyan
4a2(nyi khri): dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mos pa/chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jigs pa med pa/bdag nyid ji lto ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/sangs rgyas
4a3(nyi khri): kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin
4a4(nyi khri): rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa/sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas pa/sems
4a5(nyi khri): can gyi lte ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la
4a6(nyi khri): mkhas pa/yon tan brjod pa bskalnga po mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /rin
4a7(nyi khri): chen 'byung gnas dang /rin chen snying po dang /rin chen byin pa dang /ded dpon dam pa dang /skyes bus byin dang /skyob sbeng dang /chu bdag lha dang dbang pos byin dang /bzang //
4b1(nyi khri): pa'i stobs dang /zla gros dam pa dang /'phags pa'i blo gros dang /bla gros 'phel ba dang /blo gros mtha' yas dang /don yod mthong ba dang /sgrib med zlo gas dang /rab tu zhugs pa dang /
4b2(nyi khri): mthu ma pas rnam par gnon pa dang /brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang /rtag tu brtson pa dang /rtag tu sbyor ba dang /mi gtong brtson pa dang /nyi ma'i snying po dang /zla ba'i snying po dang /blo gros
4b3(nyi khri): dpe med pa dang /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang /mthu chen po thob pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon nuraro gyur pa dang /bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang /rdo rje blo gros dang /lag na
4b4(nyi khri): rin chen phyag rgya ngo //rtag tu lag brkyang dang /snying rje cher sems dang /rgyun chen po dang /rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /ri bo'i zom dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
4b5(nyi khri): po byams pa dang /de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid
4b6(nyi khri): kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas sku drang por bsrong ste/dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so//de na bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams
4b7(nyi khri): cad 'du ba dang /khongs su chud pa dang /rjes su 'brang ba dang /'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go//de nas bcom
5a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so//de ltar
5a2(nyi khri): gzigs nas sku thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung
5a3(nyi khri): ngo//zhabs gnyis kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //zhabs kyi long bu gnyis dang /zhabs byin pa gnyis dang /zhabs pus mo gnyis dang /
5a4(nyi khri): zhabs brla gnyis dang /sku sta zur gnyis dang /sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /sku rtsib logs gnyis dang /thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshon dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag
5a5(nyi khri): khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //de bzhin du phyag lag ngar gnyis dang /sku phrag pa gnyis
5a6(nyi khri): dang /mgur dang /tshems mche ba bzhi dang /tshems bzhi bcu dang /spyan gnyis dang /snyan gnyis dang /shangs kyi sbubs gnyis dang /smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang /steng gi
5a7(nyi khri): spyi gtsug dang /zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ste/'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis/stong gsum
5b1(nyi khri): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//lho
5b2(nyi khri): dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos
5b3(nyi khri): khyab par byas so//sems can gang gis 'od zer de mthong ba dang /'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//
5b4(nyi khri): de nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//shar
5b5(nyi khri): phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng
5b6(nyi khri): gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa
5b7(nyi khri): de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//de nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum
6a1(nyi khri): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par
6a2(nyi khri): mdzad do//lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
6a3(nyi khri): snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang /'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
6a4(nyi khri): par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par
6a5(nyi khri): mdzad nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do//ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon te/'od zer de dag thams cad la pad+mo mang po/rin po che sna
6a6(nyi khri): tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/'dab ma stong dang ldan pa/sna tshogs su 'dug pa/blta na sdug pa/yid du 'ong ba/kha dog bzang ba/dri zhim pa/'jam pa/ka tsa
6a7(nyi khri): lin+di ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan
6b1(nyi khri): pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mdzad de/de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan
6b2(nyi khri): pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to//de dag lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig
6b3(nyi khri): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing /de dag tu byon nas kyang 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to//sems can gang
6b4(nyi khri): gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin
6b5(nyi khri): du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do//rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
6b6(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/g.yos so//rab tu g.yos so//kun tu g.yos so//'gul to//rab tu 'gul to/kun tu 'gul to//ldeg go/rab tu ldeg go/kun
6b7(nyi khri): tu ldeg go/chem chem/rab tu tshim chem/kun tu chem chem mo//'ur 'ur/rab tu 'ur 'ur/kun tu 'ur 'ur ro//shig shig/rab tu shig shig/kun tu shig shig go/
7a1(nyi khri): shar mthon ni nub dma'/nub mthon ni shar dma'/byang mthon ni lho dmal/lho mthon ni byang dma'//mtha' mthon ni dbus dma'/dbus mngon ni mtha' dpa' ste//
7a2(nyi khri): dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba skyed par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
7a3(nyi khri): rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /mi khom pa dang /ngan song dang /ngan 'gro dang /log par ltung ba gang ji snyed yod
7a4(nyi khri): pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur to//sems can de dag thams cad kyang /mi dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to//de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /sum
7a5(nyi khri): cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to//de nas lha de dag dang /mi de dag
7a6(nyi khri): dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom
7a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to//
7b1(nyi khri): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /phyogs mtshams rnams dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing
7b2(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/mi khom pa thams cad
7b3(nyi khri): kyang nub par gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so//de nas mi de dag dang /lha de dag dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde ba de nyid kyis
7b4(nyi khri): sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag/rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/de bzhin gshegs
7b5(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/zhabs la phyag btsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
7b6(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
7b7(nyi khri): cad kyang /mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to//'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to//smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to//sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug
8a1(nyi khri): pa mad pa'i sems thob par gyur to//gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to//dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to//bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur te/
8a2(nyi khri): sgom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to//nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nud med par gyur to//lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang shing rgyas par gyur
8a3(nyi khri): //ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur te/lus dang ngag dang /yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang /'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi
8a4(nyi khri): mtha' dang 'chi ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to//sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dper nu pa dang mA dang /phu nu dang sring mo dang mdza' ba dang gnyen pa dang /grogs
8a5(nyi khri): po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun du sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to//sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang /gtsang bya
8a6(nyi khri): dang /nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/mi dge bo'i rtogs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to//de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/dper na dge slong
8a7(nyi khri): bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to//de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur/
8b1(nyi khri): te/'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o//zhi ba ni dge ba'o//dul ba ni dge ba'o//sdom pa ni dge ba'o//dben pa ni dge ba'o//bag byed pa ni dge ba'o//byams pa ni dge ba'o//snying rje ni dge ba'o//tshangs par
8b2(nyi khri): spyod pa spyad pa ni dge ba'o//srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba 'di ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas 'di/
8b3(nyi khri): lta ste/dper na nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa'am/zla ba nya ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
8b4(nyi khri): 'di ri rab dang bcas pa/khor yug dang bcas pa/lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/dbang po dang bcas pa/dbang byed dang bcas pa/lha dang /lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang
8b5(nyi khri): bcas pa/gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/'od dang sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis mdzes shing /lham me/lhan ne/lhang nge'o//
8b6(nyi khri): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis mnan te/'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis mdzes shing /lham ma/
8b7(nyi khri): lhan ne/lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis mdzes shing /
9a1(nyi khri): l+h+wam mo//lhun na/snang der 'azugs so//de bzhin du khyod rlub dang byung dang byung shang dang shad b+h+yo dang ljon pa dang nu byung gi phyogs mtshams dang 'ag dang steng gi phyugs
9a2(nyi khri): kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te//'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis mdzes shing /lham me/lhan ne/lhang nger
9a3(nyi khri): bzhugs so//'di lta ste dper na/ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/lhan ne/lhang nge'o//'di lta ste dper na/zla ba'i
9a4(nyi khri): dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/lhan na/lhang nge'o//'di lta ste dper na/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad
9a5(nyi khri): zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing /lham me/lhan ne/lhang nge'o//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/dbang po dang bcas pa/tshangs pa
9a6(nyi khri): dang bcas pa/gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing /lham me/lhan ne/lhang
9a7(nyi khri): denge'o//de nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to//de nas stong
9b1(nyi khri): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang /kun snang dang ba dang /tshangs ris dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /'phrul dga' dang /dga'
9b2(nyi khri): ldan dang /mtshe ma dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de thams cad kyis//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
9b3(nyi khri): rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/dga' zhing spro ba dang /yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la nyams bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos
9b4(nyi khri): dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang /lha rdzas kyi ut+pa la dang /pad+mo dang /ku mu dA dang /puN+Da ri ka dang /na lin dang /sau gan+d+hi dang /lha rdzas kyi me tog ke sa ra dang /
9b5(nyi khri): tam la'i lo ma dang /lha rdzas kyi ni bza' dang /rgyan dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/me tog
9b6(nyi khri): dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /byug spos dang /ut+pal dang /pad+mo dang /ku mud dang /puN+Da ri ka dang /na lin dang /sau gan+d+hi dang /me tog ka sar dang /tam
9b7(nyi khri): la'i lo ma dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /rgyan dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /lha'i ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to//mngon par gtor to//mngon par rab tu
10a1(nyi khri): gtor to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang /snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang /thang las skyes
10a2(nyi khri): pa mang po khyer nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to//me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug po dang /phye ma la sogs pa
10a3(nyi khri): dang /na bza' dang /rgyan dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng
10a4(nyi khri): gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du ded de gnas par gyur to//khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi
10a5(nyi khri): me tog dang /dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to//mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to//rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to//me tog dang /dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
10a6(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang shin tu mdzes shing /lham me/lhan ne/lhang nger gyur to//
10a7(nyi khri): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab
10b1(nyi khri): cing gsal bar gyur to//lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
10b2(nyi khri): gi bye ma snyed kyang /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to//de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/
10b3(nyi khri): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du/nub kyi ba glang spyod
10b4(nyi khri): dang /shar gyi lus 'phags po dang /byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar dang /de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /stong
10b5(nyi khri): gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes
10b6(nyi khri): pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de
10b7(nyi khri): la bzhugs bzhin du/'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to//shar phyogs dang lho dang nub dang
11a1(nyi khri): byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu
11a2(nyi khri): snang bar gyur to//'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
11a3(nyi khri): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang
11a4(nyi khri): po mthong bar gyur to//shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
11a5(nyi khri): khams 'di na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang
11a6(nyi khri): thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to//de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi/
11a7(nyi khri): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
11b1(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to//de nas
11b2(nyi khri): shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
11b3(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
11b4(nyi khri): yang dag par ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de dang /sa
11b5(nyi khri): cher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
11b6(nyi khri): 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten
11b7(nyi khri): du byung ba dang /dog sa 'di ltar tshar g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
12a1(nyi khri): rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub phyogs logs
12a2(nyi khri): su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
12a3(nyi khri): thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub
12a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag
12a5(nyi khri): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen
12a6(nyi khri): bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang
12a7(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu
12b1(nyi khri): de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs
12b2(nyi khri): kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
12b3(nyi khri): thub pa de la/bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can
12b4(nyi khri): 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la pad+mo 'di dag gis
12b5(nyi khri): gtor cig/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar
12b6(nyi khri): dka' ba yin gyis/der nyams par gyur ta re/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
12b7(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung
13a1(nyi khri): ba dang /khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/shar phyogs kyi sangs
13a2(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang ni bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal
13a3(nyi khri): mtshan dang ba den dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /bkuro stir bya ba dang /bsti stang du bya ba dang /mchod pa byed cing /byang chub sems dpo'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub sems
13a4(nyi khri): dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dang ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das
13a5(nyi khri): kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/bcom
13a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/bcom ldan 'das la
13a7(nyi khri): spun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan
13b1(nyi khri): pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thu
13b2(nyi khri): pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der
13b3(nyi khri): gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di ltar pha rol tu phyin
13b4(nyi khri): pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to//chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang
13b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gris kyang /rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
13b6(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//bkur stir byas so//bsti stang du byas so//mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas lho phyogs log su 'jig
13b7(nyi khri): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par
14a1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dngal zhes bya ba bzhugs shang spyod s+ho/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams la shes rab kya pa rol tu phyin pa
14a2(nyi khri): 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams don byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de nga /sa
14a3(nyi khri): cher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
14a4(nyi khri): mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta
14a5(nyi khri): bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dogs 'di ltar tshor g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
14a6(nyi khri): gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams
14a7(nyi khri): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod do/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
14b1(nyi khri): zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems
14b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
14b3(nyi khri): der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
14b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag
14b5(nyi khri): blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/de nas de bzhin gshegs
14b6(nyi khri): pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/
14b7(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam
15a1(nyi khri): /za mdog pade'am/sku nyams drung ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyad dam zhes 'diH/bad+mog ser gyi mdog can 'dab ma sbyong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcomA ldan
15a2(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes gyis la/pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
15a3(nyi khri): bag yod par spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/der nyams par gyur tA re/
15a4(nyi khri): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal
15a5(nyi khri): de las/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig/
15a6(nyi khri): brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/me
15a7(nyi khri): tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang /bista stang
15b1(nyi khri): du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
15b2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang no ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub
15b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
15b4(nyi khri): mya ngan med pa'i dpal/bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste//
15b5(nyi khri): pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas
15b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
15b7(nyi khri): gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di ltar pha rol tu phyin
16a1(nyi khri): pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to//chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
16a2(nyi khri): byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de
16a3(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//bkur stir byas so//bsti stang du byas so//mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod
16a4(nyi khri): do//de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mi snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi bo zhes bya ba yod do//de na ngo bzhin gshegs pa dag
16a5(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
16a6(nyi khri): pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams do na byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de dang /
16a7(nyi khri): cher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na tshig mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od
16b1(nyi khri): 'phro gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dogs
16b2(nyi khri): 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phros/byang chub sems dpa'
16b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi
16b4(nyi khri): khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems
16b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/bcom ldan 'das
16b6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
16b7(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur
17a1(nyi khri): gyur pa/gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//
17a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros//
17a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/rigs kyi bu bcom
17a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog
17a5(nyi khri): bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin
17a6(nyi khri): chen 'od 'phros/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/de ci'i phyir/
17a7(nyi khri): zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/der nyams par gyur ta re/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
17b1(nyi khri): chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang
17b2(nyi khri): ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas
17b3(nyi khri): mi snang bar gyur nas/nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang /
17b4(nyi khri): byug pa dang /phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba dang /mchod pa byed cing /byang chub sems
17b5(nyi khri): dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin
17b6(nyi khri): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis
17b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro bcom ldan 'das la
18a1(nyi khri): snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong
18a2(nyi khri): dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
18a3(nyi khri): pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
18a4(nyi khri): /rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing //
18a5(nyi khri): 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to//chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
18a6(nyi khri): byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
18a7(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//bkur stir byas so//bsti stang du byas so//mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
18b1(nyi khri): de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
18b2(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par
18b3(nyi khri): ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de dang /sa tshor g.yos pa de dang /de
18b4(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der
18b5(nyi khri): song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dog sa 'di ltar
18b6(nyi khri): cher g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/byang
18b7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig
19a1(nyi khri): rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de
19a2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin
19a3(nyi khri): gyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
19a4(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher
19a5(nyi khri): gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug po thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//
19a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos//
19a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan
19b1(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang
19b2(nyi khri): ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/bcom ldan
19b3(nyi khri): 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes
19b4(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/der nyams par gyur ta re/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis//
19b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub
19b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
19b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang po
20a1(nyi khri): ngan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen
20a2(nyi khri): pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag
20a3(nyi khri): btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to///
20a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo
20a5(nyi khri): mdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
20a6(nyi khri): gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/byang phyogs
20a7(nyi khri): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par
20b1(nyi khri): khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to//chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis
20b2(nyi khri): thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs
20b3(nyi khri): su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//bkur stir
20b4(nyi khri): byas so//bsti stang du byas so//mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'ongs pa kun gyi pha
20b5(nyi khri): rol na/'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i
20b6(nyi khri): dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig
20b7(nyi khri): rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de dang /sa tsher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin
21a1(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang
21a2(nyi khri): po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen
21a3(nyi khri): po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dog sa 'di ltar char g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
21a4(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka'
21a5(nyi khri): stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de
21a6(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
21a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
21b1(nyi khri): gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
21b2(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal char gzhon nur gyur
21b3(nyi khri): pa gzungs dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das ting nge
21b4(nyi khri): 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/
21b5(nyi khri): bam po gnyis pa//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu
21b6(nyi khri): las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/
21b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma steng dang ldan pa
22a1(nyi khri): 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/
22a2(nyi khri): pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
22a3(nyi khri): dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ta re/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
22a4(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub
22a5(nyi khri): sems dpa'a'i khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/byang shar
22a6(nyi khri): gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na
22a7(nyi khri): bzo' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkuro stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub
22b1(nyi khri): sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
22b2(nyi khri): gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/bcom ldan 'das
22b3(nyi khri): shAkya thub po la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal/bcom ldan 'das la
22b4(nyi khri): snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag
22b5(nyi khri): kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
22b6(nyi khri): pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
22b7(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po
23a1(nyi khri): bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to//chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kA na/
23a2(nyi khri): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i
23a3(nyi khri): babs/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//bkur stir byas so//bsti stang du byas so//mchod pa byas nas phyogs
23a4(nyi khri): gcig tu 'khod do//de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jog rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid
23a5(nyi khri): du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems
23a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na
23a7(nyi khri): pad+mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de dang sa tshor g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
23b1(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to//
23b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /
23b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
23b4(nyi khri): logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
23b5(nyi khri): shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub
23b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
23b7(nyi khri): mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa
24a1(nyi khri): gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//bcom
24a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa'
24a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
24a4(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde
24a5(nyi khri): ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/bcom ldan
24a6(nyi khri): 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes
24a7(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/der nyams par gyur ta re/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/bcom
24b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de las/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa'
24b2(nyi khri): khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas
24b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang /phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba ngan dag gis
24b4(nyi khri): rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba dang /mchod par byed cing /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
24b5(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig
24b6(nyi khri): tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
24b7(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal/bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog bde 'am/sku nyams
25a1(nyi khri): dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
25a2(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
25a3(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa
25a4(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de
25a5(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to//chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag
25a6(nyi khri): thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag
25a7(nyi khri): gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//bkur stir
25b1(nyi khri): byas so//bsti stang du byas so//mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig
25b2(nyi khri): rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de//de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho
25b3(nyi khri): skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems
25b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de dang /sa cher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das
25b5(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
25b6(nyi khri): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
25b7(nyi khri): pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
26a1(nyi khri): snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
26a2(nyi khri): logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
26a3(nyi khri): rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas
26a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang
26a5(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen
26a6(nyi khri): bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang
26a7(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal
26b1(nyi khri): pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal
26b2(nyi khri): gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/rigs kyi
26b3(nyi khri): bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog bde
26b4(nyi khri): 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba drang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i
26b5(nyi khri): dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par
26b6(nyi khri): spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/der nyams par gyur ta ra/de nas byang chub
26b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i ngo la
27a1(nyi khri): las/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u drang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig
27a2(nyi khri): brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag
27a3(nyi khri): thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang /phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang
27a4(nyi khri): bsti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par
27a5(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang ni ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod
27a6(nyi khri): nas/byang chub snyoms dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
27a7(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal/bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang
27b1(nyi khri): ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
27b2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
27b3(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
27b4(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gos 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs
27b5(nyi khri): shing /'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to//chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
27b6(nyi khri): byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
27b7(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//bkur stir byas so/bsti stang du byas so//mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
28a1(nyi khri): de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na
28a2(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab
28a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen
28a4(nyi khri): po de dang sa cher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das gdugs dam pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
28a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dog sa 'di
28a6(nyi khri): ltar cher g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas/byang
28a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
28b1(nyi khri): 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang
28b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/
28b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
28b4(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher
28b5(nyi khri): gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//bcom
28b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
28b7(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan
29a1(nyi khri): pa stong bskur te/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/bcom ldan 'das snyun mi
29a2(nyi khri): mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang
29a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par
29a4(nyi khri): spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/der nyams par gyur ta re/de nas byang
29a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las/pad+mo/
29a6(nyi khri): gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang
29a7(nyi khri): 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me
29b1(nyi khri): tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang /phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing byang
29b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin
29b3(nyi khri): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/
29b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa/bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/
29b5(nyi khri): gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo mdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das
29b6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
29b7(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi
30a1(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad
30a2(nyi khri): rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to//chos bstan pa de
30a3(nyi khri): sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang
30a4(nyi khri): bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim
30a5(nyi khri): gror byas so//bkur stir byas so//bsti stang du byas so//mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun
30a6(nyi khri): gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/
30a7(nyi khri): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams don byang chub sems dpa'o sems
30b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de dang /sa cher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
30b2(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i
30b3(nyi khri): dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i
30b4(nyi khri): rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
30b5(nyi khri): pad+mo dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di nas steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na
30b6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha
