87b3(nyi khri): rnams la skom dang /bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhin pa dang /me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang mel stan dang gos dang rgyan dang 'tsho ba dang khyim 'dod pa rnams la
87b4(nyi khri): khyim gyis yongs su sdud cing 'tsho ba'i yo byad skyon med pa yongs su bsgrub pa dag kyang yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdom pa
87b5(nyi khri): la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do//bzod po'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/sems can rnams khro ba med pa dang /gnod sems med pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do//brtson
87b6(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/sems can rnams dge bo'i chos thams cad la mngon par brtson pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
87b7(nyi khri): lhur byas te/sems can rnams zhi gnas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang /'dod pa las dben pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te//sems
88a1(nyi khri): can rnams chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par 'god pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol
88a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul te/sems can dmyal ba'i
88a3(nyi khri): sems can rnams dang /byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i
88a4(nyi khri): phyir chos ston pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de
88a5(nyi khri): 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
88a6(nyi khri): rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /chos nyan tsong byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /de dag sangs
88a7(nyi khri): rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su bsgrub cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub
88b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do//de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og
88b2(nyi khri): dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'dong zhing /sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur
88b3(nyi khri): byed pa dang /chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan
88b4(nyi khri): mo yongs su bzung ste/de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su bsgrub cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
88b5(nyi khri): tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/mi chen
88b6(nyi khri): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas te/dbang po gusapa zhing yongs su dag pa dang ljon par gyur nas/de dag lus yongs su dag pa de dag gis skye bo mang po dga' ba dang
88b7(nyi khri): mos pa bskyed de/de dag 'gro ba mang po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang /sems can de dag kyang sems mos par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mthor gyis theg pa gsum
89a1(nyi khri): gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
89a2(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshe/lus yongs su dag pa dang drag yongs su dag pa dang yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha
89a3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba thob nas/de dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis bdag mi bstod cing gzhan mi smod pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
89a4(nyi khri): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /phyir mi
89a5(nyi khri): ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dbul bar mi 'gyur zhing /log par 'gro ba dang ngan song du mi ltung ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
89a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du/nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi gtong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang/
89a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/de dag dge
89b1(nyi khri): ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang /sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pas sems can yongs su sdud pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
89b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su bzung ste/'khor los sgyur
89b3(nyi khri): ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong du mo la gnas shing de la gnas nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams
89b4(nyi khri): cad dang /mchod pa sna tshogs kyis/rim gro dang bkur sti dang bsti stong dang mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
89b5(nyi khri): po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /sems can log par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang bar byed cing bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag
89b6(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de'ang nam yang 'bral bar mi byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems
89b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par byung ba yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
90a1(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshe/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams kyi go mi dbye'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/
90a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /ngag gi las kha na mtho
90a3(nyi khri): ba dang bcas pa dang /yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
90a4(nyi khri): po 'di snyam du sems shing /'di ni lus yin gyis des ni lus kyi las shig brtsam/'di ni ngag yin gyis des ni ngag gi las shig brtsam/'di ni yid yin gyis des ni yid
90a5(nyi khri): kyi las shig brtsam snyam na/de ni shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rtsom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
90a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni lus gang dang ngag gang dang yid gang gis 'dzungs pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/tshul khrims
90a7(nyi khri): ngan pa'i sems bskyed pa'am/gnod sems kyi sems bskyed pa'o ma le lo'i sems bskyed pa 'am/'khrug pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/shes rob 'chal pa'i sems
90b1(nyi khri): bskyed par bya ba de lta bu'i lus mi dmigs so//ngag mi dmigs so//sems mi dmigs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
90b2(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa tsam du'ang shes par mi bya ste/de ni gnas med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems
90b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa'
90b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi
90b5(nyi khri): gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang /ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang /yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu
90b6(nyi khri): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs pa dang /ngag dang sems mi dmigs pa de'i tshe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang ngag dang /
90b7(nyi khri): yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
91a1(nyi khri): rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas shing /nyan thos kyi sems sam rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa med par de rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can thams cad la
91a2(nyi khri): snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar gzhog na/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag pa zhes ngas bshad do//shA
91a3(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong zhing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang //tshul
91a4(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
91a5(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
91a6(nyi khri): pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam lus la dmigs pa med pa dang /ngag dang yid la dmigs pa med pa dang /
91a7(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
91b1(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs
91b2(nyi khri): pa med pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med par gyur pa de ni/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
91b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/de ltar chos thams cad la dmigs pa med cing blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
91b4(nyi khri): po lam de lta bus pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing nan tan du byed pa de dag ni sus kyang thub pa med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
91b5(nyi khri): tshul ji lta bur spyod pa rnams thub pa ma mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
91b6(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la rlom sems med pa dang /mig dang gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang //
91b7(nyi khri): rna ba dang sgra dang sna dang dri dang lce dang ro dang lus dang reg bya dang yid dang chos la rlom sems med pa dang /sa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams
92a1(nyi khri): dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /mig gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /
92a2(nyi khri): gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /rna ba'i khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna'i
92a3(nyi khri): khams dang /dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lce'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lus kyi khams
92a4(nyi khri): dang /reg bya'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /yid kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /chos kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /yid kyi
92a5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rlom sems med pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /tshul
92a6(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
92a7(nyi khri): la rlom sems med pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la rlom sems med pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi/
92b1(nyi khri): dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
92b2(nyi khri): brgyad pa la rlom sems med pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs
92b3(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom sems med pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /
92b4(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la rlom sems med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom
92b5(nyi khri): sems med pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems med pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /
92b6(nyi khri): snying rje chen po drung /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la rlom sems med pa dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
92b7(nyi khri): dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /rang byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /
93a1(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang /'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems med par gyur pa de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa'
93a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba yin te sus kyang thub pa med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu
93a3(nyi khri): phyin pa drug la gnas te/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /ye shes de dang ldan pas nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye/mi dbul zhing phongs
93a4(nyi khri): pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur te/lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba
93a5(nyi khri): dag kyang yod do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/byang chub sems
93a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang /mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang mi dang lha
93a7(nyi khri): ma yin gyi nang na/smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
93b1(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
93b2(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo //chos kyang nyan to//byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par
93b3(nyi khri): phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de
93b4(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo //chos kyang nyan to//byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs
93b5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do//chos kyi 'du
93b6(nyi khri): shes dang dge 'dun gyi 'du shes mi skyed do//nyan thos kyi 'du shes dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes dang /sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi
93b7(nyi khri): skyed do//bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed do//gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do//ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
94a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/tshul khrims kyi pha
94a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod de/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/brtson 'grus
94a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
94a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid bsgom ste/nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom ste/dngos
94a5(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /
94a6(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom ste/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa
94a7(nyi khri): rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas
94b1(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom ste/mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so//
94b2(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom ste/gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
94b3(nyi khri): par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so///
94b4(nyi khri): rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bsgom ste/rnam
94b5(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
94b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
94b7(nyi khri): ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang /yongs su sbyong ba yod do//lnga gang zhe na/'di lta
95a1(nyi khri): ste/sha'i mig dang /lha'i mig dang /shes rab kyi mig dang /chos kyi mig dang /sangs rgyas kyi mig go/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub
95a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
95a3(nyi khri): sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya dang /sum brgya dang /bzhi brgya dang /
95a4(nyi khri): lnga brgya dang /stong gi bar du mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do//sha'i mig gis gling gnyis dang /
95a5(nyi khri): gling gsum dang /gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do//sha'i mig gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do//sha'i mig gis stong gnyis
95a6(nyi khri): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba
95a7(nyi khri): yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
95b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub
95b2(nyi khri): sems dpas rab tu shes so//sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe me dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa
95b3(nyi khri): kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge
95b4(nyi khri): rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /'og min gyi lha rnams
95b5(nyi khri): kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i
95b6(nyi khri): ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /mtsho ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /
95b7(nyi khri): tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /
96a1(nyi khri): tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /
96a2(nyi khri): nom snang ba dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes te/lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
96a3(nyi khri): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so//lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi
96a4(nyi khri): phyogs re re zhing /'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye bo rab tu shes so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
96a5(nyi khri): chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags//
96a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas/'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas sam
96a7(nyi khri): dge ba'am/mi dge ba 'am/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/kha na ma tho ba med pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am/'jig
96b1(nyi khri): rten pa 'am 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/zag pa dang bcas pa'am/zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med pa dang /shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas/chos gang yang
96b2(nyi khri): ma mthong ba 'am/ma thos pa 'am/ma bsams pa 'am/khong du ma chud pa med pa 'di ni/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs
96b3(nyi khri): su dag pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA
96b4(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba/gang zag 'di ni stong
96b5(nyi khri): pa nyid la gnas pa ste/gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro//dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//de ma
96b6(nyi khri): thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro//rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas/'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /the tshom dang tshul
96b7(nyi khri): khrims dang /brtul zhugs snyoms pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/gang zag 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o//des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/'dod
97a1(nyi khri): pa'i 'dod chags dang //gnod sems rab tu srabs par byed de//gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas//
97a2(nyi khri): 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed do//gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o//de la ma de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/gzugs kyi
97a3(nyi khri): 'dod chags dang /gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /ma rig pa dang /nga rgyal dang rgod pa rab tu spong ste/gang zag 'di ni dag bcom pa'o//gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste//gang
97a4(nyi khri): zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro//dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
97a5(nyi khri): gyis/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ba nos/gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'i bar zhes bya'o//gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pas/'di'i
97a6(nyi khri): dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro//dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye
97a7(nyi khri): shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas/gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du rab tu shes te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
97b1(nyi khri): chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ci yang rung ste/kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'gag pa'i chos can no//
97b2(nyi khri): zhes bya bar shes pas/dbang po lnga thob par 'gyur te/'di ni shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
97b3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha
97b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
97b5(nyi khri): de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang ldan te/thabs mkhas pas ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin to//dge ba'i rtsa bas bstan pas byang chub sems dpa'
97b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o//bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i
97b7(nyi khri): nang du skye'o//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye'o//mtshe ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o//dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye'o//'phrul dga'i lha'i nang du skye'o//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i
98a1(nyi khri): nang du skye'o//de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro//
98a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//rim gro dang /
98a3(nyi khri): bkur sti dang bsti stang dang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang
98a4(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
98a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni//
98a6(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o//'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o//'di ni nges pa'o//'di ni mi nges pa'o//'di ni lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o//
98a7(nyi khri): 'di ni lung bstan par mi 'gyur pa'o//'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ste dbang thob pa'o//'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa ste dbang ma thob pa'o//'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su
98b1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'o//'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
98b2(nyi khri): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do//rim gro dang bkur sti dang bsti stang dang mchod pa
98b3(nyi khri): byed do//lha dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin
98b4(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do//rim gro dang bkur sti dang /bosti stang dang mchod pa byed de/'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob
98b5(nyi khri): par 'gyur ro//'dis ni mngon par shes pa 'thob par mi 'gyur ro//'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o//'di ni bzod pa thob pa ma yin no//'di ni dbang thob pa'o//'di ni dbang thob pa ma
98b6(nyi khri): yin no//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub
98b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o//'di ni smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa'o//'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so//'dis ni sems
99a1(nyi khri): can yongs su smin par ma byas so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas
99a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams legs par brjod pa mdzad do//'di la ni legs par brjod pa mi mdzad do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom
99a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro//'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu
99a4(nyi khri): med par 'gyur ro//'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro//'di'i 'od dang dbyangs dang dge slong gi dge 'dun ni tshad med par 'gyur ro//'di ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro//byang chub
99a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par
99a6(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//'di ni ldan par mi 'gyur ro//'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro//'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur ro//'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o//'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no//'di ni
99a7(nyi khri): snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro//'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par 'gyur ro//'di dag la ni bdud
99b1(nyi khri): yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/de ltar na shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das/
99b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
99b3(nyi khri): chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa
99b4(nyi khri): yin/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /
99b5(nyi khri): btang snyoms chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin/de ni de'i mig ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mig de dang ldan pas/
99b6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba 'am/ma thos pa 'am/ma shes pa 'am/khong du ma chud pa gang yang med de/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
99b7(nyi khri): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
100a1(nyi khri): chen po mig lnga yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pa dang /thob par 'dod pas/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar pha rol
100a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/nyan thos kyi chos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
100a3(nyi khri): ma 'dus pa med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu la la zhig yang dag par smra bas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par brjod pa zhig tu dgos na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par
100a4(nyi khri): smra bas brjod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang mig lnga po 'di dag skyed pa'o//mig lnga po de dag la bslabs
100a5(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
100a6(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste/rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do//de ni sa chen po 'di'ang rab tu
100a7(nyi khri): g.yo bar byed do//gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro//mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro//snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed do//rtsig pa las thal
100b1(nyi khri): bdang rab las thal ba dang /ri las thal bar thogs pa med pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste/dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no//nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/dper na 'dug
100b2(nyi khri): chags bya bzhin no//sa la'ang gyen du 'byung ba dang /'og tu 'dzul bar byed de/dper na tshul bya ba bzhin no//chu la'ang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no//
100b3(nyi khri): du bar 'thul zhing mer 'bar te/dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no//nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che le/'di ltar mthu che zhing /'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas
100b4(nyi khri): byugs shing /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur te/rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang rang bzhin gyis dben
100b5(nyi khri): pa dang /rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/des rdzu 'phrul gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu mi dmigs te/de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par
100b6(nyi khri): rdzu 'phrul lam/rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
100b7(nyi khri): tshe/rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no//de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/lha dang mi gnyis
101a1(nyi khri): kwa'i sgra thos te/lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do//de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa dang /rang bzhin dben pa dang /
101a2(nyi khri): rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/rna ba dang sgra dmigs pa med de/de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba'i khams la bsam pa yang mi skyed do//shA ra dwa
101a3(nyi khri): ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon
101a4(nyi khri): par bsgrub pa yin no////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po drug pa//des sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi
101a5(nyi khri): sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la/'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
101a6(nyi khri): rab tu shes so//'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la
101a7(nyi khri): zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//zhe sdang med pa'i sems la zhe sdang med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
101b1(nyi khri): shes so//gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i
101b2(nyi khri): sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//sred
101b3(nyi khri): pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems
101b4(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//nye bar len pa med pa'i sems la nye bar len pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//kun nas
101b5(nyi khri): 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag
101b6(nyi khri): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rgya chung ngu'i sems la rgya chung ngu'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rgya che ba'i sems la rgya che ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang
101b7(nyi khri): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//che bar gyur pa'i sems la che bor gyur
102a1(nyi khri): pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshad med pa'i sems la tshad med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
102a2(nyi khri): shes so//mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam
102a3(nyi khri): par ma bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
102a4(nyi khri): tu shes so//rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la rnam par ma grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas
102a5(nyi khri): pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//zag pa med pa'i sems la zag pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
102a6(nyi khri): nyon mongs su dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la nyon mongs
102a7(nyi khri): pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//blo na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
102b1(nyi khri): bla na med pa'i sems la bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/gzhan gyi sems shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba'ang med do//de ni 'di ltar
102b2(nyi khri): sems de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/de ni bdag gis shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang /rang bzhin dben pa dang /rang bzhin ma skyes
102b3(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems mi dmigs te/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sems shes par bya ba'i bsam pa 'am/sems
102b4(nyi khri): shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems
102b5(nyi khri): can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no//de ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes
102b6(nyi khri): pa'i ye shes rnam pa du ma mngon par bsgrub ste/sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/sems brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no//nyi ma gcig nas nyi ma brgya dang /zla ba gcig nas zla ba brgya
102b7(nyi khri): dang /lo gcig nas lo brgya dang /bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa brgya dang /bskal pa brgya phrag du ma nas bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
103a1(nyi khri): dum rjes su dran te/bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ming ni 'dri zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/yun
103a2(nyi khri): ni 'di srid gcig tu 'dug 'dug/tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas/cho ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/de nas shi 'phos nas ni
103a3(nyi khri): 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/gtan tshigs dang bcas/dan rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te/sngon gyi
103a4(nyi khri): gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do//de ni 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te bsam gyis mi khyab
103a5(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/de ni bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de/'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa dang /rang bzhin dben pa dang /rang bzhin ma skyes
103a6(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mi dmigs so//de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi don
103a7(nyi khri): du bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran
103b1(nyi khri): pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no//de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba dang /
103b2(nyi khri): kha dog sdug po dang /kha dog mi sdug pa dang /bzang ba dang /ngan pa dang /ngan song na gnas pa dang /bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis
103b3(nyi khri): ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba rnams te/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis
103b4(nyi khri): lus zhig nas ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba drag tu skye'o//sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang
103b5(nyi khri): ldan/yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba rnams te/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/bde 'gro mtho ris kyo 'jig
103b6(nyi khri): rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gis 'gro ba
103b7(nyi khri): drug tu gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do//de ni 'di ltar mig de mig ma yin zhing bsam gyis
104a1(nyi khri): mi khyab pa'i phyir te/de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang /rang bzhin dben pa dang /rang bzhin ma skyes
104a2(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i mig de lta bu des mi dmigs te/de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i mig bsam pa 'am/lha'i mig mngon
104a3(nyi khri): par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /lha'i mig mngon du bya
104a4(nyi khri): ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no//de ni zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub kyang /nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
104a5(nyi khri): rgyas kyis thob par mi byed do//gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang yang mi mthong ngo //de mngon par shes pa des kyang rdo rje lta
104a6(nyi khri): bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong bar byed de/zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa des rlom sems
104a7(nyi khri): su 'gyur ba med do//de ni 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/de bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//de'ang 'di
104b1(nyi khri): ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang /rang bzhin dben pa dang /rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa de
104b2(nyi khri): lta bu mi dmigs so//de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi bsam pa 'am/zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub
104b3(nyi khri): pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do//de ltar shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba mngon par
104b4(nyi khri): shes pa'i ye shes mngon por bsgrub pa yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod cing /mngon par shes pa
104b5(nyi khri): drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'phel lo//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
104b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir chags pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung nas rnam pa thams
104b7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam spyod pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshul
105a1(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ltung ba bya ba med par nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
105a2(nyi khri): nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bzod pa'i pho
105a3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/mi 'khrug pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa
105a4(nyi khri): ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /mtha' las 'das
105a5(nyi khri): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus mi gzhig pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam skyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang
105a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
105a7(nyi khri): nyid kyi phyir/'khrug pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
105b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/shes rab 'chal bar
105b2(nyi khri): sems mi dmigs pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
105b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa nye bar bzung ba dang //
105b4(nyi khri): yongs su 'dzin pa med pa nyo bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba yin no//de la sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so//
105b5(nyi khri): tshul khrims ni tshul khrims ngan pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so//bzod pa ni 'khrug pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so//brtson 'grus ni le lo nye bar bzung ba las gdags so//
105b6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so//shes rab ni shes rab 'chal pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so//de ni rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems
105b7(nyi khri): med do//ma rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//sbyin pa byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//sbyin pa mi byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//tshul khrims dang ldan
106a1(nyi khri): no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//tshul khrims ngan pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//bzod pa phun sum tshogs so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//
106a2(nyi khri): khro ba can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//le lo can no zhes bya bar rlom sems mdo do//mnyam par bzhag
106a3(nyi khri): pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o zhes bya ba ro rlom sems med do//shes rab dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//shes rab 'chal pa
106a4(nyi khri): can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//
106a5(nyi khri): rim gro ma byos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ma skyes pa ni spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//phyog byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems
106a6(nyi khri): med do//rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//rim gro mu byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
106a7(nyi khri): rlom sems thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir te/'di la shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yon
106b1(nyi khri): tan ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med de/de yon tan 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed//
106b2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
106b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems bskyed de/sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu
106b4(nyi khri): 'thob bo//chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob nas/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu 'god do//de ni tshe 'di nyid la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
106b5(nyi khri): rnams kyi thugs su byon cing dben par bya ba yin te/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /nyan thos thams cad dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yid du 'ong zhing dben par bya ba
106b6(nyi khri): yin no//de ni skye bo gang dang gang du skyos kyang /de dang de dag tu nam yang mig gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs mi mthong ngo //rna bos yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos so//snas yid du mi
106b7(nyi khri): 'ong ba'i dri mi tshor ro//lces yid du mi 'ong ba'i ro mi myong ngo //lus kyis yid du mi 'ong ba'i reg bya mi reg go/yid kyis yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnam par rig pa med do//shA ra dwa ti'i
107a1(nyi khri): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams
107a2(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/dge slong sum brgyas gos gyon gyon pa/bcom ldan 'das la yon du gsol te/bla na med pa
107a3(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/dge slong rnams kyi bsam pa mekhyen nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe
107a4(nyi khri): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ston de las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su
107a5(nyi khri): thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu
107a6(nyi khri): dang rkyen mo mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
107a7(nyi khri): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa gcig 'das nas/bskal pa dpe skar ma lte bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
107b1(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal chen po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
107b2(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi skul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyo'o//'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag drug cus kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/de
107b3(nyi khri): dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro//de nyid du rab tu byung nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur te/
107b4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa des kyang /de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mthus/de'i tshe 'khor
107b5(nyi khri): bzhi po de dag 'di na 'khod bzhin du/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong mthong bar gyur to//lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi
107b6(nyi khri): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong mthong bar gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba gang ji lta bur
107b7(nyi khri): mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba de dag kyang /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na yod par ma mthong ngo //de nas 'khor de'i nang nas srog tshogs stong phrag
108a1(nyi khri): bcus bdag cag gis las gang byas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las spyad par bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo//de nas bcom ldan
108a2(nyi khri): 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/
108a3(nyi khri): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
108a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad no//ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/bcom ldan 'das kyis
108a5(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun
108a6(nyi khri): dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phros nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
108a7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang yang nam du'ang mi 'bral te/phyi ma'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba sha/
108b1(nyi khri): stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal chen po'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /tshe dang ldan pa shes pa'i bu gang po
108b2(nyi khri): dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /dge slong gzhan dag kyang kun gyis mngon par shes pa shin tu mang bdag dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu mang ba dag dang /
108b3(nyi khri): dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol
108b4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa ni 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems
108b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yangs pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dam pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rab bo//pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phul lo//pha rol tu
108b6(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni mchog go/pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gya nom pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzang po'o//pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na ma mchis pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lhag na
108b7(nyi khri): mi mchis pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa 'od ni mnyam pa ma mchis pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam po'o//pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o//pha rol tu
109a1(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
109a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do//bcom
109a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
109a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
109a5(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
109a6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa thub pa ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/mi mnyam pa dang
109a7(nyi khri): mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su btang ngo //yongs su gtong ngo //yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
109b1(nyi khri): rdzogs par gyur to//yongs su rdzogs so//yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//
109b2(nyi khri): de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das shes rab
109b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims bsrungs so//bsrung ngo //srung bar 'gyur ro//
109b4(nyi khri): de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//yongs su rdzogs so//yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam
109b5(nyi khri): pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
109b6(nyi khri): thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/mi mnyam
109b7(nyi khri): pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa bsgoms so//bsgom mo//sgom par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mo mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//
110a1(nyi khri): yongs su rdzogs so//yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//de'i
110a2(nyi khri): slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das shes rab
110a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams so//brtsom mo//rtsom par 'gyur ro//
110a4(nyi khri): de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//yongs su rdzogs so//yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi
110a5(nyi khri): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
110a6(nyi khri): byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni
110a7(nyi khri): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan bskyed do//bskyed do//skyed par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyamo pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur
110b1(nyi khri): to//yongs su rdzogs so//yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to//zab bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa
110b2(nyi khri): dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thab par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri
110b3(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms so//bsgom mo//sgom par 'gyur ro//de'i
110b4(nyi khri): slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//yongs su rdzogs so//yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang
110b5(nyi khri): mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob
110b6(nyi khri): par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs brnyes
110b7(nyi khri): par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa brnyes par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub
111a1(nyi khri): du mngon par byang chub nas/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to//'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /ma byon
111a2(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/mi mnyam pa dang
111a3(nyi khri): mnyam pa'i gzugs brnyes par gyur to//brnyes so//brnyes par 'gyur ro//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang mi monyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par
111a4(nyi khri): shes pa brnyes par gyur to//brnyes so//brnyes par 'gyur ro//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
111a5(nyi khri): bskor bar gyur to//bskor ro//skor bar 'gyur ro//de lta lpags pas//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par
111a6(nyi khri): 'tshal bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa
111a7(nyi khri): de dag ni/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba legs so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad
111b1(nyi khri): dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa bzhin no//byung
111b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa'o//de ci'i
111b3(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/mi'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//lha'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyal rigs che
111b4(nyi khri): zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /
111b5(nyi khri): sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor
111b6(nyi khri): dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /
111b7(nyi khri): che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /'og min gyi lha
112a1(nyi khri): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyan tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams
112a2(nyi khri): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig
112a3(nyi khri): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /bzhon pa dang /gos dang /mal cha dang khyim dang
112a4(nyi khri): 'tsho ba dang nor bu dang mu tig dang dung dang man shol dang /byu ru dang gser dang dngul dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dag sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo
112a5(nyi khri): byad mi'i rkyen dang /lha rdzas su bya ba 'am yang dag par bral ba'i bde ba'ang rung ste/de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na 'jig rten du 'byung bar
112a6(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/bdag sbyin pa yongs su
112a7(nyi khri): gtong zhing gzhan yang sbyin pa la sbyor ro//bdag tshul khrims bsrung zhing gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro//bdago bzod pa bsgom zhing gzhan yang bzod pa la sbyor ro//bdag brtson 'grus
112b1(nyi khri): brtsom zhing gzhan yang brtson 'grus la sbyor ro//bdag bsam gtan bskyed cing gzhan yang bsam gtan la sbyor ro//bdag shes rab bsgom zhing gzhan yang shes rab bsgom pa la
112b2(nyi khri): sbyor ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas/'jig rten dang 'jig
112b3(nyi khri): rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob bo//rigs kyi bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i
112b4(nyi khri): don du zhugs pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par mdzad do//
112b5(nyi khri): de nas de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma dang kha dog sna tshogs su ldan pa mang po byung bar gyur to//de byung nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
112b6(nyi khri): bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to//lho dang nub dang byang dang byang sher dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /'jig rten gyi khams
112b7(nyi khri): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to//de nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
113a1(nyi khri): gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
113a2(nyi khri): 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltams pa 'di lta bu su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'di nas
113a3(nyi khri): nub phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs
113a4(nyi khri): te/des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/'jig rten gyi
113a5(nyi khri): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i
113a6(nyi khri): phyir/phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i bar du 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
113a7(nyi khri): po de dog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na bdag cag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
113b1(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang de la phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de
113b2(nyi khri): dag kyang blta ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mnyam pa'i slad du mchi'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la bab par shes
113b3(nyi khri): na deng song zhig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs la sbyi
113b4(nyi khri): bos phyag btsal nas/lan bdun du g.yas phyogs nas skor ba byas te/phyogs bcu nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba dan dang /me tog dang phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang bdug pa
113b5(nyi khri): dadang phyi ma dang na bza' dang gser gyi me tog dang dngul gyi me tog la sogs pa rnam pa du ma khyer te/glu dang rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba mang pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
113b6(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de gang na ba der 'dong ngo //de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga'
113b7(nyi khri): ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /
114a1(nyi khri): chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /
114a2(nyi khri): tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /gnas gtsang ma pa shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyang lha
114a3(nyi khri): rdzas kyi me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang /pad+mo dang ku mud dang puN+Da ri ka dang /lha rdzas kyi me
114a4(nyi khri): tog man+dA ra ba dang man+dA ra ba chen po dang ke sa ra dang ta ma la'i lo ma mang po khyer te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
114a5(nyi khri): thub pa gang na ba der dong ste/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /lha de dag gis me tog dang phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang bdug pa dang phye ma dang na bza'
114a6(nyi khri): dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba dan de dag gis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub po de la gtor to///
114a7(nyi khri): mngon par gtor to//de nas me tog la sogs pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/me tog gi khang pa
114b1(nyi khri): brtsegs pa/gru bzhi ka ba bzhi dang ldan pa/cha kun tu mnyam pa/shin tu rnam par phye ba/mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar red de 'dug go//de nas 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags bye ba
114b2(nyi khri): khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo//de nas de dag stan las langs nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas btud de/bcom ldan
114b3(nyi khri): 'dis la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang
114b4(nyi khri): brnyes par gyur pa'i chos kyi rnam pa de lta bu thams cad thob par gyur te/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'di lta bu ni yongs su bsdu bar bgyi'o//da ltar 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas chos
114b5(nyi khri): ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du/'khor 'di dang 'dra bar chos bstan par bgyi'o zhes smon lam btab bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud
114b6(nyi khri): de/chos thams cad la skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /'byung ba med pa la bzod par gyur pa mkhyen nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas
114b7(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas btud do//
115a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ci'i
115a2(nyi khri): rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo 'khor 'di'i nang nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis mi skye ba'i
115a3(nyi khri): chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//de dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na bskal pa me tog gi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba la/de bzhin
115a4(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi yan lag me tog ces bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
115a5(nyi khri): pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/shA ri'i bu'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
115a6(nyi khri): khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsom ste/ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab
115a7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs pa skyed cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /nyan thos chen po
115b1(nyi khri): dedag dang /lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di rang gi shes rab dang spobs pa tsam gyi stobs dang shugs kyi go ces/byang chub sems dpa' sems
115b2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston tam/'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston par 'gyur snyam pa dang /de nas tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor gyis/sangs rgyas kyi
115b3(nyi khri): mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po de dag dang /nyan thos chen po de dag dang /lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/
115b4(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni gang ci smra'ang rung /gang ci ston kyang rung /gang ci brjod kyang rung ste/de
115b5(nyi khri): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o//de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bstan pa de thams cad kyang chos nyid dang mi 'gal lo//de ltar rigs kyi bu de dag ni chos bstan pa de la
115b6(nyi khri): slob cing /chos nyid de lta bu mngon du byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
115b7(nyi khri): thabs kyis ston pa mdzad kyi/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ni/nyan thos dang /rang
116a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma yin no//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
116a2(nyi khri): dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags//
116a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba de lta bu bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das de ltar
116a4(nyi khri): bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ming de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang chub sems dpa'
116a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po ni su zhig/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdoms shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
116a6(nyi khri): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya ba
116a7(nyi khri): de dag ni ming tsom ste/ming de ni nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sems can sems can zhes bya bar ming
116b1(nyi khri): du gdags pa'i ming de ni btags pa tsam ste/btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni/ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa med de/ming de ni nang
116b2(nyi khri): na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//bdag dang srog dang /'gro ba dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed can dang /
116b3(nyi khri): shed bdag dang /byed pa po dang /byed du 'jug pa po dang /slong ba po dang /yongs su slong ba po dang /tshor ba po dang /tshor por byed pa po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po
116b4(nyi khri): de dag thams cad kyang btags pa tsa mo ste/btags pa'i chos glang yin pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdugs pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa med de/ming de ni
116b5(nyi khri): nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang
116b6(nyi khri): yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ming gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang btags pa tsam ste/btags pa'i chos gang yin pa dri la ni ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma
116b7(nyi khri): gtogs par/skye ba 'am 'gag pa med de/ming de ni nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na nang gi
