157b6(nyi khri): par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub
157b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
158a1(nyi khri): bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yong su rdzogs par bgyib 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//
158a2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//
158a3(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
158a4(nyi khri): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
158a5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
158a6(nyi khri): bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i
158a7(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/bsam gtan dang po las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas/bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las
158b1(nyi khri): langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs
158b2(nyi khri): nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las
158b3(nyi khri): langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas dga'
158b4(nyi khri): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas
158b5(nyi khri): 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs
158b6(nyi khri): nas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag pa dang //
158b7(nyi khri): de las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de las langs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal po dang /de las langs nas 'gog pa
159a1(nyi khri): la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting
159a2(nyi khri): nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//seng ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
159a3(nyi khri): mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//gzungs kyi sgo dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad thob
159a4(nyi khri): par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i
159a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zla ba'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal
159a6(nyi khri): gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nges pa'i
159a7(nyi khri): rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i
159b1(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang /dpung rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad
159b2(nyi khri): shes par gnas pa la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /phyogs bcur rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad mnyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
159b3(nyi khri): dang /chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i rang bzhin phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha'i gnas la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mngon par shes
159b4(nyi khri): pa mi nyams pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad ma lus par bsreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bdud bzhi'i
159b5(nyi khri): dpung sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /stobs bcu'i stobs kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba gos pa med pa'i
159b6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//de ltar de dag dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
159b7(nyi khri): gzhan dag thob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang sems can thams cad
160a1(nyi khri): kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das
160a2(nyi khri): gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yongs su rdzogs pas ngan song rnams su mi ltung zhing /rigs dma' bar mi skye ba dang /nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi gnas pa dang /byang chub sems
160a3(nyi khri): dpa'i skyon chen por mi ltung ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//
160a4(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyon chen por ltung ba yin/
160a5(nyi khri): de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti 'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po
160a6(nyi khri): thabs mi mkhas pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /thabs mi mkhas pas/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs
160a7(nyi khri): rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung la/byang chub sems dpe'i skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon no//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir
160b1(nyi khri): na de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon du 'gyur/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon zhes bya ba ni/'di lta ste/chos la sred
160b2(nyi khri): pa'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos la srod pa gang yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
160b3(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs stong zhes bya bar mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mngon par chags shing gnas te/
160b4(nyi khri): 'du shes pa 'di ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthun pa'i chos la sred pa ste/skyon du 'gyur ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
160b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mi rtag
160b6(nyi khri): ces bya bar mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa dang /gzugs sdug bsngal ba'o zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'o zhes bya ba dang /
160b7(nyi khri): gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang /gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam
161a1(nyi khri): par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang /gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang /gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /
161a2(nyi khri): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa dang //tshor ba dang /'du shes
161a3(nyi khri): dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa 'di ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun
161a4(nyi khri): pa'i chos la sred pa ste/skyon du 'gyur ba'o//gzugs 'di spang bar bya'o//'dis gzugs spang bar bya'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa 'di spang bar bya'o//'dis rnam
161a5(nyi khri): par shes pa spang bar bya'o//sdug bsngal 'di yongs su shes par bya'o//'dis sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya'o//kun 'byung ba 'di spang bar bya'o//'dis kun 'byung ba spang bar bya'o//'gog
161a6(nyi khri): pa 'di sngon du bya'o//'dis 'gog pa mngon du bya'o//lam 'di bsgom par bya'o//'dis lam bsgom par bya'o//'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o//'di ni rnam par byang ba'o//chos 'di dag ni bsten
161a7(nyi khri): par bya ba'o//chos 'di dag ni bsten par mi bya ba'o//'di la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spyad par bya'o//'di la ni spyad par mi bya'o//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo//
161b1(nyi khri): 'di ni lam ma yin no//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o//'di ni bslab pa ma yin no//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//
161b2(nyi khri): 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//'di ni brtson 'grus
161b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i/
161b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//'di ni thabs mkhas pa ma yin no//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
161b5(nyi khri): skyon med pa'o//'di ni skyon du 'gyur ba'o//zhes bya bar chos de dag la mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon
161b6(nyi khri): du 'gyur ba'o//smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa gang yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
161b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /phyi stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
162a1(nyi khri): phyi stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /phyi nang stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang
162a2(nyi khri): dag par rjes su mi mthong /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /chen po stong pa nyid la
162a3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /chen po stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /don dam pa stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su
162a4(nyi khri): mi mthong /don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /'dus byas stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /'dus byas stong pa
162a5(nyi khri): nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med
162a6(nyi khri): pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa
162a7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong
162b1(nyi khri): pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /mtha' lngas 'das pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par
162b2(nyi khri): rjes su mi mthong /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
162b3(nyi khri): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /chos thams cad stong pa nyid
162b4(nyi khri): la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la chos thams
162b5(nyi khri): cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang
162b6(nyi khri): dag par rjes su mi mthong /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
162b7(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/tshe
163a1(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go//tshe dang ldan
163a2(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/slob pa'i tshe ci nas kyang gzugs shes par
163a3(nyi khri): bya ste/gzugs des rlom sems su mi bya'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste/tshor ba de dang /'du shes de dang /'du byed de dang /rnam par shes pa des
163a4(nyi khri): rlom sems su mi bya'o//mig shes par bya ste mig des rlom sems su mi bya'o//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid shes par bya ste/des rlom sems su mi bya'o//gzugs shes par bya ste/des
163a5(nyi khri): /rlom sems su mi bya'o//sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /rag dang /chos shes par bya ste/des rlom sems su mi bya'o//mig gi rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste/des rlom sems su mi bya'o//rna ba'i rnam par
163a6(nyi khri): shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste/des rlom sems su mi bya'o//mig gi 'dus te reg
163a7(nyi khri): pa shes par bya ste/des rlom sems su mi bya'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shes par
163b1(nyi khri): b+h+yab+h+ya/das rnam sems su ma bya//mig ge dus te ga pa tsun gyis char ba shes par bya//des rnamasems su mi bya'o//rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rten gyis tshor ba dang /rtswa'i 'dus te rag pa'i tsun gyis tshor ba dang /
163b2(nyi khri): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes par bya ste/des rlom sems su mi bya'o//sa'i khams shes par bya ste/
163b3(nyi khri): dedes rlom sems su mi bya'o//chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams shes par bya ste/des rlom sems su mi bya'o//ma rig pa shes par
163b4(nyi khri): bya ste/des rlom sems su mi bya'o//'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred po dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi shes
163b5(nyi khri): par bya ste/des rlom sems su mi bya'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes par bya ste/dris rlom sems su mi bya'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus
163b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes par bya ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o//nang stong pa nyid shes par bya ste nang
163b7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid des rlom sems su mi bya'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes par bya ste/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid des rlom sems su mi bya'o//bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa
164a1(nyi khri): dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shes par bya ste/de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o//mngon par shes pa rnams shes par bya ste/de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o//
164a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po dgu pa//mig lnga shes par bya ste/de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shes par bya ste/de
164a3(nyi khri): dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o//yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes
164a4(nyi khri): par bya ste/de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
164a5(nyi khri): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes par bya ste/de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa
164a6(nyi khri): bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes par bya ste/de dag gis rlom sems su mi
164a7(nyi khri): bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/byang chub kyi sems des kyang rlom sems su mi
164b1(nyi khri): bya'o//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis rlom sems su mi bya'o//rlabs po che'i sems kyis rlom sems su mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar sems de sems ma yin te/sems kyi rang bzhin 'od
164b2(nyi khri): gsal ba'i phyir ro//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gang yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems gang 'dod chags dang yang mi ldan ma bral//
164b3(nyi khri): zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /kun nas ldang ba dang /sgrib pa dang /gcod pa dang /bag la nyul ba dang /kun tu sbyor ba dang /lta ba'i rnam pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang yang mi ldan ma bral
164b4(nyi khri): ba 'di ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems gang la sems ma yin no zhes bya ba de
164b5(nyi khri): yod dam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar sems ma yin pa de la yod pa 'am med pa dmigs pa 'am yod par 'gyur ram/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin no///
164b6(nyi khri): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de ltar sems ma yin pa de la yod pa 'am med pa zhes bya ba med cing mi dmigs na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de skad du sems
164b7(nyi khri): gang la sems ma yin pa zhes bya ba de yod dam zhes phyir dris pa de 'thad par 'gyur ram/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems ma yin pa gang yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
165a1(nyi khri): ti'i bu sems ma yin pa ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de/de la ni sems med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o//
165a2(nyi khri): smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci/ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam/de bzhin du
165a3(nyi khri): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam/ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du
165a4(nyi khri): mig gi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam/gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin
165a5(nyi khri): nam/rna ba'i khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna'i khams dang /dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lce'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang /
165a6(nyi khri): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lus kyi khams dang /reg bya'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
165a7(nyi khri): khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam/skye mched dang /phung po dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams
165b1(nyi khri): cad dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i
165b2(nyi khri): bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
165b3(nyi khri): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam/byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen
165b4(nyi khri): po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin
165b5(nyi khri): nam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing
165b6(nyi khri): rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du/phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched drug dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
165b7(nyi khri): rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
166a1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /byams pa chen
166a2(nyi khri): po dang /snying rje chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
166a3(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor legs so legs so///
166a4(nyi khri): khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras thugs las skyes pa/zhal nas byung ba/chos las skyes pa/chos kyi sprul pa/chos kyi bgo skal bzang zing gi bgo skal ba ma yin pa/chos rnams la mngon sum gyi mig dang ldan
166a5(nyi khri): palus mngon du gyur pa ste/nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi mchog tu/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/bstan pa 'di'ang de'i tshul dang 'dra'o//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
166a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de bzhin du bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'ang 'di las yongs su shes
166a7(nyi khri): par bya'o//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya ste/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang /shes rab
166b1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan du mnyan par bya'o//gzung bar bya'o//bcang bar bya'o//klag par bya'o//yongs su chub par bya'o//tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o//rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang //
166b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan du mnyan par bya'o//gzung bar bya'o//bcang bar bya'o//klag par bya'o//yongs su chub par bya'o//tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang /
166b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan du mnyan par bya'o//gzung bar bya'o//bcang bar bya'o//klag par bya'o//
166b4(nyi khri): yongs su chub par bya'o//tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
166b5(nyi khri): rnams kyis rtag tu rgyan mi chad par bslab par bya ba'i theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bzhi pa'o///
166b6(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma dmigs ma 'tshal te/
166b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma dmigs/ma 'tshal na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes
167a1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la ga mas shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das da ltar bdag gis rgyas thams cad la 'brel ba dang 'grib pa ma dun gsu ma 'chal dang
167a2(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ming tsam du byang chub sems dpa' zhe 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar 'phel ba dang 'grib par bgyis na/de nyid bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das ming
167a3(nyi khri): de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/ming de ma mchis pas/de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis
167a4(nyi khri): brlabs pa ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs kyi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes
167a5(nyi khri): pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i ming de'ang gnas
167a6(nyi khri): pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/ming de ma mchis pas/de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis
167a7(nyi khri): so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis mig gi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs//
167b1(nyi khri): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdagras par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das mig go mang de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma
167b2(nyi khri): mchis te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/ming de ma mchis pas/de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rna bo dang /sna dang /lce dang /
167b3(nyi khri): lus dang /yid kyi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis yid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa mi dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang
167b4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das yid kyi ming de 'di gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/ming de mi
167b5(nyi khri): mchis pas/de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par
167b6(nyi khri): rjes su ma mthong //sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos kyi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /
167b7(nyi khri): reg dang /chos kyi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis//
168a1(nyi khri): thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/ming de ma mchis pas/da ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma
168a2(nyi khri): mchis so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /
168a3(nyi khri): lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis
168a4(nyi khri): mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba dang /'grib
168a5(nyi khri): pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis
168a6(nyi khri): brlabs pa ma mchis te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/ming de ma mchis pas/de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig
168a7(nyi khri): gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /
168b1(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te
168b2(nyi khri): reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang chub sems dpa'i zhes gang
168b3(nyi khri): la ming du gdags par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/ming de ma mchis pas/de ltar na ming de
168b4(nyi khri): gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag
168b5(nyi khri): par rjes su ma mthong /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
168b6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
168b7(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
169a1(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang chub sems
169a2(nyi khri): dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na ming de
169a3(nyi khri): gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sa'i khams kyi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /chu'i khams
169a4(nyi khri): dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ma
169a5(nyi khri): rig pa'i 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang /len
169a6(nyi khri): pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi'i 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ma rig pa 'gag pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong //
169a7(nyi khri): 'du byed dang /rnam por shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi 'gag pa'i 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma
169b1(nyi khri): dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das bdag
169b2(nyi khri): gis lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das de ltar na bdag gis bdag gi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag
169b3(nyi khri): par rjes su ma mthong /sems can dang /srog dang /'gro ba dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed can dang /shed bdag dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i 'phel ba
169b4(nyi khri): dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/bcom ldan 'das de ltar na bdag gis mthong ba po'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang chub sems
169b5(nyi khri): dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/ming de ma mchis pas/de ltar
169b6(nyi khri): na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par
169b7(nyi khri): rjes su ma mthong /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
170a1(nyi khri): pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nang stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma
170a2(nyi khri): mthong /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang
170a3(nyi khri): 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
170a4(nyi khri): pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/
170a5(nyi khri): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang
170a6(nyi khri): dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes
170a7(nyi khri): su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa dang /lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang /skyo ba rjes su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su
170b1(nyi khri): dran pa dang /'chi ba rjes su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig lnga dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
170b2(nyi khri): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/
170b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par
170b4(nyi khri): bgyi/bcom ldan 'das ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/ming de ma mchis pas/de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa
170b5(nyi khri): ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom
170b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das bdag gis dben pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /smig
170b7(nyi khri): rgyu lta bu dang /chu zla lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /zhi ba dang /skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag pa ma mchis pa/
171a1(nyi khri): dang 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang /mngon pa snang ba skye ba ma mchis pa dang /kun nas nyan mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'bral ba dang 'grib byam du migs
171a2(nyi khri): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi dbyings kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor bu de bzhin
171a3(nyi khri): nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
171a4(nyi khri): dbyings kyi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge bo dang mi dge ba'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag
171a5(nyi khri): par rjes su ma mthong /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi
171a6(nyi khri): chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /zug pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
171a7(nyi khri): 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang /'grib sa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa ma mchis pa dang /ma 'ongs
171b1(nyi khri): ba ma mchis pa dang /da ltar byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/de la ci zhes bgyi zhe na/de ni 'dus ma bgyis te/'dus ma bgyis ni 'das pa ma lags///
171b2(nyi khri): ma 'ongs pa ma lags/da ltar byung ba ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dus ma bgyis kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/'dus ma bgyis
171b3(nyi khri): de'ang gang zhe na/gang la skye ba ma mchis/gnas pa ma mchis/'jig pa ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par
171b4(nyi khri): rjes su ma mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge
171b5(nyi khri): 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar
171b6(nyi khri): lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos
171b7(nyi khri): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
172a1(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs
172a2(nyi khri): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig btags
172a3(nyi khri): par bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis/dge 'dun gyi ming de dang /byang chub
172a4(nyi khri): sems dpa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/thug
172a5(nyi khri): pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/
172a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang /'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags
172a7(nyi khri): par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/ming de ma
172b1(nyi khri): mchis pas/de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das gang yang 'di ltar 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes chos kyi brdar
172b2(nyi khri): bgyi ba dang /chos su gdags pa de'ang phung po 'am/khams sam/skye mched dam/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gang du'ang brjod du ma mchis te/chos su gdags pa tsam du bas so//
172b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/rmi lam zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gong gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//sgyu ma dang /sgra brnyan dang /mig yor dang /smig rgyu dang /chu zla dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
172b4(nyi khri): sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na/nam mkha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//sa zhes bgyi ba'i
172b5(nyi khri): ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//chu dang /me dang /rlung zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//
172b6(nyi khri): mamu nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming
172b7(nyi khri): ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
173a1(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//tshul khrims
173a2(nyi khri): zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod
173a3(nyi khri): du ma mchis so//rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//lan cig phyir
173a4(nyi khri): 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//dgra bcom pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//rang sangs
173a5(nyi khri): rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//rang sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis
173a6(nyi khri): kyang brjod du ma mchis so//byang chub sems dpa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod
173a7(nyi khri): du ma mchis te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming de'ang dge ba'am mi dge ba 'am/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa 'am/rtag pa 'am mi
173b1(nyi khri): rtag pa 'am/bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/bdag gam/bdag ma mchis pa 'am/zhi ba'am/ma zhi ba'am/dben pa 'am/mi dben pa'am/dngos po 'am/dngos po ma mchis pa gang gis kyang brjod du ma
173b2(nyi khri): mchis pas/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis don gyi dbang de lta bu mthong ba'i slad du/de skad du bdag gis chos thams cad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du 'di lta ste/
173b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar ming du gdags pa ni bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ro zhes gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ltar ming de ni gnas pa ma
173b4(nyi khri): mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis pa ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/thug pa ma mchis/byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis pa'o//
173b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod de/rnam pa 'di dag dang /tshul 'di dag dang /mtshon ma 'di dag gis bstan pa'i tshe//
173b6(nyi khri): sems zhum par mi 'gyur/yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /'gyod pa ma mchis la/mi 'jigs/mi dngangs shing /skrag par mi 'gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
173b7(nyi khri): ni nges par phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par rtogs par bgyi ste/gnas pa zhes bgyi ba ni/gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshul lo//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub
174a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par
174a2(nyi khri): shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//des mig la gnas par mi bgyi'o//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid la gnas par mi bgyi'o//des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o//sgra dang /
174a3(nyi khri): dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o//des mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes
174a4(nyi khri): pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//des mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg
174a5(nyi khri): pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//des mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
174a6(nyi khri): des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
174a7(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o//des sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o//des chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i
174b1(nyi khri): khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o//des ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa
174b2(nyi khri): dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/gzugs
174b3(nyi khri): kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs ma lags/gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so//tshor ba tshor bas stong ste/tshor ba'i
174b4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba ma lags/tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o//'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ste/'du
174b5(nyi khri): shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes ma lags/'du shes las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so//'du byed 'du byed kyis
174b6(nyi khri): stong ste/'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed ma lags/'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do//rnam par shes
174b7(nyi khri): pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma lags/rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
175a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'//
175a2(nyi khri): des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das de'ang 'di ltar mig mig gis stong ste/mig
175a3(nyi khri): gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig ma lags/mig las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang mig go/rna ba rna bas stong ste/rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang
175a4(nyi khri): lags pa de'ang rna ba ma lags/rna ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o//sna snas stong ste/sna'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sna ma
175a5(nyi khri): lags/sna las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang sna'o//lce lces stong ste/lce'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lce ma lags/lce las gud na'ang
175a6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lce'o//lus lus kyis stong ste/lus kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lus ma lags/lus las gud na'adra stong pa nyid
175a7(nyi khri): ma mchis te/lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang lus so//yid yid kyis stong ste/yid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid ma lags/yid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis
175b1(nyi khri): te/yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang yid do//gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs ma lags/gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/
175b2(nyi khri): gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so//sgra sgras stong ste sgra'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sgra ma lags/sgra las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa
175b3(nyi khri): nyid kyang sgra'o//dri dris stong ste/dri'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang dri ma lags/dri las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang dri'o//re ros stong ste/ro'i stong pa nyid
175b4(nyi khri): gang lags pa de'ang ro ma lags/ro las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ro'o//reg reg gis stong ste/reg gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rog ma lags
175b5(nyi khri): reg las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang reg go//chos chos kyis stong ste/chos kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos ma lags/chos las gud na'ang
175b6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos so//mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig
175b7(nyi khri): gi rnam par shes pa ma lags/mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o//rna ba'i rnam
176a1(nyi khri): par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/yid kyi rnam par
176a2(nyi khri): shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags/yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang

176a7(nyi khri): gyis tshor bas stong ste/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las grong

177a4(nyi khri): pa nyid kyang rga shi'o//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//'du byed

177a6(nyi khri): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gonas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan
177a7(nyi khri): 'das de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/sbyin pa'i pha

177b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
177b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang

177b6(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong
177b7(nyi khri): ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/dran pa nye bar bzhag
178a1(nyi khri): pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams
178a2(nyi khri): dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
178a3(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /mngon
178a4(nyi khri): par shes pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
178a5(nyi khri): pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/sangs rgyas kyi

178b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi/gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi/gnyis su brjod pa la
178b3(nyi khri): gnas par mi bgyi/tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ge rnams kyis stong ste/yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
178b4(nyi khri): de'ang yi ge rnams ma lags/yi ge rnams las gung na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/yi ge rnams kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams so//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems

178b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong
178b7(nyi khri): ste/mngon por shes po rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags/mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/mngon par shes pa
179a1(nyi khri): nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/

179b1(nyi khri): mi rtag pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyig

179b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de
179b6(nyi khri): ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid/gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma
179b7(nyi khri): lags/gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do//bcom ldan 'das
180a1(nyi khri): rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//
180a2(nyi khri): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid/rnam par
180a3(nyi khri): shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/rnam par shes pa sdug
180a4(nyi khri): bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
180a5(nyi khri): des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//gzugs bdag med
180a6(nyi khri): ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs bdag med pa nyid gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyi stong
180a7(nyi khri): pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /gzugs bdag med pa nyid ma lags/gzugs bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa
180b1(nyi khri): nyid kyang gzugs bdag med pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs bdag med do zhes
180b2(nyi khri): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa
180b3(nyi khri): bdag med pa nyid rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid ma lags/rnam par
180b4(nyi khri): shes pa bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
180b5(nyi khri): des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o///
180b6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po bcu pa//gzugs zhi 'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs zhi ba
180b7(nyi khri): nyid gzugs zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs zhi ba nyid ma lags/gzugs zhi ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/gzugs zhi ba nyid
181a1(nyi khri): kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
181a2(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom
181a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid/rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid ma lags//
181a4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa zhi pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des
181a5(nyi khri): na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa zhi ba'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar
181a6(nyi khri): gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid/gzugs stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /
181a7(nyi khri): gzugs stong pa nyid ma lags/gzugs stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/gzugs stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das
181b1(nyi khri): rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
181b2(nyi khri): dang /rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid/rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/

181b4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
181b5(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mtshan ma
181b6(nyi khri): med pa nyid/gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid
181b7(nyi khri): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub/
182a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes
182a2(nyi khri): dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid/
182a3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/rnam par shes
182a4(nyi khri): pa mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das
182a5(nyi khri): rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//gzugs
182a6(nyi khri): smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs smon pa med pa nyid/gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs smon pa med
182a7(nyi khri): po nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /gzugs smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/gzugs smon pa med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid mi mchis te/gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa

182b5(nyi khri): nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi
182b6(nyi khri): bgyi'o//gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs dben pa nyid gzugs dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs
182b7(nyi khri): dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /gzugs dben pa nyid ma lags/gzugs dben pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/gzugs dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong
183a1(nyi khri): pa nyid kyang gzugs dben pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs
183a2(nyi khri): dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de

183a5(nyi khri): 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//
183a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/
183a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang de bzhin nyid ma lags/de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang stong pa
183b1(nyi khri): nyid ma mchis te/de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
183b2(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshe/de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o//chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/chos nyid kyi stong pa
183b3(nyi khri): nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos nyid ma lags/chos nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang chos nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/
183b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o//chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/

183b6(nyi khri): nyid ma mchis te/chos kyi dbyings kyang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
183b7(nyi khri): byiphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi'o//chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos skyon med pa nyid chos
184a1(nyi khri): skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste/chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags/chos skyon med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid mar nga/
184a2(nyi khri): te/chos skyon med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon med pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
184a3(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o//yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas
184a4(nyi khri): stong ste/yang dog pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags/yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang
184a5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang
184a6(nyi khri): dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas/bdag
184a7(nyi khri): du bgyi ba dang /bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//gal te tshor ba dang /
184b1(nyi khri): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la gnas na/de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//de ci'i slad du zhe na/mngon par 'du
184b2(nyi khri): bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug
184b3(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
184b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas/bdag tu bgyi ba dang /bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/yang dag pa'i
184b5(nyi khri): mtha'i bar la gnas na/de yang dag pa'i mtha'i mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spod do//de ci'i slad du zhe na/mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub
184b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/shes
184b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su
185a1(nyi khri): bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/gzugs kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du gzugs ma lags/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
185a2(nyi khri): dang /rnam par shes pa ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa ma lags//
185a3(nyi khri): yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang /rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' ma
185a4(nyi khri): lags te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
185a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/ci nas kyang chos gang la'ang yid rnam par mi rgyu ba de ltar yongs su brtag par
185a6(nyi khri): bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba zhes pa gyi ba ste/rgya che ba/phul du bgyi ba//
185a7(nyi khri): tshad ma mchis pa/tshad ma mchis par nges pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing /de dag dang thun mong ma lags pa ste/ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la
185b1(nyi khri): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid
185b2(nyi khri): dngo /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma
185b3(nyi khri): med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong
185b4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni mtshan mas brjod pa ma lags pa ste/de ni 'di ltar mtshan
185b5(nyi khri): ma las nyon mongs pa 'byung ste/mtshan ma de dag gang zhe na/gzugs ni mtshan ma'o//tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o//'du shes ni mtshan ma'o//'du byed ni mtshan ma'o//rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o//
185b6(nyi khri): mig ni mtshan ma'o//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid ni mtshan ma'o//gzugs ni mtshan ma'o//sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos ni mtshan ma'o//mig gi rnam par shes pa ni
185b7(nyi khri): mtshan ma'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa
186a1(nyi khri): ni mtshan ma'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o//mig
186a2(nyi khri): gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
186a3(nyi khri): dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o//sa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o//chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung
186a4(nyi khri): gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o//mA rig pa ni mtshan ma'o//'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug
186a5(nyi khri): dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang /len pa dang /sred pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi ni mtshan ma'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
186a6(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o//nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan
186a7(nyi khri): ma'o//phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma'o//yang dag
186b1(nyi khri): par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'o///
186b2(nyi khri): bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
186b3(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
186b4(nyi khri): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mtshan ma'o//yi ge rnams ni mtshan ma'o//gcig tu brjod pa ni mtshan
186b5(nyi khri): ma'o//gnyis su brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o//tha dad du brjod pa ni mtshan ma ste/de ni nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o//gal te de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mtshan mar bzung ba zhig lags na ni/kun
186b6(nyi khri): tu rgyu ba phreng ba can yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur ro//dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pa dang /rtog pa dang /mos
186b7(nyi khri): pa dang /brten pa dang /sems pa dang /'jal ba dang dpyod pa ste/de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du'ang ma lags so//de ltar na de ni mtshan ma dang mtshan ma ma
187a1(nyi khri): mchis pa dang /yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pas yongs su bzung ba lags te/kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos par gyur nas//
187a2(nyi khri): da pa'i rjes su 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i ye shes kyis zhugs te/de ltar zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su ma
187a3(nyi khri): bzung ngo //de ni 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa ma dmigs te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar nges ye shes de rtogs pa dang /thob
187a4(nyi khri): par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye shes de rtogs pa dang /thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye shes de rtogs pa
187a5(nyi khri): dang /thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye shes de rtogs pa dang /thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis de las gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
187a6(nyi khri): ngode ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar des chos gang gis rtogs par bgyi ba dang /gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang /gang rtogs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/
187a7(nyi khri): des ye shes de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye shes de tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye
187b1(nyi khri): shes de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye shes de tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye shes de gzugs
187b2(nyi khri): kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye shes de tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye shes de gzugs ma lags pa
