187b3(nyi khri): gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye shes de tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i nang
187b4(nyi khri): du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ye shes
187b5(nyi khri): de yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can mos par gyur te/de ltar mos par gyur na/dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas
187b6(nyi khri): chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te/chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te/de de ltar mos par gyur nas/des chos gang yang mtshan
187b7(nyi khri): ma ma mchis pa dang /yid la bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis te/chos thams cad bzung du ma mchis/gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su bzung bar bgyi ba 'am/
188a1(nyi khri): gtang bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang des ma dmigs te/chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du/de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur
188a2(nyi khri): ba ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
188a3(nyi khri): dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /
188a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang
188a5(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon
188a6(nyi khri): pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
188a7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang /de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon
188b1(nyi khri): med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni pha rol ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//'on
188b2(nyi khri): kyang smon lam yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
188b3(nyi khri): dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa
188b4(nyi khri): bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
188b5(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
188b6(nyi khri): par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar smon lam rnams ni smon lam
188b7(nyi khri): ma lags/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs
189a1(nyi khri): rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /
189a2(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang //
189a3(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi
189a4(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma lags te/de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/chos
189a5(nyi khri): ma lags pa'ang ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
189a6(nyi khri): 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni/byang chub sems
189a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
189b1(nyi khri): rnam pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig/ci'i phyir na de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
189b2(nyi khri): phyin pa zhes bya zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/de de ltar yongs su rtog cing nye bar sems
189b3(nyi khri): dpa'i tshe/chos gang med cing mi dmigs pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes gal te de ltar yang dag par rjes su mthong no/de yang dag par rjes su mthong ba zhes bya ste/de ci'i
189b4(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma mchis mi dmigs so//gal te 'di ltar chos gang yod pa ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin
189b5(nyi khri): nom zhes spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang
189b6(nyi khri): rnams med cing mi dmigs pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong
189b7(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang
190a1(nyi khri): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi
190a2(nyi khri): dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi
190a3(nyi khri): dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol
190a4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid
190a5(nyi khri): dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor
190a6(nyi khri): ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong
190a7(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/gzugs med cing mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes
190b1(nyi khri): pa med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa
190b2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
190b3(nyi khri): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
190b4(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/skye mched rnams dang /khams rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid
190b5(nyi khri): dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun med cing mi dmigs so//
190b6(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis
190b7(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
191a1(nyi khri): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med cing mi
191a2(nyi khri): dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
191a3(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong
191a4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so//chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med
191a5(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/rgyun tu zhugs pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so//
191a6(nyi khri): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa
191a7(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so//phyi dmigs su med pa'i phyir/phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so//phyi nang dmigs su
191b1(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir/phyi nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi
191b2(nyi khri): dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang de ltar rtog cing sems
191b3(nyi khri): pa'i tshe sems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med la/mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar
191b4(nyi khri): shes par bya'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
191b5(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
191b6(nyi khri): du rab tu shes so//tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/rnam par shes pa ni rnam par
191b7(nyi khri): shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshe dang
192a1(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
192a2(nyi khri): phyin pa ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam
192a3(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/dngos
192a4(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu
192a5(nyi khri): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
192a6(nyi khri): dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
192a7(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin
192b1(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
192b2(nyi khri): brgyad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/rgyun tu zhugs pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang byang chub dang /rnam pa
192b3(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa
192b4(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub
192b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
192b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'dra
192b7(nyi khri): byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni ji lta
193a1(nyi khri): bu/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i rang
193a2(nyi khri): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//
193a3(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes
193a4(nyi khri): pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /khams rnams la khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel par
193a5(nyi khri): 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi
193a6(nyi khri): mtshan nyid med do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do//skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi mtshan nyid med do//khams
193a7(nyi khri): rnams la khams kyi mtshan nyid med do//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid med do//yang dag pa'i mtha'i bor la yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid
193b1(nyi khri): med do//mtshan nyid la'ang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do//mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la'ang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
193b2(nyi khri): gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems
193b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung
193b4(nyi khri): bapaba'i phyir ro//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gzugs kyis skyong ste/de la
193b5(nyi khri): skye ba'ang mi dmigs/'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs/'byung ba'ang mi
193b6(nyi khri): dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs/'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
193b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar/
194a1(nyi khri): lus yongs su dag pa dang /ngag yongs su dag pa dang /sems yongs su dag pa dang /mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro//de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang /
194a2(nyi khri): ngag yongs su dag pa dang /sems yongs su dag pa dang /mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i
194a3(nyi khri): sems mi skyed do//zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang /gti mug dang ldan pa dang /nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang /g.yo dang rgyu dang ldan pa dang /phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang /sred pa dang ldan pa
194a4(nyi khri): dang /lta bo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do//de 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed cing /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /nga rgyal dang /g.yo dang /rgyu dang /phrag dog dang /ser sna dang /
194a5(nyi khri): sred pa dang /lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed pas/nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/khor zug rtag par brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro//sems can yongs su smin par bya
194a6(nyi khri): ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro//de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi
194a7(nyi khri): zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/nam bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
194b1(nyi khri): rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//de bas na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
194b2(nyi khri): 'di nyid la brtson 'grus mi btang bar spyad par bya ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/rnam pa thams cad
194b3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lnga pa'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
194b4(nyi khri): gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas/
194b5(nyi khri): gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no//de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma
194b6(nyi khri): la spyod do//gal te gzugs rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spod do//gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do///
194b7(nyi khri): gal te gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do//gol
195a1(nyi khri): te gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//gal
195a2(nyi khri): te gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//gal
195a3(nyi khri): te gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//gal te
195a4(nyi khri): gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do//gal te
195a5(nyi khri): gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do//gol te gzugs ma
195a6(nyi khri): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//gal te gzugs dben
195a7(nyi khri): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//gal te gzugs mi dben
195b1(nyi khri): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te
195b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas/skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha
195b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags po'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams
195b4(nyi khri): dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
195b5(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
195b6(nyi khri): par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag pa dang /mi rtag pa dang /bde ba dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag dang /bdag med pa dang /zhi ba dang /ma zhi ba dang /
195b7(nyi khri): dben pa dang /mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma legs so//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
196a1(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bgyi bar spyod na/dmigs pa la spyod pa ste/byang
196a2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma lo spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' semos dpa' chen po 'odi snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes
196a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom mo zhes bgyi bar spyod na'ang mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
196a4(nyi khri): thabs mi mkhas par rig por bgyi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smos so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
196a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
196a6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/gzugs mngon par 'du bya
196a7(nyi khri): ba la spyod de/de ni skye bo dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa las yongs
196b1(nyi khri): su mi 'gro la/sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/
196b2(nyi khri): de rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/de ni skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre
196b3(nyi khri): sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do//gal te byang chub sems
196b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid la mos
196b5(nyi khri): shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/mig gi rnam par
196b6(nyi khri): shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam
196b7(nyi khri): par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus
197a1(nyi khri): te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du
197a2(nyi khri): shes te byin gyis rlob/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg
197a3(nyi khri): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ma rig pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/'du byed dang /rnam
197a4(nyi khri): par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis
197a5(nyi khri): rlob/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams
197a6(nyi khri): dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
197a7(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /mig lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi
197b1(nyi khri): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes
197b2(nyi khri): te byin gyis brlabs pas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/de ni skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa
197b3(nyi khri): dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'gro la/sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
197b4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang mngon du bya ba'i skal ba med na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
197b5(nyi khri): par 'tshang rgya ba lta ci smos te/de ni gnas med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/thabs mi
197b6(nyi khri): mkhas par shes par bya'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na thabs mkhris par shes par
197b7(nyi khri): bya/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu na mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /gzugs la mi spyod/tshor ba
198a1(nyi khri): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod/gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par
198a2(nyi khri): shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang /gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /gzugs bdag ces bya
198a3(nyi khri): ba dang /gzugs bdag mod ces bya ba dang /gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang /gzugs ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang /gzugs mi stong zhes bya ba dang /gzugs mtshan ma yod
198a4(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang /gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang /gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang /gzugs mi dben zhes
198a5(nyi khri): bya bar mi spyod pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/mi rtag ces bya ba dang /bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba
198a6(nyi khri): dang /bdog ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mi stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /mtshan
198a7(nyi khri): ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya ba dang /mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
198b1(nyi khri): thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med/gzugs
198b2(nyi khri): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang
198b3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med/rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes pa nyid
198b4(nyi khri): kyang stong pa nyid do//skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
198b5(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas
198b6(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /
198b7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
199a1(nyi khri): bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/sangs rgyas kyi
199a2(nyi khri): chos rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
199a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
199a4(nyi khri): nyi shu lnga pa//bam po bcu gcig pa//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/bla na med pa
199a5(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do//de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//mi spyod do zhes bya bar
199a6(nyi khri): mi dmigs so//spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so//spyod pa'ang ma yin mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab
199a7(nyi khri): 'byor ci'i phyir na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs//
199b1(nyi khri): spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA/
199b2(nyi khri): radwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po meng po'i rang bzhin te/
199b3(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so//mi spyod do zhes
199b4(nyi khri): bya bar yang mi dmigs so//spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so//spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi spyod pa'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so//de ci'i
199b5(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
199b6(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa na/gal te sems ma zhum/kun tu ma zhum/mi skrag/kun tu mi skrag/kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
199b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur par rig par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/gnyis su med
200a1(nyi khri): gnyis su byar med do//de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ste/rgya che ba mchog tu
200a2(nyi khri): bya ba tshad med par nges pa/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa ste/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur
200a3(nyi khri): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ba' zhig gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang
200a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'am/'on te de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod/rab
200a5(nyi khri): 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la rnam par spyod pas kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
200a6(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yod do//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub
200a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa
200b1(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
200b2(nyi khri): chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//seng ge rnam par
200b3(nyi khri): brtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//chos thams cad las shin
200b4(nyi khri): tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//chos kyi
200b5(nyi khri): dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//chos thams cad
200b6(nyi khri): la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
200b7(nyi khri): dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
201a1(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do//tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//phyag rgya yongs
201a2(nyi khri): su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
201a3(nyi khri): yod do//na mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rgyal mtshan rje mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting
201a4(nyi khri): nge 'dzin yod do//dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
201a5(nyi khri): yod do//snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//nyon mongs pa spyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//tshol ba med pa
201a6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya
201a7(nyi khri): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
201b1(nyi khri): dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
201b2(nyi khri): yod do//zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//zad pa dang bral ba zhes
201b3(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//zla ba dri
201b4(nyi khri): ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
201b5(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do//bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//sems gnas pa
201b6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
201b7(nyi khri): yod do//chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod
202a1(nyi khri): do//chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i
202a2(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do//yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
202a3(nyi khri): yod do//'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//gnas
202a4(nyi khri): med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
202a5(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do//yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i
202a6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do//dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//spobs pa mtha' yas pa
202a7(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//yongs su gcod
202b1(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//gcig tu rnam par bkod
202b2(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rnam par 'dor ba med
202b3(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//srid pa'i gzhi thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//sgra
202b4(nyi khri): dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//mngon
202b5(nyi khri): par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//bode ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga'
202b6(nyi khri): ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//yang dag pa dang log pa
202b7(nyi khri): thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//mthun pa dang 'gal ba
203a1(nyi khri): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//'od drim med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//zla badri med
203a2(nyi khri): par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rnam pa thams cad du 'ong byed pa zhes bya
203a3(nyi khri): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//nyon mongs
203a4(nyi khri): pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do///
203a5(nyi khri): gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel
203a6(nyi khri): bas rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'
203a7(nyi khri): ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin nges rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du
203b1(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ting
203b2(nyi khri): nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/de ltar ting nge
203b3(nyi khri): 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
203b4(nyi khri): ba de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod de/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
203b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /bla na med pa yang dag
203b6(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//da ltar phyogs bcu'o 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
203b7(nyi khri): rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/byang
204a1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dzin pa des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //bdag ni snyoms par zhugs sa zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin das rloms ma
204a2(nyi khri): su 'gyur ba'ang med do//bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go//bdag gis mnyam par bzhag par bya'o//bdag ni mnyam par bzhag par gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med
204a3(nyi khri): de/de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi rgyu'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
204a4(nyi khri): po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de
204a5(nyi khri): ni med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba
204a6(nyi khri): med kyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to//ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o//byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to//smras
204a7(nyi khri): pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin kyang
204b1(nyi khri): gzhan zhes bya ba med de/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par
204b2(nyi khri): nus sam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni ma yin no//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam/rab
204b3(nyi khri): 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes su byed pa med do//smras pa/ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/rtog pa med pa'i
204b4(nyi khri): phyir ro//smras pa/de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog pa med de/de ltar na rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa me
204b5(nyi khri): do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do//'du shes su byed pa med do//smras pa/ci'i phyir rnam par shes
204b6(nyi khri): pabar byed pa med cing /'du shes su 'gyur ba med/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ting nge 'dzin de'ang med la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang med pa'i phyir rnam par
204b7(nyi khri): shes par byed pa med do//'du shes su 'gyur ba med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/rab 'byor legs so legs so//
205a1(nyi khri): tshig 'di ni legs par bshad do//ji ltar ngas nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa des bshad pa ni 'di yin no//
205a2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
205a3(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
205a4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bslab par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ltar
205a5(nyi khri): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi
205a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//byang chub kyi
205a7(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi ri mgos pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
205b1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus
205b2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /smisbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/byang chub
205b3(nyi khri): kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du
205b4(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir badrag mi dmigs so//sems can dang /'gro ba dang /gso ba dang /skyes
205b5(nyi khri): bu dang /gang zag dang /shed can dang /shed bdag dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/phung po dang /skye
205b6(nyi khri): mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba
205b7(nyi khri): dang /'gog pa dang /lam mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so//
206a1(nyi khri): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam
206a2(nyi khri): par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
206a3(nyi khri): pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par
206a4(nyi khri): shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
206a5(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/rgyun tu zhugs pa mi dmigs so//shin
206a6(nyi khri): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems
206a7(nyi khri): dpa' mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
206b1(nyi khri): rnam par dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang /mi 'gag pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /
206b2(nyi khri): 'byung ba med pa dang /dmigs pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni rnam por dag pa zhes bya ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
206b3(nyi khri): thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/bcom
206b4(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la'ang slob pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos 'di dag
206b5(nyi khri): ni byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par yod pa ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa lags/
206b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir med ces bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du mchis pa ma
206b7(nyi khri): lags pa de la mchis pa zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma
207a1(nyi khri): yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma
207a2(nyi khri): yin no//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
207a3(nyi khri): bco brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no//de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas/
207a4(nyi khri): sred pa la mngon par zhen te/de dag gis med pa yongs su brtags pas/med pa la mngon par zhen cing /'di lta ste/chad pa dang /rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas/de
207a5(nyi khri): dag mi shes mi mthong ste/gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags nas/ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen cing /sangs
207a6(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mngon par zhen to//de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo //ci
207a7(nyi khri): mi shes mi mthong zhe na/gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo //tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //skye mched dang /khams dang /
207b1(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo //byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo //
207b2(nyi khri): de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste/de dag 'byung ba ma yin no//gang nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no//gzugs kyi khams
207b3(nyi khri): nas 'byung ba ma yin no//gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no//de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste/ji ltar yid
207b4(nyi khri): mi ches zhe na/gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ji
207b5(nyi khri): ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
207b6(nyi khri): dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi
207b7(nyi khri): bar la gnas pa ma yin no//de dag ni mngon par zhen pa ma yin te/ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du
208a1(nyi khri): byed dang /rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid la mngon par zhen pa
208a2(nyi khri): yin/skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/lta bar gyur
208a3(nyi khri): pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/byang chub kyi bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
208a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA
208a5(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no//gsol
208a6(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/bcom
208a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/
208b1(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
208b2(nyi khri): la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/stong pa nyid thams cad dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po rnams dang /dbang po
208b3(nyi khri): rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam
208b4(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
208b5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
208b6(nyi khri): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
208b7(nyi khri): kyi bar la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/rnam
209a1(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
209a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i
209a3(nyi khri): bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs/yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /
209a4(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no//
209a5(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
209a6(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
209a7(nyi khri): panyid de mi dmigaso/yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/mi
209b1(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /de
209b2(nyi khri): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
209b3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nang stong pa nyid ma dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
209b4(nyi khri): du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u drug pa'o//
209b5(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu
209b6(nyi khri): byiphyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/bcom ldan 'das de skad du
209b7(nyi khri): 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul
210a1(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di
210a2(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
210a3(nyi khri): rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/bcom ldan 'das
210a4(nyi khri): de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de lta bas na/de khyod nyid la dris/khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston
210a5(nyi khri): cing /rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gzugs kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan
210a6(nyi khri): la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/mig
210a7(nyi khri): kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gzugs
210b1(nyi khri): kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/mig gi rnam par
210b2(nyi khri): shes pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes
210b3(nyi khri): pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/rna ba'i 'dus te reg
210b4(nyi khri): pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/
210b5(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
210b6(nyi khri): ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan
210b7(nyi khri): zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
211a1(nyi khri): rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/sgyum 'ang gzhan zhig yon snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
211a2(nyi khri): pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mAm/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
211a3(nyi khri): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
211a4(nyi khri): 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so//bcom
211a5(nyi khri): ldan 'das tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'ang gnani ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma khags te/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/
211a6(nyi khri): memi nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan mo lags te/mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go//bcom
211a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/yid nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do//bcom
211b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so//bcom ldan 'das sgra dang /dri dang /ro//
211b2(nyi khri): dang /reg dang /chos kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so//bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par
211b3(nyi khri): shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i
211b4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma legs/sgyu ma'ang
211b5(nyi khri): gzhan ma lags te/yi hU~M rnam par shes pa nyi b+hU me/sgyum cid kyang med kyi rnam pa shes pag/bcom ldan 'das mig ge 'dus te rig pa'ang gzhan ma lags
211b6(nyi khri): ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i
211b7(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/yid kyi 'dus
212a1(nyi khri): te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu
212a2(nyi khri): ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//bcom ldan 'das rna
212a3(nyi khri): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
212a4(nyi khri): tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma
212a5(nyi khri): nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lagathos te/byang
212a6(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan ma
212a7(nyi khri): lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das byang
212b1(nyi khri): chub kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub bo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du
212b2(nyi khri): sems/sgyu ma la skye ba 'am/'gag pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sgyu
212b3(nyi khri): ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang ba yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du
212b4(nyi khri): sems/gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams
212b5(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /brtson 'grus dang /bzod pa dang /tshul khrims
212b6(nyi khri): dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nas/sangs rgyas
212b7(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/
213a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di drag dang /sangs
213a2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang /brda dang /gdags pa dang /tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/
213a3(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'du shes dang /brda dang /gdags pa dang /tha snyad
213a4(nyi khri): tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la skye ba'am 'gag pa'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/rnam par byang bar dmigs
213a5(nyi khri): par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gang la 'du shes med cing
213a6(nyi khri): brda med pa dang /gdags pa med pa dang /tha snyad med pa dang /ming med pa dang /ming du gdags pa med pa dang /lus med pa dang /lus kyi las med pa dang /
213a7(nyi khri): ngag med pa dang /ngag gi las med pa dang /yid med pa dang /yid kyi las med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
213b1(nyi khri): dang /rnam par byang ba med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
213b2(nyi khri): par 'gyur ram/de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /brtson 'grus dang /bzod pa dang /tshul khrims dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid nas/dngos po med pa'i
213b3(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po bco brgyad kyi bar du bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
213b4(nyi khri): du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
213b5(nyi khri): 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
213b6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni//
213b7(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu
214a1(nyi khri): ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
214a2(nyi khri): pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni
214a3(nyi khri): 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
214a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/gsol
214a5(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin
214a6(nyi khri): de ni dmigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma lta bu dang /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /chu zla lta bu
214a7(nyi khri): dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/gsol pa/
214b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin//
214b2(nyi khri): mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang
214b3(nyi khri): bzhin te/dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/tshor ba ni
214b4(nyi khri): rmi lam lta bu/'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/de ni phung po lnga'o//
214b5(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/de ni phung
214b6(nyi khri): po lnga'o//rab 'byor gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang
214b7(nyi khri): po drug go//de ni phung po lnga'o//rab 'byor gzugs ni mig yor lta bu'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni mig yor lta bu ste/rnam par shes pa
215a1(nyi khri): gang yin pa de ni dbang po drugag//de ni phung po wA//rab 'byor gzugs ne rba \u0f88\u0f90 m+b+ha hrug//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa na/
215a2(nyi khri): chu zla lta bu ste/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/de ni phung po lnga'i//rab 'byor gzugs ni smig rgyu lta bu'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /
215a3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/de ni phung po lnga'o//rab 'byor gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes
215a4(nyi khri): dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/de ni phung po lnga'o//de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
215a5(nyi khri): so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir mi dmigs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la
215a6(nyi khri): gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing dngangs pa dang /skrag par mi 'gyur lags grang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor pal te byang chub sems
215a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'ang yin la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu'ang
215b1(nyi khri): ma 'ongs na/'jigs shing dngangs pa dang /skrag par yang 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs/mi
215b2(nyi khri): dngangs mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
215b3(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang /
215b4(nyi khri): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam por shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
215b5(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
215b6(nyi khri): ldan pa'i sems kyis/gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam por shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi
215b7(nyi khri): dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam
216a1(nyi khri): par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs
216a2(nyi khri): so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/gzugs
216a3(nyi khri): stong zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad
216a4(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa
216a5(nyi khri): mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so//
216a6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis//
