248a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa
248a7(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam por grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas med do//rab 'byor
248b1(nyi khri): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na//
248b2(nyi khri): nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
248b3(nyi khri): tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gza' dang /skar ma dang /nor bu rin po che dang /glog gi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du
248b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rgyal
248b5(nyi khri): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang
248b6(nyi khri): byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
248b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/byang chub sems
249a1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od
249a2(nyi khri): la gnas med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med
249a3(nyi khri): do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'dri ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag
249a4(nyi khri): thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/thog pa med pa/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid
249a5(nyi khri): gcig pa sha stag ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la ma chags pa dang /med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o//rab
249a6(nyi khri): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med par yang rig par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
249a7(nyi khri): chos thams cad ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang rnams kyi ma chags pa dang mchis pa ma lags pa yang dag pa
249b1(nyi khri): nyid la bslab par bgyi/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni gang rnams rig par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos
249b2(nyi khri): thams cad ces bya ba ni/dge ba dang /mi dge ba dang /lung du ma bstan pa dang /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa
249b3(nyi khri): med pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas dang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /thun mong dang /thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/rab
249b4(nyi khri): 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos de dag thams cad la ma chags pa dang /med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o//
249b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba'ang chos thams cad dngos po de dag nyid do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang
249b6(nyi khri): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni/phar shes pa/mar shes pa/dge sbyong du shes pa/bram
249b7(nyi khri): zer shes pa/rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang /sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang /tshul khrims las byung ba dang /bsgom pa
250a1(nyi khri): las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang /nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /'jig rten pa'i
250a2(nyi khri): 'du shes dgu ste/'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /'bu can gyi 'du shes dang /rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par dmyur ba'i 'du shes dang /
250a3(nyi khri): rnam par sngos po'i 'du shes dang /rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /rus pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes
250a4(nyi khri): dang /'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /'jig
250a5(nyi khri): rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa
250a6(nyi khri): dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa dang /dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang /skyo ba rjes su dran
250a7(nyi khri): pa dang /'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge bo zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge bo gang lags//
250b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o//ma byin par len pa dang //
250b2(nyi khri): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /phra ma dang /zhe gcod pa dang /tshig kyal pa dang /chags sems dang /gnod sems dang /log
250b3(nyi khri): par lta ba dang /bro ba dang /mdud par 'dzin pa dang /'chab pa dang /'tshig pa dang /'tshe ba dang /phrag dog dang /ser sna dang /nga rgyal dang /log pa'i
250b4(nyi khri): nga rgyal ste/rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
250b5(nyi khri): stsal pa/lus kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o//ngag gi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o//yid kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o//'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung ma bstan pa'o//
250b6(nyi khri): dbang po lnga ni lung ma bstan pa'o//skye mched drug ni lung ma bstan pa'o//gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung ma bstan pa'o//phung po dang /khams dang /skye
250b7(nyi khri): mched ni lung ma bstan pa'o//rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung ma bstan pa ste/rab 'byor do dag ni lung ma bstan pa'i chos su shes par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom
251a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/phung po dang /
251a2(nyi khri): skye mched dang /khams dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
251a3(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa lnga dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par/de ma yin par 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya'o//
251a4(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya
251a5(nyi khri): ba ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi
251a6(nyi khri): yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /ma shes
251a7(nyi khri): pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang /yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang /yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang /rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i
251b1(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rig pa dang /rnam par grol ba dang /dran
251b2(nyi khri): pa dang /shes bzhin dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad do//brgyad gang zhe na/gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di ni/rnam
251b3(nyi khri): par thar pa dang po'o//nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o//sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni
251b4(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o//gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed
251b5(nyi khri): pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du
251b6(nyi khri): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/
251b7(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la
252a1(nyi khri): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes
252a2(nyi khri): med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o//dri rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
252a3(nyi khri): las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang /tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag
252a4(nyi khri): dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/dgu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/de 'dod pas dben/sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben/rtog pa
252a5(nyi khri): dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam par rtog
252a6(nyi khri): pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rnam par rtog pa med pa/rnam par dpyod pa med pa//
252a7(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin las skyes po'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/dran pa
252b1(nyi khri): dang ldan zhing /shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/bde ba lus kyis myong la/'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/btang
252b2(nyi khri): snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs/sdug bsngal ba'ang spongs shing /yid
252b3(nyi khri): bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/bde ba'ang med/sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa/btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa
252b4(nyi khri): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs
252b5(nyi khri): kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du nam
252b6(nyi khri): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/rnam shes mtha' yis skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de
252b7(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad du/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes/cung zong med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
253a1(nyi khri): gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
253a2(nyi khri): te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang /tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs
253a3(nyi khri): gnas so//de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po
253a4(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas
253a5(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags//
253a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/'di lta ste/phung po dang /skye mched dang /khams dang /bsam
253a7(nyi khri): gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i
253b1(nyi khri): chos zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos ni/dran pa
253b2(nyi khri): nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags
253b3(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /
253b4(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa
253b5(nyi khri): bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/de dag ni zag pa
253b6(nyi khri): med pa'i chos zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya
253b7(nyi khri): ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams dang /gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos rnams/byang chub
254a1(nyi khri): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o//gsol
254a2(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/gang la skye ba
254a3(nyi khri): med cing 'jig pa med pa dang /gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/'dod chags zad pa/zhe sdang zad pa/gti mug zad pa/de bzhin nyid mo nor
254a4(nyi khri): pa de bzhin nyid/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid/chos skyon med pa nyid/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings yang dag pa'i
254a5(nyi khri): mtha' ste/rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
254a6(nyi khri): rab 'byor thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga dag
254a7(nyi khri): ste/de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/bcom ldan
254b1(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
254b2(nyi khri): bar dag ste/de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/rang gi mtshan nyid
254b3(nyi khri): kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas/chags par mi bya'o//chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa med cing /rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir//
254b4(nyi khri): chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub sems
254b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor sems
254b6(nyi khri): can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi
254b7(nyi khri): phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba/de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa gang lags/bcom
255a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/'di lta ste/rigs kyis dang /brgyad pa dang /rgyun tu
255a2(nyi khri): zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
255a3(nyi khri): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa zhes bya ste/byang chub
255a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/sems can
255a5(nyi khri): gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
255a6(nyi khri): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar
255a7(nyi khri): bya'o//bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o//bdog gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o//bdag gis sems
255b1(nyi khri): can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o//de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang /sems can gang yang yongs su
255b2(nyi khri): mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o//bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
255b3(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o//bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o//bdag gis
255b4(nyi khri): chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o//bdag gis phung po nas brtsams te/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /bsam
255b5(nyi khri): gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
255b6(nyi khri): par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar bsgrub pa khong du chud pa la bslab par bya'o//bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab
255b7(nyi khri): par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/de de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems
256a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
256a2(nyi khri): chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/sems can dmyal ba pa dang /byol song gi skye gnas pa dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi
256a3(nyi khri): tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do//de
256a4(nyi khri): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos grong du 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/bdag gis sems can re re'i don du'ang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang
256a5(nyi khri): por sems can gang yang /phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag
256a6(nyi khri): kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes/thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du/sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
256a7(nyi khri): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o//de nas gdod
256b1(nyi khri): bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
256b2(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/de la
256b3(nyi khri): gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
256b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o//de
256b5(nyi khri): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/gti
256b6(nyi khri): mug gi sems mi bskyed/gtse ba'i sems mi bskyed/nyan thos kyi sems dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang mi bskyed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
256b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o//des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang /sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
257a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi bskul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi bskul ba ni/rnam
257a2(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing /des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi bskul ba'o//
257a3(nyi khri): sems des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad
257a4(nyi khri): la phan pa dang /bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni/sems can thams cad skyob cing //
257a5(nyi khri): sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa ste/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde
257a6(nyi khri): ba'i sems te/de la gnas shing /sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
257a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o//chos la dga' bar bya'o//chos la mos par bya'o//chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par
257b1(nyi khri): bya'o//de la chos gang zhe na/chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/'di ni chos zhes bya'o//de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/'di ni chos
257b2(nyi khri): 'dod pa zhes bya'o//de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o//de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/
257b3(nyi khri): gang chos de la yon tan du lta ba ste/'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o//de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste//
257b4(nyi khri): 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/sems
257b5(nyi khri): can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
257b6(nyi khri): pas/nang stong pa nyid la gnas/phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/sems can gyi
257b7(nyi khri): phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/byang chub kyi
258a1(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i
258a2(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang //
258a3(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs
258a4(nyi khri): pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas te
258a5(nyi khri): sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
258a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
258a7(nyi khri): bar la gnas te/sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o//rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing /byang chub sems
258b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du byed pas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
258b2(nyi khri): zhes bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das don grang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
258b3(nyi khri): po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la spobs pa skyed cig/shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan
258b4(nyi khri): 'das bdag tu lta ba dang /sems can du lta ba dang /srog tu lta ba dang /gang zag tu lta ba dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /shed can dang /shed bdag dang /byed pa
258b5(nyi khri): po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba por lta ba dang /chad par lta ba dang /rtag par lta ba dang /yod par lta ba dang /med par lta ba dang /phung por lta
258b6(nyi khri): ba dang /khams su lta ba dang /skye mched du lta ba dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang /sangs
258b7(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dog par bya bar lta ba dang /byang chub tu lta ba dang /
259a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas su lta ba dang /chos su lta ba dang /dge 'dun du lta ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
259a2(nyi khri): lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa bgyid kyang /de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
259a3(nyi khri): bgyi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/byang chub sems
259a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/mya ngan
259a5(nyi khri): las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
259a6(nyi khri): cing /thabs mi mkhas pas/gzugs la dmigs shing /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam
259a7(nyi khri): par shes par dmigs shing /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do//skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar dmigs shing /dmigs
259b1(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu
259b2(nyi khri): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i
259b3(nyi khri): bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed
259b4(nyi khri): do//rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par
259b5(nyi khri): shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po
259b6(nyi khri): dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do//yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du dmigs
259b7(nyi khri): shing /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/tshor ba
260a1(nyi khri): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/de
260a2(nyi khri): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas/lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/mi dmigs pa'i
260a3(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa'
260a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
260a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong mo lags pa'i sems de lta bu la'ang
260a6(nyi khri): chags pa ma mchis pas/de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de
260a7(nyi khri): ni/zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing /khams gsum
260b1(nyi khri): gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la'ang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'i
260b2(nyi khri): grangs su mchi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar sems ni sems ma mchis pa ste/sems ma mchis pa de la'ang chags pa ma mchis so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA rang
260b3(nyi khri): ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
260b4(nyi khri): sems/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub
260b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /'gag pa dang /'phel ba dang /'grib pa dang /
260b6(nyi khri): 'ong ba dang /'gro ba dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba med cing /
260b7(nyi khri): 'gag pa med pa dang /'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang /'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la/nyan
261a1(nyi khri): thos kyi sems med do//rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do//byang chub sems dpa'i sems med do//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems
261a2(nyi khri): med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
261a3(nyi khri): thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/khongs
261a4(nyi khri): su chud pa med pa/de lta bu'i sems la'ang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bas gzugs kyang chags pa med do//tshor ba dang /
261a5(nyi khri): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do//smras pa/tshe dang
261a6(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/gzugs kyang chags pa med do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do//
261a7(nyi khri): skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang chags pa med do//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa med do//sangs rgyas
261b1(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di
261b2(nyi khri): skad du/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de'ang zag pa med cing /khongs su chud pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad de/byis
261b3(nyi khri): pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang sangs
261b4(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/de yin te tshe dang ldan pa shA
261b5(nyi khri): radwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams
261b6(nyi khri): kyi sems kyang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
261b7(nyi khri): phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta yin na/gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/zag pa med cing khongs su
262a1(nyi khri): chud pa med do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do//
262a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang
262a3(nyi khri): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/gzugs kyang
262a4(nyi khri): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid
262a5(nyi khri): kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do//
262a6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyo bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang khyod
262a7(nyi khri): kyis 'di skad du/sems med pa'i phyir/sems de la'ang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad de/gzugs
262b1(nyi khri): med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do//tshor ba med pa dang /'du shes med pa dang /'du byed med pa dang /rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa
262b2(nyi khri): med do//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa'ang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du
262b3(nyi khri): med pa'ang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'ang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
262b4(nyi khri): chags pa med do//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do//tshor ba med pa dang /'du shes
262b5(nyi khri): med pa dang /'du byed med pa dang /rnam par shes pa med pa'ang /rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa'ang //
262b6(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa'ang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa
262b7(nyi khri): med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
263a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/nyan thos dang /rang //
263a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang /chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do//mngon par chags
263a3(nyi khri): par 'gyur ba med pas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
263a4(nyi khri): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
263a5(nyi khri): stsal pa/gang po khyod kyis spobs pa bskyed cig/gang pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgros pa'i sems can lags te/bcom ldan 'das de ni
263a6(nyi khri): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/de'i slad du byang chub sems
263a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji
263b1(nyi khri): tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos shes bya/gang pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
263b2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi don du
263b3(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /tshul khrims
263b4(nyi khri): bsrung ba ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /tshul khrims bsrung ngo //sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/bzod pa'i
263b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /bzod pa bsgom mo//sems
263b6(nyi khri): can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /brtson 'grus brtsom pa ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi don du/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
263b7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brtson 'grus brtsom mo//sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi//
264a1(nyi khri): sems can thams cad kyi don du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /bsam gtan skyed do//sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/shes rab
264a2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi don du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /shes rab bsgom mo//
264a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o//sems
264a4(nyi khri): can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi bya'o zhe 'am/sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o//sems can 'di snyed ni byang chub tu dgod par
264a5(nyi khri): mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to//de
264a6(nyi khri): 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o//bdag
264a7(nyi khri): gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes
264b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar bya'o//bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang
264b2(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
264b3(nyi khri): rnams la gnas par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyar bar bya'o//bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas
264b4(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang //
264b5(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
264b6(nyi khri): pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed de/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
264b7(nyi khri): ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi
265a1(nyi khri): shu lnga pa//bam po bcu bzhi pa//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
265a2(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshe/sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
265a3(nyi khri): po'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
265a4(nyi khri): bsngo ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o///
265a5(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing
265a6(nyi khri): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod cing /sbyin pa
265a7(nyi khri): yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
265b1(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/chos de dag la bzod pa dang /mos pa dang /rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
265b2(nyi khri): spyod cing /sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa
265b3(nyi khri): yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
265b4(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
265b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin po yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/sems rtse gcig tu byed cing /de la
265b6(nyi khri): dmigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
265b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
266a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
266a2(nyi khri): chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/len pa'ang mi dmigs par dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang /sems
266a3(nyi khri): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa'
266a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go che ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
266a5(nyi khri): bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang /sems can dang /
266a6(nyi khri): byang chub lnga mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
266a7(nyi khri): lalo spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
266b1(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag thams cad sems can thams cad
266b2(nyi khri): dang thun mong du byas shing /blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
266b3(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/rnam
266b4(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang mos pa mi skyed na so so'i skye
266b5(nyi khri): bo'i sa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//
266b6(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ljon pa'i yid la bya bas/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
266b7(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod cing /chos de dag la bzod pa dang /mos pa dang /rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
267a1(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
267a2(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
267a3(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
267a4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi
267a5(nyi khri): go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub
267a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
267a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
267b1(nyi khri): la bya bas/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing /tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/rang
267b2(nyi khri): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/tshul khrims de'ang mi dmigs shing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang /sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
267b3(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//
267b4(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod po ni/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs
267b5(nyi khri): su 'dzin te/de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
267b6(nyi khri): spyod cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/sbyin pa yongs su
267b7(nyi khri): gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang /sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bo 'di ni/byang
268a1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
268a2(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam
268a3(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang /sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing //
268a4(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/tshul khrims
268a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /rnam pa
268a6(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/chos de dag la bzod pa dang /mos pa dang /rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod
268a7(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan
268b1(nyi khri): thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing //
268b2(nyi khri): brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//
268b3(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams
268b4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
268b5(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan
268b6(nyi khri): thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
268b7(nyi khri): cing /chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing bzod pa la mi dmigs pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa'
269a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems
269a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang /sems can dang /byang chub la mtshan
269a3(nyi khri): mar mi byed cing /mi dmigs pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha'o//tshe
269a4(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
269a5(nyi khri): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun
269a6(nyi khri): mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
269a7(nyi khri): spyod pa'i/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
269b1(nyi khri): cing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshul khrims bsrung zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems
269b2(nyi khri): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
269b3(nyi khri): spyod pa'i/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
269b4(nyi khri): bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang /mos pa dang /rten pa 'di ni/
269b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
269b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
269b7(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can thams cad kyi don du/brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing brtan mi ngas pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
270a1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/nyan
270a2(nyi khri): thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/byang
270a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
270a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/
270a5(nyi khri): bas/chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing /brtson 'grus de'ang mi dmigs te/dge ba'i rtsa
270a6(nyi khri): ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems
270a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa'
270b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang /sems can dang /byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing //
270b2(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA
270b3(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
270b4(nyi khri): ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
270b5(nyi khri): te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/
270b6(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
270b7(nyi khri): cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshul khrims
271a1(nyi khri): bsrung zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang /sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsdu
271a2(nyi khri): ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan
271a3(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
271a4(nyi khri): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/bzod pa yongs su bsgom ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams
271a5(nyi khri): cad dang thun mong du byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/bsam
271a6(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//
271a7(nyi khri): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
271b1(nyi khri): pal spyod cing /brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de/de'i dzin pa'i bya ba dadang /sems can thams cad dang blan mang du byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bcwa ba di ni byung /
271b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
271b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la/sems rtse gcig tu byed de/de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/nyan thos dang /rang sangs
271b4(nyi khri): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang
271b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
271b6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing /bsam gtan
271b7(nyi khri): de'ang mi dmigs te/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems
272a1(nyi khri): //dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems
272a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang /sems can dang /byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing /mi dmigs pa 'di ni/byang chub
272a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
272a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'khor gsum yongs su
272a5(nyi khri): dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/
272a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
272a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad
272b1(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang
272b2(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
272b3(nyi khri): pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /nyan thos
272b4(nyi khri): dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa
272b5(nyi khri): la gnas shing brten te/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo/
272b6(nyi khri): bapa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
272b7(nyi khri): ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
273a1(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa
273a2(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha
273a3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod cing /nyan thos dang /
273a4(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/sems rtse gcig tu byed cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems
273a5(nyi khri): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
273a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
273a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/rnam
273b1(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /bla na
273b2(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go
273b3(nyi khri): cha ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang /sems can dang /byang chub//
273b4(nyi khri): la mtshan mar mi byed cing /mi dmigs pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o//
273b5(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing /pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs
273b6(nyi khri): par byed do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
273b7(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams la'ang mnyam par gzhog ste/bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro'ang myong bar mi byed do//
274a1(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs/
274a2(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
274a3(nyi khri): phyin pa/thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/bsam gtan dang /
274a4(nyi khri): tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mthong
274a5(nyi khri): bas mnyam par gzhog ste/de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du'ang mi byed de/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang
274a6(nyi khri): zil gyis gnon to//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas
274a7(nyi khri): pa'i go cha chen po ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang
274b1(nyi khri): ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gau cha chen po bgos pa la/shar phyogs dang /lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /
274b2(nyi khri): lho nub dang /nub byang dang 'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang
274b3(nyi khri): ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing /ming yongs su sgrogs pa mdzad de/'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen
274b4(nyi khri): po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa
274b5(nyi khri): mdzad de/dbyangs rjes su sgrog go//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par
274b6(nyi khri): zhugs zhes bya/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/gang pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
274b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /'dod pas dben/sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang
275a1(nyi khri): bcas/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /
275a2(nyi khri): gsum pa dang /bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po//shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/ltod pa
275a3(nyi khri): med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing /rnam par
275a4(nyi khri): spyod do//de snying rje dang ldan pa dang /dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/
275a5(nyi khri): lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam
275a6(nyi khri): par spyod do//de tshad med pa 'di dag dang /gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /tshul dang /mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing /rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang /rnam pa
275a7(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha
275b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/byang chub sems
275b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen
275b3(nyi khri): po/shin tu yangs pa/mi gnyis pa tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam
275b4(nyi khri): mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//snying rje dang ldan pa dang /dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/shin tu
275b5(nyi khri): yangs pa/mi gnyis pa/tshad med pa/gcugs med pa/gnod pa med pa/lhod pa med pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas
275b6(nyi khri): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//de 'dod pas dben/sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben
275b7(nyi khri): pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
276a1(nyi khri): so//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la
276a2(nyi khri): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
276a3(nyi khri): sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing //
276a4(nyi khri): 'chad pa dang /ston cing 'grel la/rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/de dag gi ro dang /de dag gi skyon dang /'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa'
276a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis/bsam
276a6(nyi khri): gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing /rnam par ldang yang /'di lta ste/nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi
276a7(nyi khri): sems sam/sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o//de ltar byang chub sems
276b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/'di
276b2(nyi khri): snyam ste/sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir/chos bstan to snyam du sems shing /yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang /mos pa dang /rtog pa dang /sems shing khong du
276b3(nyi khri): chud par byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
276b4(nyi khri): yid la bya bas/bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/sems can thams cad kyi don dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
276b5(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi phyir/brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
276b6(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing /rnam par ldang
276b7(nyi khri): yang /nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
277a1(nyi khri): po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang /bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa'i yan lag dang /
277a2(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi yan lag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /stong pa'i rnam pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /
277a3(nyi khri): smon pa med pa'i rnam pa rab tu rtog kyang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing /de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/byang
277a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
277a5(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
277a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam
277a7(nyi khri): gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
277b1(nyi khri): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so
277b2(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
277b3(nyi khri): bsgom pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
277b4(nyi khri): chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes/de la gzhol bar byed do//snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
277b5(nyi khri): gzhog cing /sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do//dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o//
277b6(nyi khri): zhes sems can rnams la sems so//btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/'di ni byang chub sems
277b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang /tshul
278a1(nyi khri): dang /mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing /rnam par ldang yang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsdu
278a2(nyi khri): ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
278a3(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing /sa gnyis po/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi bskyed
278a4(nyi khri): kyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems
278a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang /dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/brtson
278a6(nyi khri): 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
278a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/bsam gtan dang /tshod med pa dang /gzugs
278b1(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing /de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa'ang med la/de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad
278b2(nyi khri): med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/bsam gtan dang /
278b3(nyi khri): tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la'ang mnyam par gzhog cing /rnam par ldang la/de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /bdag med pa'i
278b4(nyi khri): rnam pa dang /zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /stong pa'i rnam pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang 'jug
278b5(nyi khri): par mi byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
278b6(nyi khri): po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong
278b7(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
279a1(nyi khri): theg pa chen par//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen za theg pa chen po ni/chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'jug
