279a2(nyi khri): cing /mnyam par bzhag par shes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
279a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/rtag ces bya bas shes pa mi 'jug/mi rtag pa dang /bde ba dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag dang /bdag med pa dang /sdug pa dang //
279a4(nyi khri): mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa
279a5(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/gang 'das pa'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa
279a6(nyi khri): dang /da ltar byung ba'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/dus gsum la ye shes mi 'jug pa 'di ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di'ang byang chub
279a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'dod pa'i khams su shes
279b1(nyi khri): pa 'jug par mi byed/gzugs dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/'dod pa dang /gzugs dang /gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa'ang med pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA
279b2(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu 'di'ang /de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
279b3(nyi khri): po'i theg pa chen po ni/'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la'ang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos
279b4(nyi khri): la'ang shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa'ang med/zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi
279b5(nyi khri): chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa
279b6(nyi khri): gang po ji tsam gyis na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/gang pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
279b7(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /nges sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi dmigs
280a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs len pa'ang mi dmigs/yid la byed pa de dag kyang mi dmigs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs
280a2(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
280a3(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /des dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/mi dge ba dang /
280a4(nyi khri): 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing /shes rab kyang mi dmigs/shes
280a5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i
280a6(nyi khri): tshul gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
280a7(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
280b1(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma
280b2(nyi khri): 'dres pas/bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/bsgom pa
280b3(nyi khri): rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom mo//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
280b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
280b5(nyi khri): bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
280b6(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
280b7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i
281a1(nyi khri): /don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
281a2(nyi khri): pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
281a3(nyi khri): par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom mo//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par
281a4(nyi khri): gnas zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'di lta ste/byang chub
281a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so//gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
281a6(nyi khri): 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//mig mi dmigs pa'i phyir/mig ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
281a7(nyi khri): de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/yid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//skye mched dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su
281b1(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zud
281b2(nyi khri): do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs
281b3(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//phyi stong pa nyid
281b4(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
281b5(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/byang
281b6(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
281b7(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa
282a1(nyi khri): rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
282a2(nyi khri): rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//de bzhin nyid dmigs su med
282a3(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings nyid dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /
282a4(nyi khri): chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir/byang chub
282a5(nyi khri): ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
282a6(nyi khri): bu de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
282a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /sems can yongs su smin
282b1(nyi khri): par byed do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang /rim gro bya ba'i phyir/tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang /
282b2(nyi khri): bkur stir bya ba dang /bsti stang du bya ba dang /mchod pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang /'di lta ste/byang chub
282b3(nyi khri): sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to//de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed
282b4(nyi khri): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo //de gnyis su med
282b5(nyi khri): pa'i sa la gnas shing /lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin to//de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob
282b6(nyi khri): par ma gyur gyi bar du/theg pa de dang nam du'ang mi 'bral te/des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /lha dang /klu dang /
282b7(nyi khri): gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi
283a1(nyi khri): 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro//de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
283a2(nyi khri): snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/theg pa chen
283a3(nyi khri): po bla na med pa'i theg pa/theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang /chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed
283a4(nyi khri): do zhes grags pa sgrog cing /dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do//lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /
283a5(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/byang chub sems
283a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog pa chen po/bla na med pa'i theg pa/theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
283a7(nyi khri): nyid thob nas kyang /chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing /dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do//de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
283b1(nyi khri): chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so//
283b2(nyi khri): cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi na/bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang
283b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha chen po gyon cing /'di
283b4(nyi khri): lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol
283b5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
283b6(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i go cha bgos/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam gyi
283b7(nyi khri): go cha bgos/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
284a1(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /ston pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
284a2(nyi khri): stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/sangs rgyas
284a3(nyi khri): kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas
284a4(nyi khri): par 'gengs so//lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /'jig
284a5(nyi khri): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do//shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten
284a6(nyi khri): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do//lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /
284a7(nyi khri): steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do//des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/sems can
284b1(nyi khri): dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do//
284b2(nyi khri): dbyangs sgrog go//de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang /sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/dga' ba dang /bde ba thob ste/de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag
284b3(nyi khri): nas rnam par ldang ngo //de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu
284b4(nyi khri): skye'o//de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo //de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten
284b5(nyi khri): de dag nas rnam par langs nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/sgyu ma'i
284b6(nyi khri): mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang //
284b7(nyi khri): gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par sprul la/de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ngan song gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par 'gyur te/de nas
285a1(nyi khri): /sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par
285a2(nyi khri): gyur na/rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang /sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin
285a3(nyi khri): rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
285a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongasu bsgral yang /sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar
285a5(nyi khri): byas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis/de bzhin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
285a6(nyi khri): chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /stong gsum
285a7(nyi khri): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba/mngon par sprul par byed do//de ltar bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par
285b1(nyi khri): sprul par byed do//de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul nas/zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do//skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa/gos 'dod
285b2(nyi khri): pa rnams la gos/me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog/phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha/khyim
285b3(nyi khri): 'dod pa rnams la khyim/'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba/yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad/nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la/rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do//nor bu dang /mu tig
285b4(nyi khri): dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /gser dang /dngul 'dod pa rnams la/nor bu dang mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /gser dang /dngul
285b5(nyi khri): gyi sbyin pa byed cing /mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du sbyin par byed de/des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/sems can de dag
285b6(nyi khri): la 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to//sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
285b7(nyi khri): chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig
286a1(nyi khri): /gis/lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang
286a2(nyi khri): rung ba'i bar du byin na/rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang la'ang ci'ang byin pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
286a3(nyi khri): 'das de ni ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul te/zas
286a4(nyi khri): 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du byin yang /sems can gang yang ci'ang byin pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung
286a5(nyi khri): na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
286a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /ched du bsams te/skye ba yongs su bzung bas/'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing /de 'khor los
286a7(nyi khri): sbyar ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do//bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
286b1(nyi khri): 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas
286b2(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang
286b3(nyi khri): dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
286b4(nyi khri): rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du/chos bstan pa de dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshon bu mkhas pa zhig gis/
286b5(nyi khri): lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/sangs rgyas kyi
286b6(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod na/rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi
286b7(nyi khri): lam la bkod pa yod dam/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
287a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can chad med grangs med pa/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
287a2(nyi khri): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod kyang /sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de
287a3(nyi khri): bzhin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/bam po bco
287a4(nyi khri): lnga pa//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te//sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'grong
287a5(nyi khri): do//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe
287a6(nyi khri): na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang /dbyig pas brdeg cing /mtshon
287a7(nyi khri): gyis 'debs kyang /de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o//zhes go cha gyon cing /sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god do//rab 'byor
287b1(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig
287b2(nyi khri): mngon par sprul te/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba dang /rab tu dgod par byas na/rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des//
287b3(nyi khri): sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
287b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med/grangs med pa/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang /sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do//de ci'i
287b5(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa
287b6(nyi khri): zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
287b7(nyi khri): par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha
288a1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang /gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
288a2(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/sems can thams cad lus dang /sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go//'god do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/sgyu ma'i
288a3(nyi khri): mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/
288a4(nyi khri): lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des/sems can gang yang lus dang sems
288a5(nyi khri): kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
288a6(nyi khri): chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa/lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang /sems can gang yang lus dang /sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do//de ci'i phyir
288a7(nyi khri): zhe na/rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha
288b1(nyi khri): chen pa blagos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byur gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi
288b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskulo zhing gzhog go/'god do//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/sems can
288b3(nyi khri): thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul po dang /gzhog cing 'grod pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi
288b4(nyi khri): chos nyid la gnas shing /chos gang la 'ang 'khrug pa 'am/'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/de bzhin du sems
288b5(nyi khri): can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog pa dang /'god pa byed de/de ltar yang dag par bskul ba rnams kyang /nam bla na med pa yang dag par
288b6(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du/nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma'i
288b7(nyi khri): mkhan po 'amo/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/bsam gtan
289a1(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/rab 'byor 'di la ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des/sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi
289a2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
289a3(nyi khri): pos/sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang /sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni sgyu
289a4(nyi khri): ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab
289a5(nyi khri): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul
289a6(nyi khri): zhing gzhog go//'god do//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
289a7(nyi khri): pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang /gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos gang
289b1(nyi khri): yang skye ba 'am/'gag pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/rnam par byang ba'am/tshu rol tam/pha rol mi dmigs te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab
289b2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go//'god do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu
289b3(nyi khri): ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul nas/shes rab
289b4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa le yang dag par bskul te/bzhag cing bkod na/rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/sems can gang yang shes rab
289b5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
289b6(nyi khri): pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang /sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid
289b7(nyi khri): nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang
290a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i
290a2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing
290a3(nyi khri): gzhog go//'god do//ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
290a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
290a5(nyi khri): par skul zhing gzhog go//'god do//'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston te/sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
290a6(nyi khri): tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og
290a7(nyi khri): dang /steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
290b1(nyi khri): phyin pa'i bar la gnas pa de bzhin du/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go//'god
290b2(nyi khri): do//de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
290b3(nyi khri): la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go//'god do//'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to//sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
290b4(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu
290b5(nyi khri): mkhas pa zhig gis/lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/pha rol tu phyin pa drug le yang dag par bskul zhing
290b6(nyi khri): bzhag ste/bkod par gyur na/rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des/sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing
290b7(nyi khri): bzhag ste/bkod pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shar
291a1(nyi khri): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang 'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi
291a2(nyi khri): phyogs re re zhing /'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang /sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug
291a3(nyi khri): la bkod pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
291a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
291a5(nyi khri): pa'i sems kyis rnam par spyod cing /sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'obyed de/bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni
291a6(nyi khri): dgod par mi bya'o//bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi
291a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
291b1(nyi khri): rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig
291b2(nyi khri): ni dgod par mi bya'o//bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni lan
291b3(nyi khri): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang
291b4(nyi khri): byang chub la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par
291b5(nyi khri): mi bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed pa'i go mi 'byed kyi de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis sems can tshad med/grangs med pa/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o//bdag gis
291b6(nyi khri): sems can tshad med grangs med pa/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
291b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o//nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o//phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o//
292a1(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
292a2(nyi khri): par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa
292a3(nyi khri): dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
292a4(nyi khri): par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong
292a5(nyi khri): ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o//rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do//rab 'byor 'di
292a6(nyi khri): lta ste/dper na/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/skye bo mang po'i tshogs
292a7(nyi khri): shig mngon par sprul te/'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med/grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod
292b1(nyi khri): par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par gyur na/rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par byas
292b2(nyi khri): pa yod dam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par byas pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin
292b3(nyi khri): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par sems bskyed kyang
292b4(nyi khri): sems can gang gi don du'ang sems bskyed pa med de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang
292b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/byang chub
292b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du/go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
292b7(nyi khri): gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo //mig mig gis stong ngo //de bzhin du rno ba dang /sna dang /lha dang /
293a1(nyi khri): lus dang /yid yid kyis stong ngo //gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos chos kyis stong ngo //mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par
293a2(nyi khri): shes pas stong ngo //rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par
293a3(nyi khri): shes pas stong ngo //mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas skyong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
293a4(nyi khri): dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
293a5(nyi khri): rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
293a6(nyi khri): rkyen gyis tshor g.yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo //sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
293a7(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
293b1(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun/byang
293b2(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis stong ngo //'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad
293b3(nyi khri): dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs
293b4(nyi khri): kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
293b5(nyi khri): kyis stong ngo //bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong ngo //go cha chen po'ang go cha chen pos stong ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems
293b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/de de bzhin no//de ci'i phyir
293b7(nyi khri): zhe na/rab 'byor de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma byas/rnam par ma byas/mngon par ma byas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos
294a1(nyi khri): pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/rnam par ma byas/mngon par ma byas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
294a2(nyi khri): bgyis/rnam par ma bgyis/mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ci 'i slad du ma bgyis//
294a3(nyi khri): rnam par ma bgyis/mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas//
294a4(nyi khri): rnam par ma byas/mngon par ma byas so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/rnam par ma byas/mngon
294a5(nyi khri): par ma byas so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mi byed//
294a6(nyi khri): rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed do//rab 'byor mig mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed do//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid mi byed/rnam par mi byed//
294a7(nyi khri): mngon par mi byed do//rab 'byor gzugs mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed do//sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do//rab
294b1(nyi khri): 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid
294b2(nyi khri): kyi rnam par shes pa mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed do//rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa
294b3(nyi khri): dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed do//rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed/
294b4(nyi khri): rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus
294b5(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed do//rab 'byor bdag ni mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed de/de
294b6(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor sems can ni mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//gso ba dang /skyes bu
294b7(nyi khri): dang /gang zag dang /shed can dang /shed bdag dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po ni mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de shin tu mi
295a1(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byung grolam ni myi byud/rnam par smai b+hud/mngon par mi byung / ci'i phyir na na/nga shin tu mi dmigs par b+h+ya //sgyu ma dang /sgra ban+d+han dang /
295a2(nyi khri): mig yor dang /gzugs brnyan dang /smig rgyu dang /sprul pa ni mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha
295a3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ni mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed de//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu
295a4(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed de/de ci'i phyir
295a5(nyi khri): zhe na/de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed do//rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi byed//
295a6(nyi khri): rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni mi byed/rnam par mi byed mngon par
295a7(nyi khri): mi byed de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//'phags pa'i bden po rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
295b1(nyi khri): pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa
295b2(nyi khri): rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
295b3(nyi khri): pa bco brgyad ni mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de shin tu mi
295b4(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i phyir ro//ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'
295b5(nyi khri): dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor byang chub ni mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed
295b6(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed/rnam par mi byed/mngon par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i
295b7(nyi khri): phyir ro//rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ma byas/rnam par ma byas/mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
296a1(nyi khri): gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/rnam par ma byas/mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
296a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/go cha med pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/bcom ldan
296a3(nyi khri): 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/tshe dang ldan pa
296a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma btsongs ma grol ba yin nam/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba
296a5(nyi khri): yin nam/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin te/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma
296a6(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o//gang pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs gang yin/de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
296a7(nyi khri): dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po/gang 'di rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//gang 'di rmi lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang //'dra
296b1(nyi khri): byed dang /rnam par shes pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//gang 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta
296b2(nyi khri): bu'i gzugs de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//gang 'di sprul pa lta bu'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /sprul pa lta bu'i rnam par shes pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang
296b3(nyi khri): ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//'das pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po
296b4(nyi khri): ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byung ba'i
296b5(nyi khri): gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs med
296b6(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po
296b7(nyi khri): gzugs dben pa'i phyir/gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang
297a1(nyi khri): ldan pa gang po gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir/gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir/rnam par
297a2(nyi khri): shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//dge ba'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings
297a3(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po mi dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//mi dge ba'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
297a4(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa gang po lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//lung du ma bstan pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol
297a5(nyi khri): ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa glang po 'jig rten pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//'jig rten pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe
297a6(nyi khri): dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings
297a7(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa
297b1(nyi khri): ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa med pa'i gzugs ni ma gcings ma grol ba'o//zag pa med pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma
297b2(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba ste/tshe dang ldan pa gang po/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs med pa'i phyir/gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa med pa'i
297b3(nyi khri): phyir/rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o//gzugs dben pa'i phyir/gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/
297b4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o//gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir/gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir/
297b5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gong po chos thams cad kyang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o///
297b6(nyi khri): ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba ste/tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson
297b7(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir/sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa
298a1(nyi khri): nim bcings ma grol ba'o//dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//med pa'i phyir/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
298a2(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/dben pa'i phyir ma
298a3(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o//ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//phyi nang
298a4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol
298a5(nyi khri): ba'o//dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//med pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o//dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o///
298a6(nyi khri): ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//med pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o//dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//med
298a7(nyi khri): pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mo bcings ma grol ba'o//dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan
298b1(nyi khri): pa gang po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ma bcings ma grol ba'o//dben
298b2(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par
298b3(nyi khri): rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba ste/tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o//dben pa'i phyir ma
298b4(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o//ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba ste/tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir
298b5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o//dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' yang
298b6(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba ste/tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa
298b7(nyi khri): gang po de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon
299a1(nyi khri): med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir/de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o//dben pa'i phyir ma
299a2(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o//ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o//dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//ma skyes
299a3(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'dus ma byas kyang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o//dben
299a4(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba zhes
299a5(nyi khri): bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
299a6(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' ma
299a7(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o//sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o//ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi
299b1(nyi khri): dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o//'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
299b2(nyi khri): la gnas/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
299b3(nyi khri): nas ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas/ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin nyid la gnas/ma bcings ma grol ba'i ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /ma bcings ma
299b4(nyi khri): grol ba'i gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos nyid dang ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi dbyings dang /ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos skyon med pa nyid dang /ma bcings ma
299b5(nyi khri): grol ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas/ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus ma byas pa la gnas te/ma bcings ma grol ba de/ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//
299b6(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba de/ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//ma bcings ma grol ba de/ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen
299b7(nyi khri): bkur byed do//ma bcings ma grol ba de/ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos nyan to//ma bcings ma grol ba de/ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi
300a1(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//ma bcings ma grol ba de/ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//ma bcings ma grol ba de/ma bcings ma grol ba'i
300a2(nyi khri): mig lnga dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//ma bcings ma grol ba de/ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzungs rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//ma bcings ma grol ba de/ma bcings ma
300a3(nyi khri): grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//ma bcings ma grol ba de/ma bcings ma grol ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid grol bar mi 'gyur ro//ma bcings ma grol ba de//
300a4(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//ma bcings ma grol ba de/ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar
300a5(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//ma bcings ma grol ba de/ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god par 'gyur te/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
300a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba de pha rol tu phyin pa drug po ma bcings ma grol bas/med pa dang /dben pa dang /skye ba med pa nye bar bzung zhing /chos thams cad khong du chud par byed do//tshe
300a7(nyi khri): dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba theg pa chen po'i go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis//
300b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po gang lags/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/byang chub sems dpa'
300b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba lags/theg pa chen po de ni gang nas byung ba lags/theg pa de ni gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags/theg pa des
300b3(nyi khri): ni su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor gang khyod de skad du/byang chub sems dpa'
300b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po gang zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste/drug gang zhe na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
300b5(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
300b6(nyi khri): pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
300b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas don du gnyer ba rnams la/phyi nang gi dngos po'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/sbyin pa de'ang sems
301a1(nyi khri): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa'
301a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/bcom ldan
301a3(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
301a4(nyi khri): yang dag par blangs shing gnas la/sems can pha rol kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bskul ba dang /gzhog pa dang /rab tu 'god pa 'di ni
301a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod
301a6(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
301a7(nyi khri): sems bskyed pas/bdag kyang bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin la/gzhan yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa la yang dag par bskul ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
301b1(nyi khri): chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
301b2(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson pa mi 'dor zhing //
301b3(nyi khri): gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyor ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
301b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
301b5(nyi khri): po bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/bsam gtan rnams la thabs mkhas par mnyam par gzhog kyang /de dag gi dbang gis mi skye zhing /gzhan yang
301b6(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bskul ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan
301b7(nyi khri): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
302a1(nyi khri): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/bdag kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med par/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
302a2(nyi khri): yang dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par byed cing /sems can rnams kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa dang /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba la//
302a3(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog pa dang /rab tu 'god pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/de ni rab 'byor
302a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'di lta ste/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong
302a5(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las
302a6(nyi khri): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
302a7(nyi khri): dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/nang gi chos zhes
302b1(nyi khri): bya ba ni/mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid de/de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/mig mig gis skyong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i
302b2(nyi khri): phyir/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid yid kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni nang stong pa nyid do//de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na/phyi'i chos zhes bya ba
302b3(nyi khri): ni/gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos rnams te/de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin
302b4(nyi khri): du mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos chos kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la phyi nang stong
302b5(nyi khri): pa nyid gang zhe na/nang gi skye mched drug dang /phyi'i skye mched drug dang /'di dag ni phyi nang gi chos zhes bya ste/de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/nang gi chos rnams phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir
302b6(nyi khri): zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//phyi'i chos rnams nang gi chos rnams kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la stong
302b7(nyi khri): pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid des stong pa nyid stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir
303a1(nyi khri): te/'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/shar phyogs shar phyogs kyis stong /lho phyogs lha
303a2(nyi khri): phyogs kyis stong /nub phyogs nub phyogs kyis stong /byang phyogs byang phyogs kyis stong /'og gi phyogs 'og gi phyogs kyis stong /steng gi phyogs steng gi phyogs kyis stong /phyogs
303a3(nyi khri): mtshams rnams phyogs mtshams rnams kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/
303a4(nyi khri): don dam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/mya ngan las 'das pa de'ang mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/
303a5(nyi khri): 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams
303a6(nyi khri): te/de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/'dod pa'i khams 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //gzugs kyi khams gzugs kyi khams kyis stong ngo //gzugs med pa'i khams gzugs
303a7(nyi khri): med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na 'dus ma
303b1(nyi khri): byas zhes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas zhes bya ste/mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/'dus ma byas de ni 'dus ma
303b2(nyi khri): byas kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/gang la mtha' mi
303b3(nyi khri): dmigs pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa ste/mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/mtha' las 'das pa mtha' las 'das pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni mtha' las
303b4(nyi khri): 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/gang la thog ma mi dmigs shing /tha ma'ang mi dmigs pa de la 'gro ba mi dmigs 'ong ba'ang mi dmigs te/mi
303b5(nyi khri): rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/thog ma dang tha ma med pa/thog ma dang tha ma med pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa spyod pa nyid ces bya'o///
303b6(nyi khri): de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/gang la gang yang dor ba med pa ste/mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/dor ba med pa dor ba med pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/
303b7(nyi khri): 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang zhe na/'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas kyang rung ste/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/nyan thos rnams kyis
304a1(nyi khri): ma byas/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma byas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
304a2(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas te/mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces
304a3(nyi khri): bya'o//de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na/chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /mig dang /rna ba dang /
304a4(nyi khri): sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang /gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /rog dang /chos dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes
304a5(nyi khri): pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i
304a6(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus
304a7(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /gzugs
304b1(nyi khri): yod pa'i chos dang /gzugs med pa'i chos dang /'dus byas kyi chos dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos te/'di dag ni chos thams cad ces bya'o//de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/chos thams cad
304b2(nyi khri): chos thams cad kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/gzugs ni
304b3(nyi khri): 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid/tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid/'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid/'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid/rnam par shes pa ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan
304b4(nyi khri): nyid de/mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i rang rang gi mtshan nyid de dag gis/chos de
304b5(nyi khri): dag thams cad stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag gi rang bzhin ni de yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/gang la 'das pa mi
304b6(nyi khri): dmigs pa dang /ma 'ongs pa mi dmigs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i gnas mi dmigs pa ste/mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/mi dmigs pa mi dmigs pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin
304b7(nyi khri): de yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir/'dus pa'i
305a1(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid med de/mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/'dus pa 'dus pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
305a2(nyi khri): nyid ces bya'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po bcu drug pa/rab 'byor gzhan yang dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo //dngos po med pa ni dngos po
305a3(nyi khri): med pas stong ngo //rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos stong ngo //de la dngos po dngos po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/phung po lnga ste/phung po de dag kyang phung po
305a4(nyi khri): rnams kyis stong pas/de ltar na dngos po dngos pos stong ngo //ji ltar na dngos po med pa dngos po med pas stong zhe na/dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni/'dus ma byas te/'dus ma byas de'ang 'dus ma
305a5(nyi khri): byas kyis stong pas/de ltar na dngos po med pa dngos po med pas stong ngo //ji ltar na rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong zhe na/rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni/ngo bo nyid ma nor ba ste/de la stong pa nyid gang
305a6(nyi khri): yin pa de ni shes pas ma byas/mthong bas ma byas te/'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//de la gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin
305a7(nyi khri): gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan
305b1(nyi khri): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste/de ltar chos de dag gzhan gyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya ste/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub
305b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/'di lta ste/dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rin chen phyag
305b3(nyi khri): rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /seng ge rnam par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams
305b4(nyi khri): cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos kyi dbyings su nges
305b5(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
305b6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yang dag
305b7(nyi khri): par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
306a1(nyi khri): /phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams
306a2(nyi khri): cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha' rgyus par 'gongs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rgyal
306a3(nyi khri): mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyun zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa
306a4(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /tshol ba med
306a5(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
306a6(nyi khri): dang /'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
306a7(nyi khri): 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
306b1(nyi khri): dang /mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'jig
306b2(nyi khri): ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snang ba
306b3(nyi khri): gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i
