334a4(nyi khri): sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu'i gnas med de de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/gzhan
334a5(nyi khri): su'ang rung ste/'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/de la bdag bde ba thob
334a6(nyi khri): pa dang /bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/tshangs pa'i
334a7(nyi khri): 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dom/tshangs pa 'am/gzhan sus kyang rung ste/chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu
334b1(nyi khri): bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
334b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /nges pa'i
334b3(nyi khri): tshigs so so yang dag par rig pa dang /spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//
334b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'odi ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de/bco brgyad gang zhe na/gang gi nam la de bzhin
334b5(nyi khri): gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /gang gi nam la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs po dang
334b6(nyi khri): bcas pa/dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dogu dang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa/sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis rjes su bstan te/phung po ma lus pa'i
334b7(nyi khri): mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i bar du/de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o//ca co mi mnga'o//dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o//
335a1(nyi khri): 'du shes sna tshogs ma mnga'o//thugs mnyam par ma bzhug pa mi mngon//ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mang 'o//mos pa yongs su nyams pa ma~M ma ga/ /
335a2(nyi khri): 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//rnam
335a3(nyi khri): par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ye shes
335a4(nyi khri): kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/
335a5(nyi khri): shes kyi rjes su 'byung ngo 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go//ma 'ongs pa'i dus lam thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug
335a6(nyi khri): go//da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa ste/rab 'byor 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
335a7(nyi khri): po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/de'ang yi ge mnyam pa
335b1(nyi khri): nyid dang /brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang /yi ge'i sgo dang /yi ge la 'jug pa ste/de la yi ge'i sgo dang /yi ge la 'jug pa gang zhe na/a zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgra'o//
335b2(nyi khri): ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa stong pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//tsa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/
335b3(nyi khri): chos thams cad 'chi 'pho dang skye ba med pas/chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//na zhes bya ba ni ming dang bral zhing /ming gi rang bzhin ma thob ma stor bas/chos thams cad kyi
335b4(nyi khri): sgo'o//lA zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing /srid pa'i 'khri shing dang rgyu dang /rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//dA zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang dul ba'i
335b5(nyi khri): gnas su yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//bA zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//Da zhes bya ba ni dkrugs me dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams
335b6(nyi khri): cad kyi sgo'o//sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pas chags par mi 'gyur ro//'ching bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//ba zhes bya ba ni dog gi lam dang sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir/
335b7(nyi khri): chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//ya zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams
336a1(nyi khri): cad kyi sgo'o//s+thA zhes bya ba ni khengs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sku'o//ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos thams cad rgya skar//
336a2(nyi khri): sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pas/mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//me zhes bya ba ni bdag gi bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi
336a3(nyi khri): sgo'o//ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//tho zhes bya ba ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//dzA zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs pa'i
336a4(nyi khri): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//shwa zhes bya ba ni dbugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad
336a5(nyi khri): kyi sgo'o//sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//kha zhes bya ba ni ni mkha' dang mnyam pas dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//
336a6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba ni zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//sta zhes bya ba ni bstod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//dzA zhes bya ba ni ye shes mi dmigs pa'i
336a7(nyi khri): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//rto zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//b+ha zhes
336b1(nyi khri): bya ba ni 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//tshe zhes bya ba ni mdog mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//sla zhes bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//
336b2(nyi khri): hAhA zhes bya ba ni bong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//tA zhes bya ba ni mos pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//g+ha zhes bya ba ni stug po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams
336b3(nyi khri): cad kyi sgo'o//tha zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//Na zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med pas gang yang 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med de/gnas pa med cing 'dug
336b4(nyi khri): pa med la/nyal bar 'gyur ba med pas/rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//pha zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//skra zhes bya ba ni
336b5(nyi khri): phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//ya zhes bya ba ni mi bde ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams
336b6(nyi khri): cad kyi sgo'o//Ta zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa dang /mthar thug par gnas par 'chi 'pho med cing /skye ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//D+ha zhes bya ba ni g.yog pa
336b7(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/de yan chad ni yi ge tha snyad med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang la yang gang gis tha snyad du bya ba dang /gang gis brjod
337a1(nyi khri): pa dang /gang gis bstan pa dang /gang bri ba dang /gang snang ba dang /gleng bklag par bya ba de lta bu'i ming gang yang med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/chos thams
337a2(nyi khri): cad ni dper na/nam mkha' bzhin du khongs su chud par bya ste/rab 'byor 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa/a la sogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor byang chub
337a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis/a la sogs pa'i yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di yongs su shes na/de ni sgra gang la'ang chags par mi 'gyur zhing /thams cad chos nyid
337a4(nyi khri): kyis yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur te/sgra shes par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang gis/a la sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag
337a5(nyi khri): rgya 'di dang /a la sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos te/thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed cing /gzhan
337a6(nyi khri): la'ang tshul dang ldan pa'i blos ston na/de la legs pa nyi shu yod par shes par bya'o//nyi shu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dran pa dang ldan/blo gros dang ldan/rtogs pa dang ldan/blo
337a7(nyi khri): dang ldan dga' ba dang ldan/ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan/spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /gzungs kyi sgo 'di'ang nyon mongs pa med par 'thob cing /the tshom med par 'gyur la/
337b1(nyi khri): gzhon las sgra'i ngag snyan pa thos kyang chags par 'gyur ba med cing /zhe gcod pa'i tshig thos kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur bas/mtho ba med cing dma' ba med de/tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur/
337b2(nyi khri): ba dang /sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /bden pa la mkhas par
337b3(nyi khri): 'gyur ba dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa ste/rgya la mkhas shing rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /chos nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /dbang po rab dang tha ma shes par
337b4(nyi khri): bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /lha'i rna ba'i shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /pha rol gyi sems shes par bya ba
337b5(nyi khri): la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /zag pa zad pa shes
337b6(nyi khri): par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /gnas dang gnas ma yin pa bstan pa shes par bya ba mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /'gro ba la mkhas shing ldog pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /spyod
337b7(nyi khri): /lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /khrel yod pa dang /ngo tsha shes pa la mkhas pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur te/rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo a la sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa 'di'ang de mi
338a1(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u dgu pa'o//
338a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor gang yang khyod 'di skad du ji ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
338a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /sa nas sar 'phar te/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /sa
338a4(nyi khri): nas sar 'phar ba yin zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad 'pho ba med pas/chos gang yang 'ong ba med cing /'gro ba med de/'pho ba 'am nye bar 'pho ba med do//'on kyang chos
338a5(nyi khri): thams cad kyis gang yin pa de la rlom sems su byed pa 'am/sems pa med par sa yongs su sbyong ba'ang mi byed pa ma yin las de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de la
338a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyong ba gang zhe na/rab 'byor sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos su yongs su sbyang ba
338a7(nyi khri): bcu po 'di dag bya ste/bcu gang zhe na/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir/phan pa'i dngos
338b1(nyi khri): po yongs su sbyang zhing /sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang /sbyin pa dang /gtong ba dang /len pa mi dmigs///
338b2(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /des rlom sems su mi bya ba'i phyir/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos
338b3(nyi khri): btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /khyim mi dmigs pa'i phyir yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /mtshan dang /dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas
338b4(nyi khri): kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /chos kyi rnam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /chos kyi yang dag pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/nga rgyal dang khengs
338b5(nyi khri): pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /tshig mi dmigs pa'i phyir bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba ste/rab 'byor yongs su sbyang ba bcu po de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
338b6(nyi khri): sa dang po la gnas pas bya ba dag go/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnyis po la gnas pas/chos brgyad po 'di dag yang dang yang yid la bya zhing /de dag la
338b7(nyi khri): na tan du bya'o//brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /byas pa shes shing drin du bzo ba dang /bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa dang /rab tu dgo' zhing spro ba myong
339a1(nyi khri): bar bya ba dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba dang /snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang /bla ma la bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba dang /pha rol
339a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba ste/rab 'byor chos brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas/yang dang yang yid la bya zhing de dag
339a3(nyi khri): la nan tan du bya ba dag go//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas/chos lnga la gnas par bya ste/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
339a4(nyi khri): mang du thos pas mi ngoms shing /de la'ang yi ge la mngon par ma zhen pa dang /zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed cing des kyang rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas
339a5(nyi khri): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo'ang des rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang /dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med cing /des kyang rlom
339a6(nyi khri): sems su mi 'gyur ba dang /ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas kyang /des rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba ste/rab 'byor chos lnga po de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
339a7(nyi khri): chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas gnas par bya ba dag go/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas/chos bcu po 'di dag yongs
339b1(nyi khri): su blangs shing gnas par bya ste/de dag yongs su btang bar mi bya'o//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dgon pa la gnas pa dang /'dod pa chung ba dang /chog shes pa dang /sbyangs pa'i
339b2(nyi khri): yon tan gyi sdom pa mi btang ba dang /bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba dang /'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa dang /ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /rdzas thams
339b3(nyi khri): cad yongs su btang ba dang /sems zhum pa med pa dang /dngos po thams cad la bltos pa med pa ste/rab 'byor chos bcu po de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bzhi pa
339b4(nyi khri): la gnas pas/yongs su btang bar mi bya zhing /yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba dag go//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lnga pa la gnas pas/chos
339b5(nyi khri): drug po 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya ste/drug gang zhe na/'di ltar khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /dge slong ma dang bstan pa dang /rigs la ser sna byed pa dang /'du
339b6(nyi khri): 'dzi'i gnas dang /gnod sems dang /bdag bstod cing gzhan smod pa ste/chos drug po de dag ni yongs su spang bar bya'o//yang chos brgyad yongs su spang bar bya ste/'di ltar mi
339b7(nyi khri): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o//lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang khengs pa dang /phyin ci log rnams dang /the tshom dang 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug
340a1(nyi khri): nyam rang su gzhug pa yongs su spang bar bya'o//chos brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lnga pa la gnas pas yongs su spang bar bya'o//rab 'byor
340a2(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos drug pa la gnas pas/chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/gzhan yang tshos drug yongs su
340a3(nyi khri): spang bar bya ste/drug gang zhe na/nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o//rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o//sred pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o//slong
340a4(nyi khri): mo pa mthong na zhums pa med par bya ste/zhums pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o//dngos po thams cad yongs su btang pos yid mi bde bar mi bya ste/yid mi bde ba yongs su
340a5(nyi khri): spang bar bya'o//slongs mo pa mthong na slongs mo pas 'khrug par mi bya ste/'khrug pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o//rab 'byor chos drug po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
340a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos drug pa la gnas pas yongs su spang bar bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu mi bya ste/nyi shu gang
340a7(nyi khri): zhe na/'di lta ste/bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o//sems can du 'dzin pa dang /srog tu 'dzin pa dang /gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang /chad par 'dzin pa dang /rtag par 'dzin pa dang /
340b1(nyi khri): mtshan ma'i 'du shes dang /rgyur lta ba dang /ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags pa dang /phung po la mngon par chags pa dang /khams la mngon par chags pa dang /skye mchod la mngon par
340b2(nyi khri): chags pa dang /khams gsum la mngon par chags pa dang /khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa dang /khams gsum la brten pa dang /khams gsum la gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas
340b3(nyi khri): la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /tshul khrims la brten
340b4(nyi khri): pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhus par 'gyur ba dang /stong pa nyid dang 'gal ba ste rab 'byor chos nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
340b5(nyi khri): bdun pa la gnas pas mi bya'o des chos nyi shu po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/nyi shu gang zhe na/'di lta ste stong pa nyid rtogs par bya ba dang mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba dang /smon pa
340b6(nyi khri): med pa shes par bya ba dang //'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang /sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba dang /sems can de dag la brnyas par mi bya ba dang /chos thams
340b7(nyi khri): cad mnyam pa nyid du lta ba yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs shing /des rlom sems su mi bya ba dang /mi skye ba la bzod pa dang /mi skye ba shes pa dang /chos thams cad tshul gcig tu
341a1(nyi khri): bstan pa dang /rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba dang /lta ba rnam par bzlog pa dang /nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis dang /
341a2(nyi khri): dul ba'i sems dang /zhi ba'i sems dang /thogs pa med pa dang /byams pa'i skabs shes pa dang /gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba ste/rab 'byor chos nyi shu po de dag ni byang
341a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdun pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la
341a4(nyi khri): gnas pas/chos bzhi po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/bani gang zhe na/'di ltar/sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chub par bya ba dang /mngon par shes
341a5(nyi khri): pas rnam par rtse ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su bsgrub pa dang /sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing /sangs rgyas kyi sku yang
341a6(nyi khri): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtag pa ste/rab 'byor chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//rab 'byor
341a7(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brgyad po la gnas pas chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dbang po rab dang /tho ma shes
341b1(nyi khri): pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba dang /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag pa dang /sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur
341b2(nyi khri): ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ched du bsam zhing srid pa nye bar len pa ste/rab 'byor chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la
341b3(nyi khri): gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dgu pa la gnas pas/chos bcu gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/
341b4(nyi khri): bcu gnyis gang zhe na/'di ltar smon lam mtha' yas pa yongs su bzung ste/ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /lha dang /klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
341b5(nyi khri): dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa dang /yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes pa dang /ma'i
341b6(nyi khri): mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /rgyud phun sum tshogs pa dang /rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /tshe phun
341b7(nyi khri): sum tshogs pa dang /mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang /yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/
342a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor chos bcu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//rab 'byor sa bcu pa la gnas
342a2(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
342a3(nyi khri): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa yongs su spang ba gang lags/bcom ldan
342a4(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po yongs su
342a5(nyi khri): dag par sdud pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyar ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can
342a6(nyi khri): thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/tshad med pa bzhi po byams pa dang /snying rje
342a7(nyi khri): dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms mngon por bsgrub pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang
342b1(nyi khri): ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ste/'di ni
342b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe
342b3(nyi khri): no/'di lta ste/gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par bskul po dang /gzhog pa dang /rab tu gzhog par byed pa de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
342b4(nyi khri): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la bsten pa dang /rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
342b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/rnam pa
342b6(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas chos 'chol zhing /nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
342b7(nyi khri): po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/tshe rabs thams cad du 'du 'ji
343a1(nyi khri): med par 'byung zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung yang /de la bar chad byed pa gang yang med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
343a2(nyi khri): chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/sangs rgyas
343a3(nyi khri): kyisku mthong nas/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ste/'di ni byang chub
343a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba
343a5(nyi khri): gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/sems can rnams la chos ston cing //
343a6(nyi khri): thog mar yang dge bar du yang dge/tha mar yang dge/yi ge bzang po/don bzang po/ma 'dres pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/yongs su dag pa/yongs su byang ba/tshangs
343a7(nyi khri): pa'i spyod pa 'di lta ste/mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /lung bstan pa dang tshigs su bcad pa dang /ched du brjod pa dang /gleng gzhi dang /'di ltar 'das pa dang skyes
343b1(nyi khri): pa'i rabs dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /rmad du byung ba dang /rtogs pa brjod pa dang /gtan la phab par bstan pa dag yang dag par ston pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
343b2(nyi khri): chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su spang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang /khengs pa bsal ba yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/nga rgyal dang khengs pa ji
343b3(nyi khri): ltar bsal ba des/nam yang rigs dma' bar mi skye bo 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang khengs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o///
343b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//ngom po bco brgyad po//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ji skad du
343b5(nyi khri): smras pa de ltar byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba'o//rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la
343b6(nyi khri): gnas pa'i yongs su sbyang ba bcu'o//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nyan thos dang /rang
343b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi sems yid la mi byed cing /de ma yin pa tshul khrims ngan par byed pa dang byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba'i chos gzhan dag kyang yid la mi byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub
344a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba grang /
344a2(nyi khri): zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/phan pa chung ngu zhig byas kyang 'khor ba zad kyi bar du chud mi gzon na mang po lta ci smos te/
344a3(nyi khri): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa gang zhe na/sems can
344a4(nyi khri): thams cad la gnod sems med cing /'tshe ba med pa'i sems te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
344a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
344a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga'i zhing spro ba myong bar bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na/'di ltar
344a7(nyi khri): sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'o//de la byang chub sems
344b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/'di snyam du sems shing /bdag gis
344b2(nyi khri): sems can re re'i don du'ang /bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/sems can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bkod kyi bar du de dag
344b3(nyi khri): tu gtub cing gshegs pa dang /brdung zhing btso ba dang /bsreg pa la sogs pa nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam nas/de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don du spro zhing skyo ba med pa ste/'di ni
344b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma la bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba gang zhe na/'di
344b5(nyi khri): ltar bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes su byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma la bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'
344b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing 'tshol ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/las gzhan med par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/las gzhan
344b7(nyi khri): med par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su 'tshol ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing 'tshal ba'o//de la byang chub sems
345a1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi dmas pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rnam bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/phyogs bcu ldan
345a2(nyi khri): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gang ci bstan pa de dag thams cad yongs su bzung bar bya'o zhes mi ngoms pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi
345a3(nyi khri): ngoms pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe///
345a4(nyi khri): chos kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub tu'ang re ba med pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o//de la byang chub
345a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang gis/sangs rgyas
345a6(nyi khri): kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i tshe/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
345a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor
345b1(nyi khri): bos yongs su skyo ba med pa gang zhe na/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar bstan na/sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
345b2(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du/nam yang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag
345b3(nyi khri): tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nyan thos dang /rang
345b4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
345b5(nyi khri): dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas
345b6(nyi khri): pa yongs su mi gtang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub la'ang 'dod pa mi skyed
345b7(nyi khri): pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga shes pa gang zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mabyin/
346a1(nyi khri): pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga shes pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
346a2(nyi khri): sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi gtang ba gang zhe na/'di ltar chos zab mo rnams la rtogs par gzhog pa'i bzod pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i
346a3(nyi khri): yon tan gyi sdom pa mi gtong ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na/bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/'di ni byang chub
346a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na/'dod pa'i sems mi skyed pa
346a5(nyi khri): ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang
346a6(nyi khri): zhen/'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'o//de la byang chub
346a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba gang zhe na/phyi nang gi chos thams cad la 'dzin pa med pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas
346b1(nyi khri): thams cad yongs su gtang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa gang zhe na/rnam par shes pa gnas pa la/de'i sems mi gnas pa ste/'di ni byeng/
346b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la bltos pa med pa gang zhe na/dngos po thams cad yid
346b3(nyi khri): la mi byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la bltos pa med pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs
346b4(nyi khri): su spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing brdzus te skye ba dang /mgo bregs shing /ngur smrig gi gos bgo ba ste/'di ni byang chub
346b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/dge
346b6(nyi khri): slong ma dang se gol gtogs pa tsam du'ang lhan cig mi gnas shing /de'i rgyus yongs su skom pa'i sems mi skyed de/de'i rgyus gos 'thob par mi byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa'
346b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/rab 'byor
347a1(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/gang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba de dang /
347a2(nyi khri): sems can 'di dag rang rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur na/de la bdag gis sor sna'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
347a3(nyi khri): po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/byang chub
347a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas/nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas yod pa'am de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/de dang ldan pa'i sems
347a5(nyi khri): bskyed pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas par mi bya ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas
347a6(nyi khri): yongs su spong ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/gnod sems dang /'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs
347a7(nyi khri): mi 'byed cing /'thab mo'i sems som/rtsod pa'i sems kyi go mi 'byed pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o//de la
347b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
347b2(nyi khri): chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spong ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su
347b3(nyi khri): mi mthong ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi
347b4(nyi khri): lam yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la'ang bar du gcod na/'phags pa'i lam la lta ci smos te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la lta smos
347b5(nyi khri): kyang ci dgos kyis/spang bar bya'o zhes sbyong ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub
347b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med na/gang gis nga rgyal du
347b7(nyi khri): 'gyur ba'i lhag pa lta ci smos zhes nga rgyal du mi byed pa ste 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub
348a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na de ni 'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po'ang yang dag par
348a2(nyi khri): rjes su mi mthong ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci
348a3(nyi khri): log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/dngos por mi dmigs pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//de la
348a4(nyi khri): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba yin zhe na/de ni 'di ltar des 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang
348a5(nyi khri): dang /gau ti mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor
348a6(nyi khri): ba'o//de la sa drug la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
348a7(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/de ci'i
348b1(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams shes par bya ba'i rgya
348b2(nyi khri): mtsho lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to//byin to//phyin par 'gyur ro//lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba dang /brjod du med pa dang /'dus
348b3(nyi khri): ma byas te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
348b4(nyi khri): chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o//'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas//
348b5(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o//'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas srid pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o//'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin
348b6(nyi khri): pas/slong mo pa mthong na sems zhum pa mi bskyed do//'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya'o//'di ltar de//
348b7(nyi khri): ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/thog ma sems bskyed nas/kha zo yag gi sems su mi bya'i/sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
349a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di
349a2(nyi khri): ltar bdag shin tu med pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na sems can dang /srog dang /gang zag tu 'dzin
349a3(nyi khri): par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de dag shin tu med pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can dang /srog dang /gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o//de la
349a4(nyi khri): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir/chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir
349a5(nyi khri): te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya zhe
349a6(nyi khri): na/de ni 'di ltar chos gang la skye ba med pa de la/rtag pa dang chad pa med pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya'o//de la
349a7(nyi khri): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu med pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems
349b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur blta bar mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar lta ba de yang
349b2(nyi khri): dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur blta bar mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming
349b3(nyi khri): dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar des de'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming
349b4(nyi khri): dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/phung po dang /skye mched dang /khams la mngon par chags par
349b5(nyi khri): mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos de dag shin tu med pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/phung po dang /skye mched dang /khams la mngon par chags par
349b6(nyi khri): mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khamos gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang
349b7(nyi khri): chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon
350a1(nyi khri): par zhen par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon
350a2(nyi khri): bapar zhen par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten pa dang gnas par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med pa'i
350a3(nyi khri): phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten pa dang gnas par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs
350a4(nyi khri): rgyorgyas la brten po'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten pas/sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub
350a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la brten
350a6(nyi khri): pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos su lta ba la brten pas/chos mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
350a7(nyi khri): chen pos chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon
350b1(nyi khri): par chags par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas/dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge
350b2(nyi khri): 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon pos tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi
350b3(nyi khri): bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la brten pas/tshul khrims rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la
350b4(nyi khri): brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad
350b5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyis/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar/
350b6(nyi khri): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa bas/stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal byar mi byed pa'i
350b7(nyi khri): phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
351a1(nyi khri): par bya ba yin zhe na/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o//de la ji
351a2(nyi khri): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba yin zhe na/'di lta ste/mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi byed pa'i phyir te/de ni byang chub
351a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa yin zhe na/de ni khams
351a4(nyi khri): gsum thams cad du sems mi 'jug pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
351a5(nyi khri): po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su
351a6(nyi khri): dag pa'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na/snying rje chen po rab tu
351a7(nyi khri): 'thob pa ste/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang
351b1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
351b2(nyi khri): pos sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na/chos thams cad la
351b3(nyi khri): bsnan pa dang /dbri ba med pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta bas so//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
351b4(nyi khri): yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa gang zhe na/chos thams cad tshul gcig tu rtogs kyang /rtogs pa med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rab
351b5(nyi khri): tu rtogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma skye ba la bzod pa gang zhe na/chos thams cad skye bo med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med
351b6(nyi khri): pa la bzod pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ming dang
351b7(nyi khri): gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig
352a1(nyi khri): tu bstan pa gang zhe na/gnyis la yongs su rgyu ba med pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//de la byang chub sems
352a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba gang zhe na/chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag
352a3(nyi khri): par bsal ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa gang zhe na/nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis rnam par spong ba ste/de ni byang
352a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa gang zhe na/bag chags
352a5(nyi khri): kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
352a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te/de ni byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po'i zhi
352a7(nyi khri): gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems gang zhe na/khams gsum la dga' bar sems pa med pa ste/de ni byang chub
352b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems so//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems gang zhe na/dbang po drug yang dag par 'dus pa ste/de ni byang chub sems
352b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems so//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa ste/de ni
352b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes so//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa gang zhe na/skye mched drug gi
352b4(nyi khri): btang snyoms te/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'o zhing du 'gro ba
352b5(nyi khri): gang zhe na/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu lus ston pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'
352b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud pa gang zhe na/sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung po rab tu shes pa'o//de
352b7(nyi khri): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse ba gang zhe na/mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par brtse zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
353a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas blta ba'i don du 'gro yang /de la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
353a2(nyi khri): po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba gang zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na 'dug cing dpag
353a3(nyi khri): tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong yang /de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta
353a4(nyi khri): ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
353a5(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gtong zhing /des rlom sems su mi
353a6(nyi khri): byed pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du bsgrub pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
353a7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba gang zhe na/sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du chos la bsnyen bkur ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
353b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/chos kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba
353b2(nyi khri): bzhin du rtogs par byed pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
353b3(nyi khri): chen po'i dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa gang zhe na/stobs bcu la gnas shing /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa'
353b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/mi dmigs pa'i tshul
353b5(nyi khri): gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'
353b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gong zhe na/ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bya ba thams cad byed kyang /de'i
353b7(nyi khri): sems chos gang la'ang mi 'jug pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
354a1(nyi khri): yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/de ni byang chub sems
354a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag pa'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba/ji lta
354a3(nyi khri): ji ltar 'grub pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su grub pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams ji lta ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur
354a4(nyi khri): ba/de lta de ltar ched du bsams shing /lus yongs su 'dzin pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba/ji lta
354a5(nyi khri): ji ltar 'grub pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su grub pa'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa yin zhe na/'di
354a6(nyi khri): lta ste/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa'o de la ji ltar na byang
354a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar smon pa/de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa
354b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir te/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o//de la ji ltar na
354b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes
354b3(nyi khri): par bya ba khong du chud par bya ba yin zhe na/'di lta ste/nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams
354b4(nyi khri): cad kyi skad shes par bya bo khong du chud pa'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin
354b5(nyi khri): zhe na/'di lta ste/spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes
354b6(nyi khri): par bya ba rtogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe rabs
354b7(nyi khri): thams cad du brdzus shing skye ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum
355a1(nyi khri): tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs chen por skye ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum
355a2(nyi khri): tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/bram
355a3(nyi khri): ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum
355a4(nyi khri): tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi rigs sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung bar gyur pa de'i rigs su skye ba ste/de ni byang chub sems
355a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
355a6(nyi khri): chen po'i byang chub la sems can rnams bkod cing /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum
355a7(nyi khri): tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes ma thag tu/'jig rten gyi
355b1(nyi khri): khams snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
355b2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir/sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu
355b3(nyi khri): mngon par 'byung zhing /sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum la nges par 'byung ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang
355b4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba gser gyi rgyu las byung ba
355b5(nyi khri): yin/lhun bai DUr+yar 'dug pa yin/yal ga rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin las grub pa yin/me tog dang /lo ma rin po che thams cad las gyur pa yin/shing de'i dri zhim po dang /
355b6(nyi khri): 'od bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gang ba yin te/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o//de
355b7(nyi khri): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs
356a1(nyi khri): su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs
356a2(nyi khri): pa phun sum tshogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
356a3(nyi khri): po gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ///
356a4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /snying
356a5(nyi khri): rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa ni de
356a6(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu gang zhe na/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
356a7(nyi khri): thabs mkhas pas/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
356b1(nyi khri): dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
356b2(nyi khri): pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs
356b3(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag
356b4(nyi khri): par 'da'/rigs kyi sa dang /brgyad pa'i sa dang /mthong ba'i sa dang /bsrabs pa'i sa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang
356b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa las yang dag par 'das te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa dgu las yongs su 'das pa nas/
356b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i so bcu pa'o//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg
356b7(nyi khri): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor khyod kyis gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa de ni/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
357a1(nyi khri): khams gsum nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang
357a2(nyi khri): yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med
357a3(nyi khri): pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos ni 'byung ba 'am/'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/byung bar gyur
357a4(nyi khri): pa med de/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung
357a5(nyi khri): par 'dod pa de ni/de bzhin nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/yang dag pa'i mtha' 'byung bar 'dong du zad do//rab
357a6(nyi khri): 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung
357a7(nyi khri): bar 'dod pa de ni/nam mkha'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings 'byung
357b1(nyi khri): bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rab tu byung ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
357b2(nyi khri): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/'gog pa'i dbyings
357b3(nyi khri): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i
357b4(nyi khri): chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/tshor ba stong pa nyid dang 'du shes stong pa nyid dang /'du byed stong pa nyid dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir
357b5(nyi khri): zhe na/rab 'byor gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//tshor ba stong pa nyid dang 'du shes stong pa nyid dang //
357b6(nyi khri): 'du byed stong pa nyid dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar
357b7(nyi khri): gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med
358a1(nyi khri): /pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mig stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rna ba
358a2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /sna stong pa nyid dang /lce stong pa nyid dang /lus stong pa nyid dang /yid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mig stong pa nyid ni
358a3(nyi khri): khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rna ba stong pa nyid dang /sna stong pa nyid dang /lce stong pa nyid dang /lus stong pa nyid dang /yid
358a4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mig mig gis stong pa'i phyir ro//rna ba
358a5(nyi khri): dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar
358a6(nyi khri): 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/sgra stong pa nyid dang /dri stong pa nyid dang /ro stong pa nyid dang /reg stong pa nyid dang /
358a7(nyi khri): chos stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
358b1(nyi khri): gnas pa med do//sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de
358b2(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
358b3(nyi khri): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rna ba'i rnam
358b4(nyi khri): par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong
358b5(nyi khri): pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
358b6(nyi khri): gnas pa med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong
358b7(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe
359a1(nyi khri): na/'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par
359a2(nyi khri): shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas sbyong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
359a3(nyi khri): 'dod pa de ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med po'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
359a4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid
359a5(nyi khri): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
359a6(nyi khri): gnas pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa
359a7(nyi khri): nyid dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/
359b1(nyi khri): 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg
359b2(nyi khri): pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
359b3(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /
359b4(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /yid kyi
359b5(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
359b6(nyi khri): nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rno ba'i 'dus te reg po'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong
359b7(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong
360a1(nyi khri): pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
360a2(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus
360a3(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir
360a4(nyi khri): ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rmi lam 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod po de
360a5(nyi khri): ni/sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /sgra brnyan dang /mig yor dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rmi lam ni khams
360a6(nyi khri): gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /sgra brnyan dang /migo yor dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul
360a7(nyi khri): pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rmi lam ni rmi lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
360b1(nyi khri): sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /sgra brnyan dang /mig yor dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i
360b2(nyi khri): chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
360b3(nyi khri): dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i
360b4(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
360b5(nyi khri): dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas
360b6(nyi khri): 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
360b7(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
361a1(nyi khri): ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
361a2(nyi khri): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/phyi stong pa nyid 'byung
361a3(nyi khri): bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/phyi nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid medang
361a4(nyi khri): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni khams
361a5(nyi khri): gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//phyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
361a6(nyi khri): du gnas pa med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
361a7(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa
361b1(nyi khri): nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
361b2(nyi khri): du/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'byung bar
361b3(nyi khri): 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs
361b4(nyi khri): rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
361b5(nyi khri): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang dbang po rnams dang /
361b6(nyi khri): stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
361b7(nyi khri): gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//yang dag
362a1(nyi khri): par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag/
362a2(nyi khri): brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/'phags
362a3(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis
362a4(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden
362a5(nyi khri): pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo//
362a6(nyi khri): bo nyid dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid/
362a7(nyi khri): dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//de ci'i
362b1(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba'i phyir ro//bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /tshang med
362b2(nyi khri): pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i
362b3(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
362b4(nyi khri): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mngon par shes pa
362b5(nyi khri): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni
362b6(nyi khri): khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/mngon
362b7(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i/
363a1(nyi khri): phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//mi 'jigs
363a2(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs
363a3(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang /so so yang dag/
363a4(nyi khri): par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas
363a5(nyi khri): pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong
363a6(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro//mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni/sangs rgyas
363a7(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa
