363b1(nyi khri): skye bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rang sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
363b2(nyi khri): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
363b3(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam
363b4(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
363b5(nyi khri): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/dgra bcom pa'i ngo
363b6(nyi khri): bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
363b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
364a1(nyi khri): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /lam gyi rnam pa
364a2(nyi khri): shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba
364a3(nyi khri): med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub
364a4(nyi khri): dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor
364a5(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang //
364a6(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/rnam pa thams
364a7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ming 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor
364b1(nyi khri): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/brda 'byung bar
364b2(nyi khri): 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/tha snyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
364b3(nyi khri): 'dod pa de ni/gdags pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor ming stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas/
364b4(nyi khri): pa med do//mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//brda stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//
364b5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//tha snyad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//gdags pa
364b6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar ming stong pa nyid ni ming stong pa nyid kyi
364b7(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//brda stong pa nyid ni brda stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
365a1(nyi khri): tha snyad stong pa nyid ni tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//gdags pa stong pa nyid ni gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//ra
365a2(nyi khri): 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/skye ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa
365a3(nyi khri): de ni 'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor//
365a4(nyi khri): skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang //
365a5(nyi khri): rnam par byang ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de
365a6(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar skye ba med pa ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /
365a7(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar rnam grangs nges na/'di ltar theg pa chen po ni khams gsum
365b1(nyi khri): nas 'byung ba med/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med par shes par bya ste/gnas pa med pa de ni bskyod du med pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong /
365b2(nyi khri): phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po bcu dgu pa//rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis gang 'di skad du/theg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa de/theg pa chen po de gang
365b3(nyi khri): du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir mi gnas pa ste/rab 'byor de ltar theg pa chen po de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul
365b4(nyi khri): gyis gnas so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa 'ong ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma
365b5(nyi khri): yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas
365b6(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la gnas
365b7(nyi khri): pa'am/mi gnas pa med do//de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i
366a1(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
366a2(nyi khri): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab
366a3(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/nam mkha'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi
366a4(nyi khri): gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de bzhin du theg pa chen po
366a5(nyi khri): de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/rab tu byang ba'i dbyings dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang //
366a6(nyi khri): 'gog pa'i dbyings la ni gnas pa 'am/mi gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe
366a7(nyi khri): na/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/mi gnas pa med do//'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings dang /rab tu byang ba'i dbyings dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i
366b1(nyi khri): dbyings dang /'gog pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin
366b2(nyi khri): gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab tu byang ba'i dbyings rab tu byang ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin
366b3(nyi khri): gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//'gog pa'i dbyings 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang
366b4(nyi khri): bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/gzugs stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen
366b5(nyi khri): po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnos pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /'du shes stong pa nyid dang /'du byed stong pa nyid dang //
366b6(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ong ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma
366b7(nyi khri): yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am/mi gnas pa med do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par
367a1(nyi khri): shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ba'i phyir ro//tshor
367a2(nyi khri): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mig stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/
367a3(nyi khri): mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mo gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rna ba stong pa nyid dang //
367a4(nyi khri): sna stong pa nyid dang /lce stong pa nyid dang /lus stong pa nyid dang /yid stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa
367a5(nyi khri): chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mig gi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//rna ba dang /sna dang //
367a6(nyi khri): lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar mig mig gis stong pa'i phyir ro//rna ba
367a7(nyi khri): dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gzugs stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas
367b1(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sgra stong pa nyid dang /dri stong pa nyid dang /ro/
367b2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /reg stong pa nyid dang /chos stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas
367b3(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos kyi ngo bo nyid la
367b4(nyi khri): ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos
367b5(nyi khri): chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du
367b6(nyi khri): theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'o
367b7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes po stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin
368a1(nyi khri): du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa
368a2(nyi khri): 'am mi gnas pa med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes
368a3(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rna ba'i
368a4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas
368a5(nyi khri): stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen
368a6(nyi khri): po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /
368a7(nyi khri): lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//
368b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi
368b2(nyi khri): gnas pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas
368b3(nyi khri): pa'am mi gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te
368b4(nyi khri): reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/mig/
368b5(nyi khri): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas
368b6(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /lce'i
368b7(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma
369a1(nyi khri): yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
369a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang /sna'i 'dus
369a3(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang /yid kyi
369a4(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
369a5(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te
369a6(nyi khri): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong
369a7(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rmi lam ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma
369b1(nyi khri): yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang sgra brnyan dang mig yor dang gzugs brnyan dang /sprul pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas
369b2(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas
369b3(nyi khri): pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang /sgra brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid dang mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid dang /gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid dang /de bzhin
369b4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rmi lam rmi lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//sgyu ma sgyu mas stong pa'i
369b5(nyi khri): phyir ro//smig rgyu smig rgyus stong pa'i phyir ro//sgra brnyan sgra brnyan gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//migo yor mig yor gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//gzugs brnyan gzugs brnyan gyis
369b6(nyi khri): stong pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnas
369b7(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
370a1(nyi khri): na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
370a2(nyi khri): pab dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas
370a3(nyi khri): paba'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/mi gnas pa med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
370a4(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/
370a5(nyi khri): mi gnas pa med do//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin/
370a6(nyi khri): ba dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/shes robo
370a7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nang stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du
370b1(nyi khri): thog pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas
370b2(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni
370b3(nyi khri): gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar nang
370b4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di
370b5(nyi khri): lta ste/dper na/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas
370b6(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub
370b7(nyi khri): kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma
371a1(nyi khri): yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do/yang dag
371a2(nyi khri): par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
371a3(nyi khri): brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong
371a4(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags
371a5(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni gnas pa'ang ma
371a6(nyi khri): yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/bsam gtan
371a7(nyi khri): rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
371b1(nyi khri): dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin//
371b2(nyi khri): mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo nyid la
371b3(nyi khri): ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
371b4(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo
371b5(nyi khri): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong pa'i
371b6(nyi khri): phyir ro//bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
371b7(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi
372a1(nyi khri): sgo rnams/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ma
372a2(nyi khri): gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/mi 'jigs pa
372a3(nyi khri): bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa
372a4(nyi khri): chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa
372a5(nyi khri): med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do///
372a6(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so
372a7(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper
372b1(nyi khri): na/dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rang sangs rgyas ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du
372b2(nyi khri): theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//rang sangs
372b3(nyi khri): rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid/dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rang
372b4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid/rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma
372b5(nyi khri): yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas
372b6(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dada'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo ma nyid
372b7(nyi khri): la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid/byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin
373a1(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis sbyong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni gnas pa'ang
373a2(nyi khri): ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rang byang
373a3(nyi khri): chub ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
373a4(nyi khri): 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni
373a5(nyi khri): gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do//rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i
373a6(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid/dgra bcom pa nyid
373a7(nyi khri): kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
373b1(nyi khri): ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang
373b2(nyi khri): gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/mi gnas pa med do//rnam pa
373b3(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid/lam gyi rnam pa
373b4(nyi khri): shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
373b5(nyi khri): dper na/ming ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di
373b6(nyi khri): lta ste/dper na/mtshan ma dang /brda dang /tha snyad dang /gdags pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po
373b7(nyi khri): de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor ming gi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//mtshan ma dang /brda dang /
374a1(nyi khri): tha snyad dang /gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor ming gi ngo bo nyid/ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i
374a2(nyi khri): phyir ro//mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//brda'i ngo bo nyid brda'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong po'i phyir ro//tha snyad kyi ngo bo nyid tha snyad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis
374a3(nyi khri): stong pa'i phyir ro//gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/skye ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas
374a4(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/'gag pa med pa dang //
374a5(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byung ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma
374a6(nyi khri): yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas
374a7(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid
374b1(nyi khri): skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid 'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kun nas nyon
374b2(nyi khri): mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na//
374b3(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//
374b4(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i
374b5(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/theg pa chen po de ni mi gnas par gnas pa'i tshul dang /bskyod du med pa'i
374b6(nyi khri): tshul gyis gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med do//rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa des su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/theg pa des su'ang 'byung bar
374b7(nyi khri): 'gyur ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa de gang yin pa dang /gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /gang nas
375a1(nyi khri): 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na/chos gang zhig chos gang
375a2(nyi khri): gis 'byung bar 'gyur/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /sems can dang /srog dang /'gro ba dang /gso ba dang /
375a3(nyi khri): skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed can dang /shed bdag dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//
375a4(nyi khri): mtha' las 'das pas bdag dmigs su med do//mtha' las 'das pas sems can dang /srog dang 'gro ba dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed
375a5(nyi khri): can dang /shed bdag dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/chos kyi dbyings
375a6(nyi khri): dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med do//shin
375a7(nyi khri): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/phung po rnams dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/skye mched dang /khams rnams dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par
375b1(nyi khri): dag pa'i phyir/rton cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
375b2(nyi khri): phyir/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha
375b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
375b4(nyi khri): kyi bar du dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul
375b5(nyi khri): gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/'phags pa'i
375b6(nyi khri): bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
375b7(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su
376a1(nyi khri): med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs
376a2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/rgyun tu zhugs pa dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/len cig phyir
376a3(nyi khri): 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med do//
376a4(nyi khri): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/rgyun tu zhugs
376a5(nyi khri): pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang
376a6(nyi khri): byang chub dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/lam gyi rnam po shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par
376a7(nyi khri): dag pa'i phyir/skye ba med pa dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa
376b1(nyi khri): dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/sngon gyi mtha' dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs
376b2(nyi khri): su med do//shin nu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/da ltar byung ba dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/'ong ba dang /'gro ba dang /gnas pa dang /'chi 'pho dang /
376b3(nyi khri): skye ba dang /'grib pa dang /'phel ba dmigs su med do//gang mi dmigs pas thams cad dmigs su med pa yin zhe na/chos kyi dbyings mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings dmigs/
376b4(nyi khri): su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//de bzhin nyid mi dmigs pas/de
376b5(nyi khri): bzhin nyid dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//yang dag pa'i
376b6(nyi khri): mtha' mi dmigs pas/yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi
376b7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mi dmigs pas/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor bsam
377a1(nyi khri): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//phung po dang /skye mched dang /khams mi
377a2(nyi khri): dmigs pas/phung po dang /skye mched dang /khams dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor phung po dang /skye mched dang /khams dmigs su med pa ni//
377a3(nyi khri): dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs pas/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe
377a4(nyi khri): na/rab 'byor rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pas/
377a5(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang/
377a6(nyi khri): ma yin no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes
377a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med
377b1(nyi khri): pani/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pas/nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor nang spyong
377b2(nyi khri): pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pas/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
377b3(nyi khri): pa nyid dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//dran pa
377b4(nyi khri): nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pas/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa ni//
377b5(nyi khri): dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang
377b6(nyi khri): chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pas/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
377b7(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams
378a1(nyi khri): dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
378a2(nyi khri): pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs
378a3(nyi khri): pas/gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin
378a4(nyi khri): no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pas/
378a5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi
378a6(nyi khri): dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//rgyun tu zhugs pa mi dmigs pas/rgyun tu zhugs pa dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa dmigs su med pa ni//
378a7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa mi dmigs pas dgra bcom pa dmigs su med do///
378b1(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dgra bcom pa dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs pas/rang sangs rgyas dmigs
378b2(nyi khri): su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pas//
378b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//de
378b4(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs pas/de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi
378b5(nyi khri): dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
378b6(nyi khri): bu dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid mi
378b7(nyi khri): dmigs pas/dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma
379a1(nyi khri): / snang chub myo migs pa/rang byu nu ba sasas med/ d+hA byung chub phyogs su du/
379a2(nyi khri): 'ang ma yin/mi dmigs da'ang mo yin no//lam gyi rnam pa shos pa nyid myi dmigs pas/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su med do//de ci phyir zhe na/8
379a3(nyi khri): lam rnam pa shes pa cid dmigs su me ngan/dmigs pad ma yin/mi migs dashA ma yin no//rnamapa thams pang na sbyin pa nyid med rigs pas/rnam pa ma
379a4(nyi khri): rgyung mkhyen pa nyid dmyigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/dmig sna 'ang mA yin/ming dmigs pa'ang bla yin
379a5(nyi khri): ni//spyi ba meng pa mi dmigs pas/skye ba mod pa dmigs su mdzod//deci'i phyir shen/rab 'byor skye ba med pa dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs padang ma yin/ming zigs
379a6(nyi khri): 'du ma yin no//bgag pa med pa mi dmigs pas bgag pa med pa dmigs smra med do//de ci'i phyir zhen/rab 'byor bgag pa med pa dmyigs su meng ba ni/dmigs
379a7(nyi khri): ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa mi dmigs pas/kun nas nyon mongs pa mod pa dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
379b1(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//rnam par byang ba med pa mi dmigs pas/rnam par byang ba med pa dmigs su
379b2(nyi khri): med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rnam par byang ba med pa dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//mngon par 'du bya ba mi dmigs pas/mngon
379b3(nyi khri): par 'du bya ba med pa dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//de
379b4(nyi khri): bzhin du sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /da ltar byung ba dang /'ong ba dang /'gro ba dang /gnas pa dang /'chi 'pho dang /skye ba dang /'grib pa dang /'phel ba
379b5(nyi khri): mi dmigs pas/'phel ba dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'phel ba dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//sa dang
379b6(nyi khri): po mi dmigs pas/sa dang po dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sa dang po dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//sa gnyis
379b7(nyi khri): pa dang /sa gsum pa dang /sa bzhi pa dang /sa lnga pa dang /sa drug pa dang /sa bdun pa dang /sa brgyad pa dang /sa dgu pa dang /sa bcu pa mi dmigs pas/sa bcu
380a1(nyi khri): dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor sa bcu pa dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//de la sa dang po ni
380a2(nyi khri): gang /sa gnyis pa dang /sa gsum pa dang /sa bzhi pa dang /sa lnga pa dang /sa drug pa dang /sa bdun pa dang /sa brgyad pa dang /sa dgu pa dang /sa bcu pa ni gang zhe na/
380a3(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang /rigs kyis dang /brgyad pa'i sa dang /mthong ba'i sa dang /bsrabs pa'i sa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /byas
380a4(nyi khri): pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang sangs rgyas kyis ste nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmigs su med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
380a5(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/sa dang po dmigs su med do//nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu'i bar du dmigs su med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/sa
380a6(nyi khri): bcu'i bar du dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/sa dang po dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs
380a7(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin no//sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa ni/dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/nang stong pa nyid
380b1(nyi khri): kyi phyir/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/sems can yongs su/
380b2(nyi khri): smin par bya ba dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam
380b3(nyi khri): par dag pa nye bar bzung na/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar
380b4(nyi khri): bzung na/nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/mig lnga dmigs su med do//shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/mig lnga dmigs
380b5(nyi khri): su med do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/theg pa chen
380b6(nyi khri): pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga po las le'u bcu pa'o///de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab
380b7(nyi khri): 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das thog pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
381a1(nyi khri): rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur bas/de'i skad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ji ltar
381a2(nyi khri): nam mkha' sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di'ang sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pas/bcom ldan 'das rnam
381a3(nyi khri): grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po ste/theg pa chen po de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba 'am/gnas pa'ang ma mchis/sngon/
381a4(nyi khri): gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus zhes bgyi ba'ang ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na/nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'ang ma mchis
381a5(nyi khri): la/gnas pa'ang ma mchis pa de bzhin du/theg pa chen po 'di la'ang 'gro ba mi dmigs/'ong ba mi dmigs/gnas pa mi dmigs so//bcom ldan 'das 'di
381a6(nyi khri): lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//de bzhin du theg pa chen
381a7(nyi khri): po 'di'ang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/theg pa
381b1(nyi khri): chen po 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa pas/de'i skad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//dang
381b2(nyi khri): bzhin te/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi
381b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/'di
381b4(nyi khri): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/gzungs
381b5(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas/rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge
381b6(nyi khri): 'dzin gyi bar du ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
381b7(nyi khri): ni/'di lta ste/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor
382a1(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
382a2(nyi khri): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa
382a3(nyi khri): bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
382a4(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo
382a5(nyi khri): rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
382a6(nyi khri): 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de ni lha dang /mi dang
382a7(nyi khri): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa ni/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
382b1(nyi khri): 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs yod pa'i khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams te/rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te//
382b2(nyi khri): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang /
382b3(nyi khri): mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor 'dod pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su
382b4(nyi khri): bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas
382b5(nyi khri): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la
382b6(nyi khri): bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma
382b7(nyi khri): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor gzugs kyi khams de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa
383a1(nyi khri): ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin/
383a2(nyi khri): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te gzugs med pa'i khams de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/
383a3(nyi khri): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang
383a4(nyi khri): lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed
383a5(nyi khri): pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther drug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang
383a6(nyi khri): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/byin ci
383a7(nyi khri): log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang //
383b1(nyi khri): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su
383b2(nyi khri): bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
383b3(nyi khri): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/byin
383b4(nyi khri): ci log ma yin la/bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /
383b5(nyi khri): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su
383b6(nyi khri): bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma
383b7(nyi khri): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te mig de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma
384a1(nyi khri): yin la badren pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis
384a2(nyi khri): kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor mig de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs
384a3(nyi khri): su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
384a4(nyi khri): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
384a5(nyi khri): te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po
384a6(nyi khri): 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor yid de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs
384a7(nyi khri): su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
384b1(nyi khri): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin/mnor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang
384b2(nyi khri): dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
384b3(nyi khri): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther
384b4(nyi khri): zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir/theg pa chen po 'das/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//
384b5(nyi khri): rab 'byor gal te sgra dang /dri dang ro dang reg dang /chos de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta
384b6(nyi khri): ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
384b7(nyi khri): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor chos de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin
385a1(nyi khri): 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//
385a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag
385a3(nyi khri): cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lho dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
385a4(nyi khri): cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ra
385a5(nyi khri): zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//
385a6(nyi khri): rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa de
385a7(nyi khri): bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos
385b1(nyi khri): can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par
385b2(nyi khri): shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po
385b3(nyi khri): 'dis/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po nyi shu
385b4(nyi khri): pa/rab 'byor gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag
385b5(nyi khri): cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi/
385b6(nyi khri): 'gyur te/rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can
385b7(nyi khri): te dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang me dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg
386a1(nyi khri): ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lho'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin//
386a2(nyi khri): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na
386a3(nyi khri): ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par
386a4(nyi khri): brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po
386a5(nyi khri): 'dadis/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin/mnor ba
386a6(nyi khri): de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po
386a7(nyi khri): zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te/
386b1(nyi khri): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po
386b2(nyi khri): med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang lha ma yon du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
386b3(nyi khri): tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg
386b4(nyi khri): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi
386b5(nyi khri): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor
386b6(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos
386b7(nyi khri): po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te sa'i khams de bzhin/ma nor ba de
387a1(nyi khri): bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can
387a2(nyi khri): gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor sa'i khams de rnam
387a3(nyi khri): par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po
387a4(nyi khri): 'dis/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /
387a5(nyi khri): nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams de bzhin/ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin
387a6(nyi khri): du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
387a7(nyi khri): 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/rnam par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin
387b1(nyi khri): 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te ma rig pa
387b2(nyi khri): dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang tshor ba dang /sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang /rga shi de bzhin//
387b3(nyi khri): ma nor ba de bzhin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/byin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig/
387b4(nyi khri): yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rga shing rnam par brtags pa/rnam
387b5(nyi khri): par bskyed pa/yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma
387b6(nyi khri): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa
387b7(nyi khri): chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la/
388a1(nyi khri): dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir thog pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rag
388a2(nyi khri): 'byor gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab
388a3(nyi khri): kyipha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
388a4(nyi khri): mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma
388a5(nyi khri): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po
388a6(nyi khri): 'dis kyang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po
388a7(nyi khri): ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te phyi stong
388b1(nyi khri): bapa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
388b2(nyi khri): bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
388b3(nyi khri): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang /mi
388b4(nyi khri): dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen
388b5(nyi khri): po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/
388b6(nyi khri): dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi
388b7(nyi khri): 'gyur te/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas
389a1(nyi khri): ba'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg
389a2(nyi khri): ba chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dngos po
389a3(nyi khri): med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor
389a4(nyi khri): gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam
389a5(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
389a6(nyi khri): mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi
389a7(nyi khri): dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med
389b1(nyi khri): parnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
389b2(nyi khri): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na//
389b3(nyi khri): ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po
389b4(nyi khri): med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal
389b5(nyi khri): te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/
389b6(nyi khri): dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor
389b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis//lha dang /me dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
390a1(nyi khri): sa na/nga byung ba/ rgyu du N+Da na rgyas sa ma ma pa spyod pa nan ya /rnas pa slod pas yonanan/na na /
390a2(nyi khri): kyang /lha dang /mi dang /lha mA yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rigs kyi sa'i chos dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin
390a3(nyi khri): byas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa'i sa'i
390a4(nyi khri): chos dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos dang /dgra bcom pa'i chos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /byang
390a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i chos dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du
390a6(nyi khri): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po med la/dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis
390a7(nyi khri): lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te rigs kyis dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa
390b1(nyi khri): yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor rigs kyis dngos po mdal/
390b2(nyi khri): dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa
390b3(nyi khri): dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
390b4(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
390b5(nyi khri): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir
390b6(nyi khri): theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos
390b7(nyi khri): po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings dngos po
391a1(nyi khri): med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin
391a2(nyi khri): no//rab 'byor gal te de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa
391a3(nyi khri): chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po med la//
391a4(nyi khri): dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te lha dang /mi
391a5(nyi khri): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
391a6(nyi khri): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po
391a7(nyi khri): 'dis/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems
391b1(nyi khri): dang po bskyod phyin chad snying po byang chub tu 'dug gi bar du/sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po
391b2(nyi khri): 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/sems dang /
391b3(nyi khri): po bskyed phyin chad snying po byang chub tu 'dug gi bar du/sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang
391b4(nyi khri): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po yod
391b5(nyi khri): pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor
391b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas
391b7(nyi khri): po'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po
392a1(nyi khri): med pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par khong du chud cing /rnam
392a2(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang mi 'gyur/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor byang chub sems
392a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po med la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i/
392a4(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par khong du chud de/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'thob/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
392a5(nyi khri): 'byung ba yin no//rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po med pa ma yin te//
392a6(nyi khri): dngos po yod pa zhig yin na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
392a7(nyi khri): gyis mnan cing gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lham mer mi 'gyur/lhan ner mi 'gyur/lhang nger mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
392b1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi me chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/lha dang mi dang lha
392b2(nyi khri): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/gzi brjid dang /dpal gyi lham me/lhan ne lhang nger gyur pa yin no//rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
392b3(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
392b4(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par mi mdzad de/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po med de/
392b5(nyi khri): dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs
392b6(nyi khri): pa mdzad do//rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos
392b7(nyi khri): bo med pa ma yin na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gi mngon par
393a1(nyi khri): go bar yang mi mdzad de/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po mang /
393a2(nyi khri): la/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung
393a3(nyi khri): gis mngon par go bar mdzad do//rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngas po yod pa zhig yin te/
393a4(nyi khri): po med pa ma yin na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/bram ze'am/lha'am bdud dam/
393a5(nyi khri): pa'am sus kyang rung ste/'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bskor bar yang nus te/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
393a6(nyi khri): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po med de dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/bram
393a7(nyi khri): ze'am/lha 'am bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/sus kyang rung ste/'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa rab tu bskor ro//rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa
393b1(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/som/
393b2(nyi khri): can de dag phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
393b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyis gang gis don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po med de/dngos po ma yin pas/de'i phyir sems can rnams phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
393b4(nyi khri): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o//yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du
393b5(nyi khri): theg pa de ni nom mkha' dang mnyam pa'o zhes smras pa ni/de de bzhin no//rab 'byor de de bzhin te/theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam
393b6(nyi khri): mkha' la ni shar phyogs dmigs su med do//lho dang nub dang byang dang bla dang 'og dang /phyogs mtshams dmigs su med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du thog pa chen po de ni shar phyogs
393b7(nyi khri): dmigs su med do//lho dang nub dang byang dang bla dang 'og dang phyogs mtshams dmigs su med de/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di
394a1(nyi khri): /lha skye bor na/nam mkha' ni ring po ma yin/thung ngum chun/zlum tha ma ldan/grub nim yin/mnyam pa ma yin mi mnyam pa ma yin no//dbu'
394a2(nyi khri): de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang ring po ma yin/thung ngu ma yin/zlum po ma yin/gru bzhi ma yin/mnyam pa ma yin/mi mnyam pa ma yin te/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam
